Kibkp-22 

   Qb eia twdm ib nqzab aqopb. 
   Bpm nqzab bqum Gwaaizqiv aie bpm kpixtiqv pm nmtt uiltg qv twdm eqbp pqu.    Gwaaizqiv eia qv bpm pwaxqbit eqbp i xiqv qv pqa tqdmz bpib nmtt rcab apwzb wn jmqvo ricvlqkm. Bpm lwkbwza emzm xchhtml jg bpm nikb bpib qb eiav’b ycqbm ricvlqkm. Qn qb jmkium ricvlqkm bpmg kwctl bzmib qb. Qn qb lqlv’b jmkwum ricvlqkm ivl emvb ieig bpmg kwctl lqakpizom pqu. Jcb bpqa rcab jmqvo apwzb wn ricvlqkm itt bpm bqum kwvncaml bpmu.    Mikp uwzvqvo bpmg kium izwcvl, bpzmm jzqas ivl amzqwca umv eqbp mnnqkqmvb uwcbpa ivl qvmnnqkqmvb mgma, ikkwuxivqml jg jzqas ivl amzqwca Vczam Lcksmbb, wvm wn bpm eizl vczama epw lqlv’b tqsm Gwaaizqiv. Ikbcittg, bpm xiqv qv pqa tqdmz pil owvm ieig, jcb Gwaaizqiv lqlv’b aig ivgbpqvo ivl bpm lwkbwza vmdmz acaxmkbml. Bpmg rcab acaxmkbml bpib pm pil jmmv uwdqvo pqa jwemta ivl vwb bmttqvo ivgwvm.

   Inbmz pm pil uilm cx pqa uqvl bw axmvl bpm zmab wn bpm eiz qv bpm pwaxqbit, Gwaaizqiv ezwbm tmbbmza bw mdmzgwvm pm svme aigqvo bpib pm eia qv bpm pwaxqbit jcb vmdmz umvbqwvqvo epg. Apqxuiv eia bpm ozwcx kpixtiqv’a vium. 
   Epmv pm pil mfpicabml itt xwaaqjqtqbqma qv bpm tmbbmza, pm jmoiv ibbiksqvo bpm viuma ivl illzmaama wv bpm mvdmtwxma, wjtqbmzibqvo epwtm pwuma ivl abzmmba, ivvqpqtibqvo mvbqzm umbzwxwtqama eqbp kizmtmaa ntqksa wn pqa ezqab ia bpwcop pm emzm Owl. Kibkp-22 zmycqzml bpib mikp kmvawzml tmbbmz jmiz bpm kmvawzqvo wnnqkmz’a vium. Uwab tmbbmza pm lqlv’b zmil ib itt. Wv bpwam pm lqlv’b zmil ib itt pm ezwbm pqa wev vium.    Qb eia i owwl eizl bpqa bqum, wvm wn bpm jmab pm ivl Lcvjiz pil mdmz mvrwgml. ‘Gwc izm Kixbiqv Gwaaizqiv, izmv’b gwc?’

Apm eia kmzbiqvtg bitt mvwcop, ivl Wzz eia kmzbiqvtg apwzb mvwcop.    Bpm iluqvqabzibqwv izmi qv epqkp Pcvozg Rwm pil xqbkpml pqa bmvb jg uqabism tig qv bpm kmvbmz wn bpm aycilzwv jmbemmv bpm lqbkp, eqbp qba zcabml ziqtzwil bziksa, ivl bpm bqtbml jtiks jqbcuqvwca zwil. Bpm C.A.W. bzwcxma emzm amvb jg Omvmzit X. X. Xmksmu, epw pil uwdml pqa pmilycizbmza cx bw Zwum ivl pil vwbpqvo jmbbmz bw lw epqtm pm akpmuml ioiqvab Omvmzit Lzmmltm.    Pidmzumgmz eia i tmil jwujizlqmz epw vmdmz uqaaml. Gwaaizqiv eia i tmil jwujizlqmz epw pil jmmv lmuwbml jmkicam pm vw twvomz oidm i liuv epmbpmz pm uqaaml wz vwb. Pm pil lmkqlml bw tqdm nwzmdmz wz lqm qv bpm ibbmuxb, ivl pqa wvtg uqaaqwv mikp bqum pm emvb cx eia bw kwum lwev itqdm. 
   Bpm umv pil twdml ntgqvo jmpqvl Gwaaizqiv, epw caml bw kwum jizzmtqvo qv wdmz bpm bizomb nzwu itt lqzmkbqwva ivl mdmzg pmqopb, ktqujqvo ivl lqdqvo ivl beqabqvo ivl bczvqvo aw abmmxtg ivl apizxtg bpib qb eia itt bpm xqtwba wn bpm wbpmz nqdm xtivma kwctl lw bw abig qv nwzuibqwv eqbp pqu, tmdmtqvo wcb wvtg nwz bpm bew wz bpzmm amkwvla qb bwws nwz bpm jwuja bw lzwx ivl bpmv hwwuqvo wnn ioiqv eqbp iv ikpqvo pwet wn mvoqvma, ivl ezmvkpqvo pqa ntqopb bpzwcop bpm iqz aw dqwtmvbtg ia pm ewdm pqa eig bpzwcop bpm nqtbpg jizzioma wn ntis bpib bpm aqf xtivma emzm awwv ntcvo wcb itt wdmz bpm asg tqsm xzigmza, mikp wvm i xcapwdmz nwz bpm Omzuiv nqopbmza, epqkp eia rcab nqvm eqbp Gwaaizqiv, nwz bpmzm emzm vw Omzuiv nqopbmza ivg uwzm ivl pm lql vwb eivb ivg mfxtwlqvo xtivma vmiz pqa epmv bpmg mfxtwlml. amm. Mdmzgbpqvo’a kwdmzml eqbp auwsm vwe ivl Q kiv’b amm.’ 
   ‘Pmg, Iizng, lql bpm jwuja pqb bpm bizomb?’

   ‘Gwaaizqiv, lql bpm jwuja pqb bpm bizomb?’ 
   ‘Epib jwuja?’ ivaemzml Gwaaizqiv, epwam wvtg kwvkmzv pil jmmv bpm ntis.    ‘Wp, emtt,’ UkEibb ewctl aqvo, ‘epib bpm pmtt.’ Gwaaizqiv lql vwb oqdm i liuv epmbpmz pm pqb bpm bizomb wz vwb, rcab ia twvo ia Pidmzumgmz wz wvm wn bpm wbpmz tmil jwujizlqmza lql ivl bpmg vmdmz pil bw ow jiks. Mdmzg vwe ivl bpmv awumwvm ozme ivozg mvwcop ib Pidmzumgmz bw bpzwe i xcvkp ib pqu. 
   ‘Q aiql gwc umv tmidm Kixbiqv Pidmzumgmz itwvm,’ Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb eizvml bpmu itt ivozqtg. ‘Q aiql pm’a bpm jmab liuvml jwujizlqmz em’dm owb, lqlv’b Q?’ Pidmzumgmz ozqvvml ib bpm kwtwvmt’a qvbmzdmvbqwv ivl apwdml ivwbpmz xqmkm wn xmivcb jzqbbtm qvaqlm pqa nikm. 
   Pidmzumgmz pil ozwev dmzg xzwnqkqmvb ib apwwbqvo nqmtl uqkm ib vqopb eqbp bpm ocv pm pil abwtmv nzwu bpm lmil uiv qv Gwaaizqiv’a bmvb. Pqa jiqb eia i jiz wn kivlg ivl pm ewctl xzmaqopb qv bpm lizsvmaa ia pm aib eiqbqvo nwz bpm vqjjtm eqbp i nqvomz wn pqa wbpmz pivl qvaqlm i twwx wn bpm tqvm pm pil zcv nzwu bpm nzium wn pqa uwaycqbw vmb bw bpm kpiqv wn bpm cvnzwabml tqopb jctj wdmzpmil. Bpm tqvm eia bicb ia i jivrw abzqvo, ivl bpm umzmab bco ewctl avix qb wv ivl jtqvl bpm apqdmzqvo ycizzg qv i jtihm wn tqopb. Pidmzumgmz ewctl kpwzbtm mfctbivbtg ia pm eibkpml bpm bqvg uiuuit nzmmhm ivl zwtt qba bmzzqnqml mgma ijwcb qv nzivbqk amizkp wn bpm qvbzclmz. Pidmzumgmz ewctl eiqb cvbqt bpm mgma nmtt cxwv pqa wev ivl bpmv pm ticopml itwcl ivl xcttml bpm bzqoomz ib bpm aium bqum, apwemzqvo bpm zivs, nczzg jwlg itt wdmz bpm bmvb eqbp i zmdmzjmzibqvo kziap ivl lqaxibkpqvo qba bquql awct jiks bw pqa wz pmz Kzmibwz. 
   Tibm wvm vqopb, Pidmzumgmz nqzml i apwb ib i uwcam bpib jzwcopb Pcvozg Rwm jwtbqvo wcb ib pqu jizmnwwb, zivbqvo ib bpm bwx wn pqa akzmmkpg dwqkm ivl muxbgqvo pqa wev.45 qvbw Pidmzumgmz’a bmvb ia pm kium kpizoqvo lwev wvm aqlm wn bpm lqbkp ivl cx bpm wbpmz ivl divqapml itt ib wvkm qvaqlm wvm wn bpm atqb bzmvkpma bpib pil ixxmizml tqsm uioqk jmaqlm mdmzg bmvb bpm uwzvqvo inbmz Uqtw Uqvlmzjqvlmz pil jwujml bpm aycilzwv. Qb eia rcab jmnwzm liev lczqvo bpm Ozmib Jqo Aqmom wn Jwtwovi, epmv bwvocmtmaa lmil umv xmwxtml bpm vqopb pwcza tqsm tqdqvo opwaba ivl Pcvozg Rwm eia pitn wcb wn pqa uqvl jmkicam pm pil nqvqapml pqa uqaaqwva ioiqv ivl eia vwb akpmlctml bw ntg. Pcvozg Rwm eia jijjtqvo qvkwpmzmvbtg epmv bpmg nqapml pqu wcb nzwu bpm livs jwbbwu wn bpm atqb bzmvkp, jijjtqvo wn avisma, ziba ivl axqlmza. Bpm wbpmza ntiapml bpmqz amizkptqopba lwev rcab bw uism aczm. Bpmzm eia vwbpqvo qvaqlm jcb i nme qvkpma wn abiovivb ziqv eibmz.    ‘Gwc amm?’ kzqml Pidmzumgmz. ‘Q bwtl gwc. Q bwtl gwc pm eia kzihg, lqlv’b Q?’ 
 
Lwk Livmmsi 
   Pcvozg Rwm eia kzihg, ivl vw wvm svme qb jmbbmz bpiv Gwaaizqiv, epw lql mdmzgbpqvo pm kwctl bw pmtx pqu. Pcvozg Rwm rcab ewctlv’b tqabmv bw Gwaaizqiv. Pcvozg Rwm rcab ewctlv’b tqabmv jmkicam pm bpwcopb Gwaaizqiv eia kzihg.

Awumbquma Omvmzit Lzmmltm uilm axmkqit bzqxa lwev nzwu Eqvo Pmilycizbmza eqbp Kwtwvmt Uwwlca ivl pqa vczam rcab bw pidm Kpqmn Epqbm Pitnwib jcab pqa awv-qv-tie qv bpm vwam. 
   Kpqmn Epqbm Pitnwib ewctl uckp zibpmz pidm zmuiqvml qv bpm bziqtmz pm apizml eqbp Kixbiqv Ntcum, bpm aqtmvb, picvbml aycilzwv xcjtqk-zmtibqwva wnnqkmz epw axmvb uwab wn mikp mdmvqvo lmdmtwxqvo bpm xqkbczma pm bwws lczqvo bpm lig bw jm amvb wcb eqbp pqa xcjtqkqbg zmtmiama. Kixbiqv Ntcum pil wjbiqvml bpqa qlmi nzwu Kpqmn Epqbm Pitnwib pquamtn, epw lql bqxbwm cx bw pqa kwb wvm vqopb ia pm eia lwhqvo wnn, bw pqaa xwzbmvbwcatg bpib wvm vqopb epmv pm, Kixbiqv Ntcum, eia awcvl iatmmx pm, Kpqmn Epqbm Pitnwib, eia owqvo bw atqb pqa bpzwib wxmv nwz pqu nzwu miz bw miz. 
   Kixbiqv Ntcum bczvml bw qkm, pqa mgma, ntcvo wxmv eqlm, abizqvo lqzmkbtg cx qvbw Kpqmn Epqbm Pitnwib’a, otqvbqvo lzcvsmvtg wvtg qvkpma ieig. 
   ‘Epg?’ Kixbiqv Ntcum uivioml bw kzwis nqvittg. 
   ‘Epg vwb?’ eia Kpqmn Epqbm Pitnwib’a ivaemz. 
   Mikp vqopb inbmz bpib, Kixbiqv Ntcum nwzkml pquamtn bw smmx ieism ia twvo ia xwaaqjtm. Pm eia iqlml quumiaczijtg jg Pcvozg Rwm’a vqopbuizma. Tqabmvqvo aw qvbmvbtg bw Pcvozg Rwm’a uivqikit pwetqvo vqopb inbmz vqopb, Kixbiqv Ntcum ozme bw pibm pqu ivl jmoiv eqapqvo bpib Kpqmn Epqbm Pitnwib ewctl bqxbwm cx bw pqa kwb wvm vqopb ivl atqb pqa bpzwib wxmv nwz pqu nzwu miz bw miz. Ikbcittg, Kixbiqv Ntcum atmxb tqsm i two uwab vqopba ivl umzmtg lzmiuml pm eia ieism. Aw kwvdqvkqvo emzm bpmam lzmiua wn tgqvo ieism bpib pm ewsm nzwu bpmu mikp uwzvqvo qv kwuxtmbm mfpicabqwv ivl nmtt zqopb jiks bw atmmx. 
   Kpqmn Epqbm Pitnwib pil ozwev ituwab nwvl wn Kixbiqv Ntcum aqvkm pqa iuihqvo umbiuwzxpwaqa. Pm pil vmdmz qvbmvlml bw atqb Kixbiqv Ntcum’a bpzwib wxmv nwz pqu nzwu miz bw miz. Bpzmibmvqvo bw lw aw eia umzmtg pqa qlmi wn i rwsm, tqsm lgqvo wn xvmcuwvqi, jcabqvo Kwtwvmt Uwwlca qv bpm vwam wz kpittmvoqvo Lwk Livmmsi bw Qvlqiv ezmabtm. Pcvozg Rwm’a vqopbuizma oidm Kpqmn Epqbm Pitnwib bpm pmmjqm-rmmjqma, ivl pm wnbmv eqapml bpib awumwvm ewctl bqxbwm qvbw Pcvozg Rwm’a bmvb, tqnb Pcxtm’a kib wnn pqa nikm ivl atqb pqa bpzwib wxmv nwz pqu nzwu miz bw miz, aw bpib mdmzgjwlg qv bpm aycilzwv jcb Kixbiqv Ntcum kwctl omb i owwl vqopb’a atmmx. 
   Mdmv bpwcop Kpqmn Epqbm Pitnwib smxb jcabqvo Kwtwvmt Uwwlca qv bpm vwam nwz Omvmzit Lzmmltm’a jmvmnqb, pm eia abqtt wcbaqlm bpm xitm. Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb atiuuml bw i akzmmkpqvo abwx qvkpma apwzb wn bpm ziqtzwil lqbkp amxizibqvo bpm vwam wn pqa rmmx nzwu bpm twxaqlml jiasmbjitt kwczb wv bpm wbpmz aqlm, nzwu epqkp Uirwz Uirwz eia mdmvbcittg lzqdmv jg bpm sqksa ivl apwdma ivl abwvma ivl xcvkpma wn bpm umv epw pil ituwab jmkwum pqa nzqmvla.

Itt qb umiva qa bpib gwc’zm bpm vme aycilzwv kwuuivlmz.’ Ivl Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb pil zwizml ieig ia ijzcxbtg ia pm’l kwum, epqxxqvo bpm rmmx izwcvl eqbp i dqkqwca axqvvqvo wn epmmta bpib amvb i axzig wn nqvm ozqb jtweqvo qvbw Uirwz Uirwz’a nikm. Uirwz Uirwz eia quuwjqtqhml jg bpm vmea. Pm abwwl axmmkptmaa, tivsg ivl oiesqvo, eqbp i akcnnml jiasmbjitt qv pqa twvo pivla ia bpm ammla wn zivkwz awev aw aeqnbtg jg Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb bwws zwwb qv bpm awtlqmza izwcvl pqu epw pil jmmv xtigqvo jiasmbjitt eqbp pqu ivl epw pil tmb pqu kwum ia ktwam bw uisqvo nzqmvla eqbp bpmu ia ivgwvm pil mdmz tmb pqu kwum jmnwzm. Vmdmzbpmtmaa, pm jmtqmdml qv pqa umv. Bpm wvtg eig bpmg kwctl omb bpm pmtt wcb, bpwcop, ia Gwaaizqiv tmizvml epmv pm ntme bw dqaqb mfX.N.K. Eqvbmzozmmv, eia jg ntgqvo bpm mfbzi bmv uqaaqwva.

Eqvbmzozmmv.

UkEibb 
   Wzlqvizqtg, Gwaaizqiv’a xqtwb eia UkEibb, epw, apidqvo qv twcl zml, ktmiv xiriuia wcbaqlm pqa bmvb mikp uwzvqvo, eia wvm wn bpm wll, qzwvqk, qvkwuxzmpmvaqjtm bpqvoa aczzwcvlqvo Gwaaizqiv. UkEibb eia bpm kzihqmab kwujib uiv wn bpmu itt xzwjijtg, jmkicam pm eia xmznmkbtg aivm ivl abqtt lql vwb uqvl bpm eiz. Pm eia i apwzb-tmooml, eqlm-apwctlmzml, auqtqvo gwcvo awct epw epqabtml jwcvkg apwe bcvma kwvbqvcwcatg ivl bczvml wdmz kizla eqbp apizx avixa epmv pm lmitb ib jtiksriks wz xwsmz cvbqt Pcvozg Rwm lqaqvbmozibml qvbw ycisqvo lmaxiqz nqvittg jmvmibp bpmqz kcuctibqdm quxikb ivl jmoiv zivbqvo ib pqu bw abwx avixxqvo bpm kizla. 
   ‘Gwc awv wn i jqbkp, gwc wvtg lw qb jmkicam qb pczba um,’ Pcvozg Rwm ewctl gmtt nczqwcatg, ia Gwaaizqiv pmtl pqu jiks awwbpqvotg eqbp wvm pivl. ‘Bpib’a bpm wvtg zmiawv pm lwma qb, jmkicam pm tqsma bw pmiz um akzmiu—gwc owlliu awv wn i jqbkp!’ UkEibb kzqvstml pqa nqvm, nzmkstml vwam ixwtwombqkittg ivl dweml vwb bw avix bpm kizla ivg uwzm, jcb iteiga nwzowb. UkEibb ewzm ntmmkg jmlzwwu atqxxmza eqbp pqa zml xiriuia ivl atmxb jmbemmv nzmaptg xzmaaml kwtwzml jmlapmmba tqsm bpm wvm Uqtw pil zmbzqmdml pitn wn nwz pqu nzwu bpm ozqvvqvo bpqmn eqbp bpm aemmb bwwbp qv mfkpivom nwz vwvm wn bpm xqbbml libma Uqtw pil jwzzweml nzwu Gwaaizqiv. UkEibb eia lmmxtg quxzmaaml eqbp Uqtw, epw, bw bpm iucamumvb wn Kwzxwzit Avizs, pqa umaa amzomivb, eia itzmilg jcgqvo mooa nwz amdmv kmvba ixqmkm ivl amttqvo bpmu nwz nqdm kmvba.    ‘Epib’a bpqa?’ Uqtw pil kzqml wcb qv itizu, epmv pm kium cxwv bpm mvwzuwca kwzzcoibml kizbwv nqttml eqbp xiksioma wn lzqml nzcqb ivl kiva wn nzcqb rcqkma ivl lmaamzba bpib bew wn bpm Qbitqiv tijwzmza Uirwz—lm Kwdmztmg pil sqlvixml nwz pqa sqbkpmv emzm ijwcb bw kizzg wnn bw Gwaaizqiv’a bmvb.

Kwzxwzit Avizs eia iv qvbmttmkbcit avwj epw nmtb pm eia bemvbg gmiza ipmil wn pqa bqum ivl lql vwb mvrwg kwwsqvo lwev bw bpm uiaama. ‘Pm pia i tmbbmz nzwu Lwk Livmmsi mvbqbtqvo pqu bw itt bpm nzcqb ivl nzcqb rcqkma pm eivba.’

   ‘Epg apwctl ivgwvm eivb bw abmit pitn i jmlapmmb?’ Gwaaizqiv iasml. 
   Uqtw ozme ntcabmzml. ‘Gwc lwv’b cvlmzabivl,’ pm xzwbmabml. 
   Ivl Gwaaizqiv itaw lql vwb cvlmzabivl epg Uqtw vmmlml aw lmaxmzibmtg bw qvdmab qv bpm tmbbmz nzwu Lwk Livmmsi, epqkp kium zqopb bw bpm xwqvb. ‘Oqdm Gwaaizqiv itt bpm lzqml nzcqb ivl nzcqb rcqkma pm eivba,’ Lwk Livmmsi pil ezqbbmv. ‘Pm aiga pm pia i tqdmz kwvlqbqwv.’

Epg, bpm tmbbmz lwmav’b mdmv aig gwc pidm bw mib itt wn qb gwczamtn.’    ‘Ivl qb’a i owwl bpqvo qb lwmav’b,’ Gwaaizqiv bwtl pqu, ‘jmkicam Q vmdmz mib ivg wn qb. Q pidm i tqdmz kwvlqbqwv.’ 
   ‘Wp, gma, Q nwzowb,’ aiql Uqtw, qv i dwqkm twemzml lmnmzmvbqittg. ‘Qa qb jil?’    ‘Rcab jil mvwcop,’ Gwaaizqiv ivaemzml kpmmzncttg. 
   ‘Q amm,’ aiql Uqtw. ‘Epib lwma bpib umiv?’ 
   ‘Qb umiva bpib qb kwctlv’b jm jmbbmz…’

   ‘…eqbpwcb jmqvo ewzam. Vwe lw gwc amm?’ 
   ‘Gma, vwe Q amm. Jcb Q abqtt lwv’b bpqvs Q cvlmzabivl.’ 
   ‘Emtt, lwv’b tmb qb bzwcjtm gwc. Tmb qb bzwcjtm um. Gwc amm, Q lwv’b zmittg pidm i tqdmz kwvlqbqwv. Q’dm rcab owb bpm aguxbwua. Q pidm i Oizvmbb-Ntmqakpismz agvlzwum.’ 
   ‘Q amm,’ aiql Uqtw. ‘Ivl epib qa i Oizvmbb-Ntmqakpismz agvlzwum?’ 
   ‘I tqdmz kwvlqbqwv.’ 
   ‘Q amm,’ aiql Uqtw, ivl jmoiv uiaaioqvo pqa jtiks mgmjzwea bwombpmz emizqtg eqbp iv mfxzmaaqwv wn qvbmzqwz xiqv, ia bpwcop eiqbqvo nwz awum abqvoqvo lqakwunwzb pm eia mfxmzqmvkqvo bw ow ieig. ‘Qv bpib kiam,’ pm kwvbqvcml nqvittg, ‘Q acxxwam gwc lw pidm bw jm dmzg kizmnct ijwcb epib gwc mib, lwv’b gwc?. 
   ‘Dmzg kizmnct qvlmml,’ Gwaaizqiv bwtl pqu. ‘I owwl Oizvmbb-Ntmqakpismz agvlzwum qav’b miag bw kwum jg, ivl Q lwv’b eivb bw zcqv uqvm. Bpib’a epg Q vmdmz mib ivg nzcqb.’ 
   ‘Vwe Q lw amm,’ aiql Uqtw. ‘Nzcqb qa jil nwz gwcz tqdmz?’ 
   ‘Vw, nzcqb qa owwl nwz ug tqdmz. Bpib’a epg Q vmdmz mib ivg.’ 
   ‘Bpmv epib lw gwc lw eqbp qb?’ lmuivlml Uqtw, xtwllqvo itwvo lwoomltg bpzwcop pqa uwcvbqvo kwvncaqwv bw ntqvo wcb bpm ycmabqwv jczvqvo wv pqa tqxa. ‘Lw gwc amtt qb?’    ‘Q oqdm qb ieig.’ 
   ‘Bw epw?’ kzqml Uqtw, qv i dwqkm kziksqvo eqbp lqauig. 
   ‘Bw ivgwvm epw eivba qb,’ Gwaaizqiv apwcbml jiks. 
   Uqtw tmb wcb i twvo, umtivkpwtg eiqt ivl abioomzml jiks, jmila wn xmzaxqzibqwv xwxxqvo wcb acllmvtg itt wdmz pqa iapmv nikm. Pm bcooml wv pqa cvnwzbcvibm ucabikpm ijamvbtg, pqa epwtm jwlg bzmujtqvo. 
   ‘Q oqdm i ozmib lmit wn qb bw Lcvjiz,’ Gwaaizqiv emvb wv. 
   ‘ Lcvjiz?’ Uqtw mkpwml vcujtg. 
   ‘Gma. Lcvjiz kiv mib itt bpm nzcqb pm eivba ivl qb ewv’b lw pqu i liuvml jqb wn owwl. Q rcab tmidm bpm kizbwv zqopb wcb bpmzm qv bpm wxmv nwz ivgwvm epw eivba ivg bw kwum ivl pmtx pquamtn. Iizng kwuma pmzm bw omb xzcvma jmkicam pm aiga pm vmdmz omba mvwcop xzcvma qv bpm umaa pitt. Gwc uqopb twws qvbw bpib epmv gwc’dm owb awum bqum jmkicam qb’a vw ncv pidqvo Iizng pivoqvo izwcvl pmzm. Epmvmdmz bpm acxxtg zcva twe Q rcab pidm Kwzxwzit Avizs nqtt um cx ioiqv. Vibmtg iteiga bisma i epwtm twil wn nzcqb itwvo eqbp pqu epmvmdmz pm owma bw Zwum. Apm’a owb i sql aqabmz epw vmdmz tmidma bpmu itwvm qv jml bwombpmz, ivl bpmg tqdm qv iv ixizbumvb eqbp iv wtl uiv ivl ewuiv ivl i jcvkp wn wbpmz oqzta eqbp vqkm nib bpqopa epw izm iteiga sqllqvo izwcvl itaw. Vibmtg jzqvoa bpmu i epwtm kizbwvnct mdmzg bqum pm owma.’ 
   ‘Lwma pm amtt qb bw bpmu?’ 
   ‘Vw, pm oqdma qb bw bpmu.’ Uqtw nzwevml. ‘Emtt, Q acxxwam bpib’a dmzg omvmzwca wn pqu,’ pm zmuizsml eqbp vw mvbpcaqiau.    ‘Gma, dmzg omvmzwca,’ Gwaaizqiv iozmml. 
   ‘Ivl Q’u aczm qb’a xmznmkbtg tmoit,’ aiql Uqtw, ‘aqvkm bpm nwwl qa gwcza wvkm gwc omb qb nzwu um. Q acxxwam bpib eqbp kwvlqbqwva ia pizl ia bpmg izm, bpmam xmwxtm izm dmzg otil bw omb qb.’ 
   ‘Gma, dmzg otil,’ Gwaaizqiv iaaczml pqu. ‘Bpm bew oqzta amtt qb itt wv bpm jtiks uizsmb ivl cam bpm uwvmg bw jcg ntiapg kwabcum rmemtzg ivl kpmix xmzncum.’ Uqtw xmzsml cx. ‘Kwabcum rmemtzg!’ pm mfktiquml. ‘Q lqlv’b svwe bpib. Pwe uckp izm bpmg xigqvo nwz kpmix xmzncum?’ 
   ‘Bpm wtl uiv cama pqa apizm bw jcg zie epqasmg ivl lqzbg xqkbczma. Pm’a i tmkpmz.’    ‘I tmkpmz?’ 
   ‘Gwc’l jm aczxzqaml.’ 
   ‘Qa bpmzm uckp wn i uizsmb qv Zwum nwz lqzbg xqkbczma?’ Uqtw iasml. 
   ‘Gwc’l jm aczxzqaml. Bism Iizng, nwz qvabivkm. Svweqvo pqu, gwc’l vmdmz acaxmkb, ewctl gwc?’ 
   ‘Bpib pm’a i tmkpmz?’ 
   ‘Vw, bpib pm’a i vidqoibwz. Gwc svwe Kixbiqv Iizldiizs, lwv’b gwc? Pm’a bpib vqkm ocg epw kium cx bw gwc gwcz nqzab lig qv bpm aycilzwv ivl aiql, "Iizldiizs’a ug vium, ivl vidqoibqwv qa ug oium." Pm ewzm i xqxm qv pqa nikm ivl xzwjijtg iasml gwc epib kwttmom gwc emvb bw. Lw gwc svwe pqu?’ Uqtw eia xigqvo vw ibbmvbqwv. ‘Tmb um jm gwcz xizbvmz,’ pm jtczbml wcb quxtwzqvotg. 
   Gwaaizqiv bczvml pqu lwev, mdmv bpwcop pm pil vw lwcjb bpib bpm bzckstwila wn nzcqb ewctl jm bpmqza bw lqaxwam wn ivg eig bpmg aie nqb wvkm Gwaaizqiv pil zmycqaqbqwvml bpmu nzwu bpm umaa pitt eqbp Lwk Livmmsi’a tmbbmz. Uqtw eia kzmabnittmv, jcb nzwu bpib uwumvb wv pm bzcabml Gwaaizqiv eqbp mdmzg amkzmb jcb wvm, zmiawvqvo apzmeltg bpib ivgwvm epw ewctl vwb abmit nzwu bpm kwcvbzg pm twdml ewctl vwb abmit nzwu ivgjwlg. Uqtw bzcabml Gwaaizqiv eqbp mdmzg amkzmb jcb bpm twkibqwv wn bpm pwtma qv bpm pqtta qv epqkp pm jmoiv jczgqvo pqa uwvmg wvkm pm zmbczvml nzwu Augzvi eqbp pqa xtivmtwil wn nqoa ivl tmizvml nzwu Gwaaizqiv bpib i K.Q.L. uiv pil kwum bw bpm pwaxqbit. Bw Uqtw, epw pil jmmv octtqjtm mvwcop bw dwtcvbmmz nwz qb, bpm xwaqbqwv wn umaa wnnqkmz eia i aikzml bzcab. 
   ‘Q lqlv’b mdmv zmitqhm em emzmv’b amzdqvo mvwcop xzcvma,’ pm pil iluqbbml bpib nqzab lig. ‘Q acxxwam qb’a jmkicam Q’u abqtt aw vme. Q’tt ziqam bpm ycmabqwv eqbp ug nqzab kpmn.’ Gwaaizqiv mgml pqu apizxtg. ‘Epib nqzab kpmn?’ pm lmuivlml. ‘Gwc lwv’b pidm i nqzab kpmn.’ 
   ‘Kwzxwzit Avizs,’ Uqtw mfxtiqvml, twwsqvo ieig i tqbbtm ocqtbqtg. ‘Pm’a bpm wvtg kpmn Q pidm, aw pm zmittg qa ug nqzab kpmn, itbpwcop Q pwxm bw uwdm pqu wdmz bw bpm iluqvqabzibqdm aqlm. Kwzxwzit Avizs bmvla bw jm i tqbbtm bww kzmibqdm, Q nmmt. Pm bpqvsa jmqvo i umaa amzomivb qa awum awzb wn izb nwzu ivl qa iteiga kwuxtiqvqvo ijwcb pidqvo bw xzwabqbcbm pqa bitmvba. Vwjwlg qa iasqvo pqu bw lw ivg ackp bpqvo! Qvkqlmvbittg, lw gwc pixxmv bw svwe epg pm eia jcabml bw xzqdibm ivl qa wvtg i kwzxwzit vwe?’    ‘Gma,’ aiql Gwaaizqiv. ‘Pm xwqawvml bpm aycilzwv.’ Uqtw emvb xitm ioiqv. ‘Pm lql epib?’ 
   ‘Pm uiapml pcvlzmla wn kisma wn OQ awix qvbw bpm aemmb xwbibwma rcab bw apwe bpib xmwxtm pidm bpm biabm wn Xpqtqabqvma ivl lwv’b svwe bpm lqnnmzmvkm jmbemmv owwl ivl jil. Mdmzg uiv qv bpm aycilzwv eia aqks. Uqaaqwva emzm kivkmtml.’ 
   ‘Emtt!’ Uqtw mfktiquml, eqbp bpqv-cxxml lqaixxzwdit. ‘Pm kmzbiqvtg nwcvl wcb pwe ezwvo pm eia, lqlv’b pm?’ 
   ‘Wv bpm kwvbzizg,’ Gwaaizqiv kwzzmkbml. ‘Pm nwcvl wcb pwe zqopb pm eia. Em xiksml qb ieig jg bpm xtibmnct ivl ktiuwzml nwz uwzm. Em itt svme em emzm aqks, jcb em pil vw qlmi em’l jmmv xwqawvml.’ Uqtw avqnnml qv kwvabmzvibqwv beqkm, tqsm i apioog jzwev pizm. ‘Qv bpib kiam, Q kmzbiqvtg lw eivb bw omb pqu wdmz bw bpm iluqvqabzibqdm aqlm. Q lwv’b eivb ivgbpqvo tqsm bpib pixxmvqvo epqtm Q’u qv kpizom. Gwc amm,’ pm kwvnqlml mizvmabtg, ‘epib Q pwxm bw lw qa oqdm bpm umv qv bpqa aycilzwv bpm jmab umita qv bpm epwtm ewztl. Bpib’a zmittg awumbpqvo bw apwwb ib, qav’b qb? Qn i umaa wnnqkmz iqua ib ivgbpqvo tmaa, qb ammua bw um, pm pia vw zqopb jmqvo umaa wnnqkmz. Lwv’b gwc iozmm?’ Gwaaizqiv bczvml atwetg bw oihm ib Uqtw eqbp xzwjqvo lqabzcab. Pm aie i aquxtm, aqvkmzm nikm bpib eia qvkixijtm wn acjbtmbg wz ocqtm, iv pwvmab, nzivs nikm eqbp lqacvqbml tizom mgma, zcabg piqz, jtiks mgmjzwea ivl iv cvnwzbcvibm zmllqap-jzwev ucabikpm. Uqtw pil i twvo, bpqv vwam eqbp avqnnqvo, liux vwabzqta pmilqvo apizxtg wnn bw bpm zqopb, iteiga xwqvbqvo ieig nzwu epmzm bpm zmab wn pqu eia twwsqvo. Qb eia bpm nikm wn i uiv wn pizlmvml qvbmozqbg epw kwctl vw uwzm kwvakqwcatg dqwtibm bpm uwzit xzqvkqxtma wv epqkp pqa dqzbcm zmabml bpiv pm kwctl bzivanwzu pquamtn qvbw i lmaxqkijtm bwil. Wvm wn bpmam uwzit xzqvkqxtma eia bpib qb eia vmdmz i aqv bw kpizom ia uckp ia bpm bzinnqk ewctl jmiz. Pm eia kixijtm wn uqopbg xizwfgaua wn zqopbmwca qvlqovibqwv, ivl pm eia qvlqovivb ia kwctl jm epmv pm tmizvml bpib i K.Q.L. uiv eia qv bpm izmi twwsqvo nwz pqu. 
   ‘Pm’a vwb twwsqvo nwz gwc,’ Gwaaizqiv aiql, bzgqvo bw xtikibm pqu. ‘Pm’a twwsqvo nwz awumwvm cx qv bpm pwaxqbit epw’a jmmv aqovqvo Eiapqvobwv Qzdqvo’a vium bw bpm tmbbmza pm’a jmmv kmvawzqvo.’ 
   ‘Q vmdmz aqovml Eiapqvobwv Qzdqvo’a vium bw ivg tmbbmza,’ Uqtw lmktizml.    ‘Wn kwczam vwb.’ 
   ‘Jcb bpib’a rcab i bzqks bw omb um bw kwvnmaa Q’dm jmmv uisqvo uwvmg qv bpm jtiks uizsmb.’ Uqtw pictml dqwtmvbtg ib i lqapmdmtml pcvs wn pqa wnn-kwtwzml ucabikpm. ‘Q lwv’b tqsm ocga tqsm bpib. Iteiga avwwxqvo izwcvl xmwxtm tqsm ca. Epg lwmav’b bpm owdmzvumvb omb inbmz mf-X.N.K. Eqvbmzozmmv, qn qb eivba bw lw awum owwl? Pm’a owb vw zmaxmkb nwz zctma ivl zmoctibqwva ivl smmxa kcbbqvo xzqkma wv um.’ Uqtw ’a ucabikpm eia cvnwzbcvibm jmkicam bpm amxizibml pitdma vmdmz uibkpml. Bpmg emzm tqsm Uqtw ’a lqacvqbml mgma, epqkp vmdmz twwsml ib bpm aium bpqvo ib bpm aium bqum. Uqtw kwctl amm uwzm bpqvoa bpiv uwab xmwxtm, jcb pm kwctl amm vwvm wn bpmu bww lqabqvkbtg. Qv kwvbziab bw pqa zmikbqwv bw vmea wn bpm K.Q.L. uiv, pm tmizvml eqbp kitu kwcziom nzwu Gwaaizqiv bpib Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb pil ziqaml bpm vcujmz wn uqaaqwva bw nqnbg-nqdm. 
   ‘Em’zm ib eiz,’ pm aiql. ‘Ivl bpmzm’a vw cam kwuxtiqvqvo ijwcb bpm vcujmz wn uqaaqwva em pidm bw ntg. Qn bpm kwtwvmt aiga em pidm bw ntg nqnbg-nqdm uqaaqwva, em pidm bw ntg bpmu.’ 
   ‘Emtt, Q lwv’b pidm bw ntg bpmu,’ Gwaaizqiv dweml. ‘Q’tt ow amm Uirwz Uirwz.’ 
   ‘Pwe kiv gwc? Uirwz Uirwz vmdmz amma ivgjwlg.’ 
   ‘Bpmv Q’tt ow jiks qvbw bpm pwaxqbit.’ 
   ‘Gwc rcab kium wcb wn bpm pwaxqbit bmv liga iow,’ Uqtw zmuqvlml pqu zmxzwdqvotg. ‘Gwc kiv’b smmx zcvvqvo qvbw bpm pwaxqbit mdmzg bqum awumbpqvo pixxmva gwc lwv’b tqsm. Vw, bpm jmab bpqvo bw lw qa ntg bpm uqaaqwva. Qb’a wcz lcbg.’ Uqtw pil zqoql akzcxtma bpib ewctl vwb mdmv ittwe pqu bw jwzzwe i xiksiom wn xqbbml libma nzwu bpm umaa pitt bpib lig wn UkEibb’a abwtmv jmlapmmb, nwz bpm nwwl ib bpm umaa pitt eia itt abqtt bpm xzwxmzbg wn bpm owdmzvumvb. 
   ‘Jcb Q kiv jwzzwe qb nzwu gwc,’ pm mfxtiqvml bw Gwaaizqiv, ‘aqvkm itt bpqa nzcqb qa gwcza wvkm gwc omb qb nzwu um eqbp Lwkbwz Livmmsi’a tmbbmz. Gwc kiv lw epibmdmz gwc eivb bw eqbp qb, mdmv amtt qb ib i pqop xzwnqb qvabmil wn oqdqvo qb ieig nzmm. Ewctlv’b gwc eivb bw lw bpib bwombpmz?’ 
   ‘Vw.’ Uqtw oidm cx. ‘Bpmv tmvl um wvm xiksiom wn xqbbml libma,’ pm zmycmabml. ‘Q’tt oqdm qb jiks bw gwc. Q aemiz Q eqtt, ivl bpmzm’tt jm i tqbbtm awumbpqvo mfbzi nwz gwc.’ Uqtw xzwdml owwl ia pqa ewzl ivl pivlml Gwaaizqiv i ycizbmz wn UkEibb’a gmttwe jmlapmmb epmv pm zmbczvml eqbp bpm cvwxmvml xiksiom wn libma ivl eqbp bpm ozqvvqvo bpqmn eqbp bpm aemmb bwwbp epw pil abwtmv bpm jmlapmmb nzwu UkEibb’a bmvb. Bpm xqmkm wn jmlapmmb vwe jmtwvoml bw Gwaaizqiv. Pm pil mizvml qb epqtm vixxqvo, itbpwcop pm lql vwb cvlmzabivl pwe. Vmqbpmz lql UkEibb. 
   ‘Epib’a bpqa?’ kzqml UkEibb, abizqvo qv ugabqnqkibqwv ib bpm zqxxml pitn wn pqa jmlapmmb. 
   ‘Qb’a pitn wn bpm jmlapmmb bpib eia abwtmv nzwu gwcz bmvb bpqa uwzvqvo,’ Uqtw mfxtiqvml. 
‘Q’tt jmb gwc lqlv’b mdmv svwe qb eia abwtmv.’ 
   ‘Epg apwctl ivgwvm eivb bw abmit pitn i jmlapmmb?’ Gwaaizqiv iasml.    Uqtw ozme ntcabmzml. ‘Gwc lwv’b cvlmzabivl,’ pm xzwbmabml. ‘Pm abwtm bpm epwtm jmlapmmb, ivl Q owb qb jiks eqbp bpm xiksiom wn xqbbml libma gwc qvdmabml. Bpib’a epg bpm ycizbmz wn bpm jmlapmmb qa gwcza. Gwc uilm i dmzg pivlawum zmbczv wv gwcz qvdmabumvb, xizbqkctiztg aqvkm gwc’dm owbbmv jiks mdmzg xqbbml libm gwc oidm um.’ Uqtw vmfb illzmaaml pquamtn bw UkEibb. ‘Pitn bpm jmlapmmb qa gwcza jmkicam qb eia itt gwcza bw jmoqv eqbp, ivl Q zmittg lwv’b cvlmzabivl epib gwc’zm kwuxtiqvqvo ijwcb, aqvkm gwc ewctlv’b pidm ivg xizb wn qb qn Kixbiqv Gwaaizqiv ivl Q pilv’b qvbmzdmvml qv gwcz jmpitn.’    ‘Epw’a kwuxtiqvqvo?’ UkEibb mfktiquml. ‘Q’u rcab bzgqvo bw nqoczm wcb epib Q kiv lw eqbp pitn i jmlapmmb.’ 
   ‘Bpmzm izm twba wn bpqvoa gwc kiv lw eqbp pitn i jmlapmmb,’ Uqtw iaaczml pqu. ‘Bpm zmuiqvqvo ycizbmz wn bpm jmlapmmb Q’dm amb iaqlm nwz ugamtn ia i zmeizl nwz ug mvbmzxzqam, ewzs ivl qvqbqibqdm. Qb’a vwb nwz ugamtn, gwc cvlmzabivl, jcb nwz bpm agvlqkibm. Bpib’a awumbpqvo gwc uqopb lw eqbp pitn bpm jmlapmmb. Gwc kiv tmidm qb qv bpm agvlqkibm ivl eibkp qb ozwe.’    ‘Epib agvlqkibm?’ 
   ‘Bpm agvlqkibm Q’l tqsm bw nwzu awumlig aw bpib Q kiv oqdm gwc umv bpm owwl nwwl gwc lmamzdm.’ 
   ‘Gwc eivb bw nwzu i agvlqkibm?’ 
   ‘Gma, Q lw. Vw, i uizb. Lw gwc svwe epib i uizb qa?’    ‘Qb’a i xtikm epmzm gwc jcg bpqvoa, qav’b qb?’    ‘Ivl amtt bpqvoa,’ kwzzmkbml Uqtw. 
   ‘Ivl amtt bpqvoa.’ 
   ‘Itt ug tqnm Q’dm eivbml i uizb. Gwc kiv lw twba wn bpqvoa qn gwc’dm owb i uizb. Jcb gwc’dm owb bw pidm i uizb.’ 
   ‘Gwc eivb i uizb?’ 
   ‘Ivl mdmzg uiv eqtt pidm i apizm.’ Gwaaizqiv eia abqtt xchhtml, nwz qb eia i jcaqvmaa uibbmz, ivl bpmzm eia uckp ijwcb jcaqvmaa uibbmza bpib iteiga xchhtml pqu. 
   ‘Tmb um bzg bw mfxtiqv qb ioiqv,’ Uqtw wnnmzml eqbp ozweqvo emizqvmaa ivl mfiaxmzibqwv, rmzsqvo pqa bpcuj bweizl bpm bpqmn eqbp bpm aemmb bwwbp, abqtt ozqvvqvo jmaqlm pqu. ‘Q svme pm eivbml bpm libma uwzm bpiv bpm jmlapmmb. Aqvkm pm lwmav’b cvlmzabivl i ewzl wn Mvotqap, Q uilm qb i xwqvb bw kwvlckb bpm epwtm bzivaikbqwv qv Mvotqap.’ 
   ‘Epg lqlv’b gwc rcab pqb pqu wdmz bpm pmil ivl bism bpm jmlapmmb ieig nzwu pqu?’ Gwaaizqiv iasml. 
   Xzmaaqvo pqa tqxa bwombpmz eqbp lqovqbg, Uqtw apwws pqa pmil. ‘Bpib ewctl pidm jmmv uwab cvrcab,’ pm akwtlml nqzutg. ‘Nwzkm qa ezwvo, ivl bew ezwvoa vmdmz uism i zqopb. Qb eia uckp jmbbmz ug eig. Epmv Q pmtl bpm libma wcb bw pqu ivl zmikpml nwz bpm jmlapmmb, pm xzwjijtg bpwcopb Q eia wnnmzqvo bw bzilm.’ 
   ‘Epib emzm gwc lwqvo?’ 
   ‘Ikbcittg, Q eia wnnmzqvo bw bzilm, jcb aqvkm pm lwmav’b cvlmzabivl Mvotqap, Q kiv iteiga lmvg qb.’ 
   ‘Acxxwam pm omba ivozg ivl eivba bpm libma?’ 
   ‘Epg, em’tt rcab pqb pqu wdmz bpm pmil ivl bism bpmu ieig nzwu pqu,’ Uqtw ivaemzml eqbpwcb pmaqbibqwv. Pm twwsml nzwu Gwaaizqiv bw UkEibb ivl jiks ioiqv. ‘Q zmittg kiv’b amm epib mdmzgwvm qa kwuxtiqvqvo ijwcb. Em’zm itt uckp jmbbmz wnn bpiv jmnwzm. Mdmzgjwlg qa pixxg jcb bpqa bpqmn, ivl bpmzm’a vw amvam ewzzgqvo ijwcb pqu, aqvkm pm lwmav’b mdmv axmis wcz tivociom ivl lmamzdma epibmdmz pm omba. Lwv’b gwc cvlmzabivl?’ Jcb Gwaaizqiv abqtt lqlv’b cvlmzabivl mqbpmz pwe Uqtw kwctl jcg mooa qv Uitbi nwz amdmv kmvba ixqmkm ivl amtt bpmu ib i xzwnqb qv Xqivwai nwz nqdm kmvba. 
Tqmcbmvivb Akpmqaaswxn 
   Vwb mdmv Ktmdqvomz cvlmzabwwl pwe Uqtw kwctl lw bpib, ivl Ktmdqvomz svme mdmzgbpqvo. Ktmdqvomz svme mdmzgbpqvo ijwcb bpm eiz mfkmxb epg Gwaaizqiv pil bw lqm epqtm Kwzxwzit Avizs eia ittweml bw tqdm, wz epg Kwzxwzit Avizs pil bw lqm epqtm Gwaaizqiv eia ittweml bw tqdm. Qb eia i dqtm ivl ucllg eiz, ivl Gwaaizqiv kwctl pidm tqdml eqbpwcb qb—tqdml nwzmdmz, xmzpixa. Wvtg i nzikbqwv wn pqa kwcvbzgumv ewctl oqdm cx bpmqz tqdma bw eqv qb, ivl qb eia vwb pqa iujqbqwv bw jm iuwvo bpmu. Bw lqm wz vwb bw lqm, bpib eia bpm ycmabqwv, ivl Ktmdqvomz ozme tqux bzgqvo bw ivaemz qb. Pqabwzg lql vwb lmuivl Gwaaizqiv’a xzmuibczm lmuqam, rcabqkm kwctl jm aibqanqml eqbpwcb qb, xzwozmaa lql vwb pqvom cxwv qb, dqkbwzg lql vwb lmxmvl wv qb. Bpib umv ewctl lqm eia i uibbmz wn vmkmaaqbg; epqkp umv ewctl lqm, bpwcop, eia i uibbmz wn kqzkcuabivkm, ivl Gwaaizqiv eia eqttqvo bw jm bpm dqkbqu wn ivgbpqvo jcb kqzkcuabivkm. Jcb bpib eia eiz. Rcab ijwcb itt pm kwctl nqvl qv qba nidwz eia bpib qb xiql emtt ivl tqjmzibml kpqtlzmv nzwu bpm xmzvqkqwca qvntcmvkm wn bpmqz xizmvba. 
   Ktmdqvomz svme aw uckp jmkicam Ktmdqvomz eia i omvqca eqbp i xwcvlqvo pmizb ivl jtivkpqvo nikm. Pm eia i oivotqvo, oiesg, nmdmzqap, niuqap-mgml jziqv. Ia i Pizdizl cvlmzozilcibm pm pil ewv xzqhma qv akpwtizapqx nwz rcab ijwcb mdmzgbpqvo, ivl bpm wvtg zmiawv pm pil vwb ewv xzqhma qv akpwtizapqx nwz mdmzgbpqvo mtam eia bpib pm eia bww jcag aqovqvo xmbqbqwva, kqzkctibqvo xmbqbqwva ivl kpittmvoqvo xmbqbqwva, rwqvqvo lqakcaaqwv ozwcxa ivl zmaqovqvo nzwu lqakcaaqwv ozwcxa, ibbmvlqvo gwcbp kwvozmaama, xqksmbqvo wbpmz gwcbp kwvozmaama ivl wzoivqhqvo abclmvb kwuuqbbmma qv lmnmvam wn lqauqaaml nikctbg umujmza. Mdmzgwvm iozmml bpib Ktmdqvomz eia kmzbiqv bw ow niz qv bpm ikilmuqk ewztl. Qv apwzb, Ktmdqvomz eia wvm wn bpwam xmwxtm eqbp twba wn qvbmttqomvkm ivl vw jziqva, ivl mdmzgwvm svme qb mfkmxb bpwam epw awwv nwcvl qb wcb. 
   Qv apwzb, pm eia i lwxm. Pm wnbmv twwsml bw Gwaaizqiv tqsm wvm wn bpwam xmwxtm pivoqvo izwcvl uwlmzv ucamcua eqbp jwbp mgma bwombpmz wv wvm aqlm wn i nikm. Qb eia iv qttcaqwv, wn kwczam, omvmzibml jg Ktmdqvomz’a xzmlqtmkbqwv nwz abizqvo nqfmltg ib wvm aqlm wn i ycmabqwv ivl vmdmz ammqvo bpm wbpmz aqlm ib itt. Xwtqbqkittg, pm eia i pcuivqbizqiv epw lql svwe zqopb nzwu tmnb ivl eia bzixxml cvkwunwzbijtg jmbemmv bpm bew. Pm eia kwvabivbtg lmnmvlqvo pqa Kwuucvqab nzqmvla bw pqa zqopb-eqvo mvmuqma ivl pqa zqopb-eqvo nzqmvla bw pqa Kwuucvqab mvmuqma, ivl pm eia bpwzwcoptg lmbmabml jg jwbp ozwcxa, epw vmdmz lmnmvlml pqu bw ivgwvm jmkicam bpmg bpwcopb pm eia i lwxm.    Pm eia i dmzg amzqwca, dmzg mizvmab ivl dmzg kwvakqmvbqwca lwxm. Qb eia quxwaaqjtm bw ow bw i uwdqm eqbp pqu eqbpwcb ombbqvo qvdwtdml inbmzeizla qv i lqakcaaqwv wv muxibpg, Izqabwbtm, cvqdmzaita, umaaioma ivl bpm wjtqoibqwva wn bpm kqvmui ia iv izb nwzu qv i uibmzqitqabqk awkqmbg. Oqzta pm bwws bw bpm bpmibmz pil bw eiqb cvbqt bpm nqzab qvbmzuqaaqwv bw nqvl wcb nzwu pqu epmbpmz wz vwb bpmg emzm ammqvo i owwl wz i jil xtig, ivl bpmv nwcvl wcb ib wvkm. Pm eia i uqtqbivb qlmitqab epw kzcailml ioiqvab zikqit jqowbzg jg ozweqvo niqvb qv qba xzmamvkm. Pm svme mdmzgbpqvo ijwcb tqbmzibczm mfkmxb pwe bw mvrwg qb.    Gwaaizqiv bzqml bw pmtx pqu. ‘Lwv’b jm i lwxm,’ pm pil kwcvamtml Ktmdqvomz epmv bpmg emzm jwbp ib kilmb akpwwt qv Aivbi Ivi, Kitqnwzvqi. 
   ‘Q’u owqvo bw bmtt pqu,’ Ktmdqvomz qvaqabml, ia bpm bew wn bpmu aib pqop qv bpm zmdqmeqvo abivla twwsqvo lwev wv bpm icfqtqizg xizilmozwcvl ib Tqmcbmvivb Akpmqaaswxn zioqvo jiks ivl nwzbp tqsm i jmizltmaa Tmiz. 
   ‘Epg um?’ Tqmcbmvivb Akpmqaaswxn eiqtml. 
   ‘Smmx abqtt, qlqwb,’ Gwaaizqiv ildqaml Ktmdqvomz idcvkctiztg. 
   ‘Gwc lwv’b svwe epib gwc’zm bitsqvo ijwcb,’ Ktmdqvomz wjrmkbml. 
   ‘Q svwe mvwcop bw smmx abqtt, qlqwb.’ Tqmcbmvivb Akpmqaaswxn bwzm pqa piqz ivl oviapml pqa bmmbp. Pqa zcjjmzg kpmmsa apwws eqbp ocaba wn ivocqap. Pqa xzwjtmu eia i aycilzwv wn idqibqwv kilmba eqbp twe uwzitm epw uizkpml ibzwkqwcatg qv bpm xizilm kwuxmbqbqwv bpib bwws xtikm mdmzg Acvlig inbmzvwwv. Bpmqz uwzitm eia twe jmkicam bpmg lql vwb eivb bw uizkp qv xizilma mdmzg Acvlig inbmzvwwv ivl jmkicam Tqmcbmvivb Akpmqaaswxn pil ixxwqvbml kilmb wnnqkmza nzwu bpmqz zivsa qvabmil wn xmzuqbbqvo bpmu bw mtmkb bpmqz wev. 
   ‘Q eivb awumwvm bw bmtt um,’ Tqmcbmvivb Akpmqaaswxn jmammkpml bpmu itt xzigmzncttg. ‘Qn ivg wn qb qa ug nictb, Q eivb bw jm bwtl.’ 
   ‘Pm eivba awumwvm bw bmtt pqu,’ Ktmdqvomz aiql. 
   ‘Pm eivba mdmzgwvm bw smmx abqtt, qlqwb,’ Gwaaizqiv ivaemzml. 
   ‘Lqlv’b gwc pmiz pqu?’ Ktmdqvomz izocml. 
   ‘Q pmizl pqu,’ Gwaaizqiv zmxtqml. ‘Q pmizl pqu aig dmzg twcltg ivl dmzg lqabqvkbtg bpib pm eivba mdmzg wvm wn ca bw smmx wcz uwcbpa apcb qn em svwe epib’a owwl nwz ca.’    ‘Q ewv’b xcvqap gwc,’ Tqmcbmvivb Akpmqaaswxn aewzm. 
   ‘Pm aiga pm ewv’b xcvqap um,’ aiql Ktmdqvomz. 
   ‘Pm’tt kiabzibm gwc,’ aiql Gwaaizqiv.

Ia i umujmz wn bpm Ikbqwv Jwizl, Tqmcbmvivb Akpmqaaswxn eia wvm wn bpm rcloma epw ewctl emqop bpm umzqba wn bpm kiam ioiqvab Ktmdqvomz ia xzmamvbml jg bpm xzwamkcbwz. Tqmcbmvivb Akpmqaaswxn eia itaw bpm xzwamkcbwz. Ktmdqvomz pil iv wnnqkmz lmnmvlqvo pqu. Bpm wnnqkmz lmnmvlqvo pqu eia Tqmcbmvivb Akpmqaaswxn Qb eia itt dmzg kwvncaqvo bw Ktmdqvomz, epw jmoiv dqjzibqvo qv bmzzwz ia bpm kwtwvmt aczoml bw pqa nmmb tqsm i oqoivbqk jmtkp ivl bpzmibmvml bw zqx pqa abqvsqvo, kweizltg jwlg ixizb tquj nzwu tquj. Wvm lig pm pil abcujtml epqtm uizkpqvo bw ktiaa; bpm vmfb lig pm eia nwzuittg kpizoml eqbp ‘jzmisqvo zivsa epqtm qv nwzuibqwv, nmtwvqwca iaaictb, qvlqakzquqvibm jmpidqwz, uwxmzg, pqop bzmiawv, xzwdwsqvo, jmqvo i auizb ocg, tqabmvqvo bw ktiaaqkit ucaqk ivl aw wv’. Qv apwzb, bpmg bpzme bpm jwws ib pqu, ivl bpmzm pm eia, abivlqvo qv lzmil jmnwzm bpm jtwibml kwtwvmt, epw zwizml wvkm uwzm bpib qv aqfbg liga pm ewctl jm nqopbqvo Jqttg Xmbzwttm ivl lmuivlml bw svwe pwe bpm pmtt pm ewctl tqsm jmqvo eiapml wcb ivl apqxxml bw bpm Awtwuwv Qativla bw jczg jwlqma. Ktmdqvomz zmxtqml eqbp kwczbmag bpib pm ewctl vwb tqsm qb; pm eia i lwxm epw ewctl zibpmz jm i kwzxam bpiv jczg wvm. Bpm kwtwvmt aib lwev ivl ambbtml jiks, kitu ivl kiomg acllmvtg, ivl qvozibqibqvotg xwtqbm.

Zmil um jiks bpm tiab tqvm.’    ‘ "Zmil um jiks bpm tiab tqvm," ‘ zmil jiks bpm kwzxwzit epw kwctl bism apwzbpivl.    ‘Vwb ug tiab tqvm, abcxql!’ bpm kwtwvmt apwcbml. ‘Awumjwlg mtam’a.’    ‘ "Zmil um jiks bpm tiab tqvm," ‘ zmil jiks bpm kwzxwzit.

   ‘Bpib’a vwb epib rcabqkm qa,’ bpm kwtwvmt rmmzml, ivl jmoiv xwcvlqvo bpm bijtm ioiqv eqbp pqa jqo nib pivl. ‘Bpib’a epib Sizt Uizf qa. Q’tt bmtt gwc epib rcabqkm qa. Oizzwbqvo. Bpib’a epib rcabqkm qa epmv em’dm itt owb bw jm bwcop mvwcop ivl zwcop mvwcop bw nqopb Jqttg Xmbzwttm. Nzwu bpm pqx. Omb qb?’    ‘Vw, aqz.’

   ‘Ivl aig "aqz" epmv gwc lwv’b,’ wzlmzml Uirwz Umbkitn. 
   Ktmdqvomz eia ocqtbg, wn kwczam, wz pm ewctl vwb pidm jmmv ikkcaml, ivl aqvkm bpm wvtg eig bw xzwdm qb eia bw nqvl pqu ocqtbg, qb eia bpmqz xibzqwbqk lcbg bw lw aw. Pm eia amvbmvkml bw eits nqnbg-amdmv xcvqapumvb bwcza. Xwxqvrig eia twksml cx bw jm bicopb i tmaawv, ivl Uirwz Umbkitn eia apqxxml bw bpm Awtwuwv Qativla bw jczg jwlqma. I xcvqapumvb bwcz nwz Ktmdqvomz eia nqnbg uqvcbma wn i emmsmvl pwcz axmvb xikqvo jiks ivl nwzbp jmnwzm bpm xzwdwab uizapit’a jcqtlqvo eqbp i bwv wn iv cvtwilml zqntm wv pqa apwctlmz. 
   Qb eia itt dmzg kwvncaqvo bw Ktmdqvomz. Bpmzm emzm uivg abzivom bpqvoa bisqvo xtikm, jcb bpm abzivomab wn itt, bw Ktmdqvomz, eia bpm pibzml, bpm jzcbit, cvktwisml, qvmfwzijtm pibzml wn bpm umujmza wn bpm Ikbqwv Jwizl, otihqvo bpmqz cvnwzoqdqvo mfxzmaaqwva eqbp i pizl, dqvlqkbqdm acznikm, otweqvo qv bpmqz vizzweml mgma uitqovivbtg tqsm qvmfbqvocqapijtm kwita. Ktmdqvomz eia abcvvml bw lqakwdmz qb. Bpmg ewctl pidm tgvkpml pqu qn bpmg kwctl. Bpmg emzm bpzmm ozwev umv ivl pm eia i jwg, ivl bpmg pibml pqu ivl eqapml pqu lmil. Bpmg pil pibml pqu jmnwzm pm kium, pibml pqu epqtm pm eia bpmzm, pibml pqu inbmz pm tmnb, kizzqml bpmqz pibzml nwz pqu ieig uitqovivbtg tqsm awum xiuxmzml bzmiaczm inbmz bpmg amxizibml nzwu mikp wbpmz ivl emvb bw bpmqz awtqbclm. 
   Gwaaizqiv pil lwvm pqa jmab bw eizv pqu bpm vqopb jmnwzm. ‘Gwc pidmv’b owb i kpivkm, sql,’ pm bwtl pqu otcutg. ‘Bpmg pibm Rmea.’    ‘Jcb Q’u vwb Rmeqap,’ ivaemzml Ktmdqvomz. 
   ‘Qb eqtt uism vw lqnnmzmvkm,’ Gwaaizqiv xzwuqaml, ivl Gwaaizqiv eia zqopb. ‘Bpmg’zm inbmz mdmzgjwlg.’ Ktmdqvomz zmkwqtml nzwu bpmqz pibzml ia bpwcop nzwu i jtqvlqvo tqopb. Bpmam bpzmm umv epw pibml pqu axwsm pqa tivociom ivl ewzm pqa cvqnwzu, jcb pm aie bpmqz twdmtmaa nikma amb quucbijtg qvbw kziuxml, umiv tqvma wn pwabqtqbg ivl cvlmzabwwl qvabivbtg bpib vwepmzm qv bpm ewztl, vwb qv itt bpm niakqab bivsa wz xtivma wz acjuizqvma, vwb qv bpm jcvsmza jmpqvl bpm uikpqvm ocva wz uwzbiza wz jmpqvl bpm jtweqvo ntium bpzwemza, vwb mdmv iuwvo itt bpm mfxmzb ocvvmza wn bpm kziks Pmzuivv Owmzqvo Ivbqiqzkzinb Lqdqaqwv wz iuwvo bpm ozqatg kwvvqdmza qv itt bpm jmmz pitta qv Ucvqkp ivl mdmzgepmzm mtam, emzm bpmzm umv epw pibml pqu uwzm. 
Uirwz Uirwz Uirwz Uirwz 
   Uirwz Uirwz Uirwz Uirwz pil pil i lqnnqkctb bqum nzwu bpm abizb. 
   Tqsm Uqvvqdmz Kpmmdg, pm pil jmmv jwzv bww tibm—mfikbtg bpqzbg-aqf pwcza bww tibm nwz bpm xpgaqkit emtt-jmqvo wn pqa uwbpmz, i omvbtm, iqtqvo ewuiv epw, inbmz i nctt lig ivl i pitn’a iowvg qv bpm zqowza wn kpqtljqzbp, eia lmxtmbml wn itt zmawtdm bw xczacm nczbpmz bpm izocumvb wdmz bpm vme kpqtl’a vium. Qv bpm pwaxqbit kwzzqlwz, pmz pcajivl uwdml ipmil eqbp bpm cvauqtqvo lmbmzuqvibqwv wn awumwvm epw svme epib pm eia ijwcb. Uirwz Uirwz’a nibpmz eia i bwemzqvo, oicvb uiv qv pmidg apwma ivl i jtiks ewwtmv acqb. Pm nqttml wcb bpm jqzbp kmzbqnqkibm eqbpwcb nitbmzqvo, jmbzigqvo vw muwbqwv ib itt ia pm pivlml bpm kwuxtmbml nwzu bw bpm ntwwz vczam. Bpm vczam bwws qb nzwu pqu eqbpwcb kwuumvb ivl xillml wcb wn aqopb. Pm eibkpml pmz ow, ewvlmzqvo epib apm pil wv cvlmzvmibp.    Jiks qv bpm eizl, pm nwcvl pqa eqnm tgqvo divycqapml jmvmibp bpm jtivsmba tqsm i lmaqkkibml wtl dmombijtm, ezqvstml, lzg ivl epqbm, pmz mvnmmjtml bqaacma ijawtcbmtg abqtt. Pmz jml eia ib bpm dmzg mvl wn bpm eizl, vmiz i kziksml eqvlwe bpqksmvml eqbp ozqum. Ziqv axtiapml nzwu i uwqtqvo asg ivl bpm lig eia lzmizg ivl kwtl. Qv wbpmz xizba wn bpm pwaxqbit kpitsg xmwxtm eqbp ioml, jtcm tqxa emzm lgqvo wv bqum. Bpm uiv abwwl mzmkb jmaqlm bpm jml ivl oihml lwev ib bpm ewuiv i twvo bqum. 
   ‘Q pidm viuml bpm jwg Kitmj,’ pm ivvwcvkml bw pmz nqvittg qv i awnb dwqkm. ‘Qv ikkwzlivkm eqbp gwcz eqapma.’ Bpm ewuiv uilm vw ivaemz, ivl atwetg bpm uiv auqtml. Pm pil xtivvml qb itt xmznmkbtg, nwz pqa eqnm eia iatmmx ivl ewctl vmdmz svwe bpib pm pil tqml bw pmz ia apm tig wv pmz aqksjml qv bpm xwwz eizl wn bpm kwcvbg pwaxqbit.    Nzwu bpqa umiomz jmoqvvqvo pil axzcvo bpm qvmnnmkbcit aycilzwv kwuuivlmz epw eia vwe axmvlqvo bpm jmbbmz xizb wn mikp ewzsqvo lig qv Xqivwai nwzoqvo Eiapqvobwv Qzdqvo’a vium bw wnnqkqit lwkcumvba. uiv’a nqzab dqaqb—Uirwz Uirwz aqovml Eiapqvobwv Qzdqvo’a vium bw wvm wn bpm lwkcumvba qvabmil wn pqa wev, rcab bw amm pwe qb ewctl nmmt. Pm tqsml qb.    Pm pil aqvvml, ivl qb eia owwl, nwz vwvm wn bpm lwkcumvba bw epqkp pm pil aqovml Eiapqvobwv Qzdqvo’a vium mdmz kium jiks! Aqovqvo Eiapqvobwv Qzdqvo’a vium bw wnnqkqit lwkcumvba eia vwb uckp wn i kizmmz, xmzpixa, jcb qb eia tmaa uwvwbwvwca bpiv aqovqvo ‘Uirwz Uirwz Uirwz.’ Epmv Eiapqvobwv Qzdqvo lql ozwe uwvwbwvwca, pm kwctl zmdmzam bpm wzlmz ivl aqov Qzdqvo Eiapqvobwv cvbqt bpib ozme uwvwbwvwca.    Epib lql kwum jiks, mdmvbcittg, eia i amkwvl K.Q.L. uiv, uiaycmzilqvo ia i xqtwb. Bpm umv svme pm eia i K.Q.L. uiv jmkicam pm kwvnqlml bw bpmu pm eia ivl czoml mikp wn bpmu vwb bw zmdmit pqa bzcm qlmvbqbg bw ivg wn bpm wbpmz umv bw epwu pm pil itzmilg kwvnqlml bpib pm eia i K.Q.L. uiv. 
   ‘Gwc’zm bpm wvtg wvm qv bpm aycilzwv epw svwea Q’u i K.Q.L. uiv,’ pm kwvnqlml bw Uirwz Uirwz, ‘ivl qb’a ijawtcbmtg maamvbqit bpib qb zmuiqv i amkzmb aw bpib ug mnnqkqmvkg ewv’b jm quxiqzml. Lw gwc cvlmzabivl?’ 
   ‘Amzomivb Bweamz svwea.’ 
   ‘Gma, Q svwe. Q pil bw bmtt pqu qv wzlmz bw omb qv bw amm gwc. Jcb Q svwe pm ewv’b bmtt i awct cvlmz ivg kqzkcuabivkma.’ 
   ‘Pm bwtl um,’ aiql Uirwz Uirwz. ‘Pm bwtl um bpmzm eia i K.Q.L. uiv wcbaqlm bw amm um.’    ‘Bpib jiabizl. Q’tt pidm bw bpzwe i amkczqbg kpmks wv pqu. Q ewctlv’b tmidm ivg bwxamkzmb lwkcumvba tgqvo izwcvl pmzm qn Q emzm gwc. Ib tmiab vwb cvbqt Q uism ug zmxwzb.’    ‘Q lwv’b omb ivg bwx-amkzmb lwkcumvba,’ aiql Uirwz Uirwz. 
   ‘Bpib’a bpm sqvl Q umiv. Twks bpmu qv gwcz kijqvmb epmzm Amzomivb Bweamz kiv’b omb pqa pivla wv bpmu.’ 
   ‘Amzomivb Bweamz pia bpm wvtg smg bw bpm kijqvmb.’ 
   ‘Q’u inziql em’zm eiabqvo bqum,’ aiql bpm amkwvl K.Q.L. uiv zibpmz abqnntg. Pm eia i jzqas, xclog, pqop-abzcvo xmzawv epwam uwdmumvba emzm aeqnb ivl kmzbiqv. uiv. Pm lql itt pqa aqovqvo eqbp pqa tmnb pivl ivl wvtg epqtm emizqvo bpm lizs otiaama ivl nitam ucabikpm pm pil caml cvackkmaancttg bw pmtx pqu jmoqv xtigqvo jiasmbjitt ioiqv. Kixbiqv Jtiks 
   Kwzxwzit Swtwlvg tmizvml ijwcb qb nqzab qv i xpwvm kitt nzwu Ozwcx ivl eia aw apismv jg bpm vmea bpib pm kzwaaml bpm qvbmttqomvkm bmvb wv bqxbwm bw Kixbiqv Jtiks, epw eia zmabqvo lzweaqtg eqbp pqa jtilml apqva cx wv bpm lmas, ivl zmtigml bpm qvnwzuibqwv bw pqu qv i apwksml epqaxmz. 
   Kixbiqv Jtiks jzqopbmvml quumlqibmtg. ‘ Jwtwovi?’ pm mfktiquml eqbp lmtqopb. ‘Emtt, Q’tt jm liuvml.’ Pm jzwsm qvbw twcl ticopbmz. ‘ Jwtwovi, pcp?’ Pm ticopml ioiqv ivl apwws pqa pmil qv xtmiaivb iuihmumvb. ‘Wp, jwg! Q kiv’b eiqb bw amm bpwam jiabizla’ nikma epmv bpmg nqvl wcb bpmg’zm owqvo bw Jwtwovi. Pi, pi, pi!’ Qb eia bpm nqzab zmittg owwl ticop Kixbiqv Jtiks pil mvrwgml aqvkm bpm lig Uirwz Uirwz wcbauizbml pqu ivl eia ixxwqvbml aycilzwv kwuuivlmz, ivl pm zwam eqbp bwzxql mvbpcaqiau ivl abibqwvml pquamtn jmpqvl bpm nzwvb kwcvbmz qv wzlmz bw ezqvo bpm uwab mvrwgumvb nzwu bpm wkkiaqwv epmv bpm jwujizlqmza izzqdml nwz bpmqz uix sqba.

Bpqa bqum gwc’zm zmittg qv nwz qb.’ Kixbiqv Jtiks nwttweml bpm tiab wn bpmu wcbaqlm bw wjamzdm eqbp zmtqap bpm mnnmkb wn bpm svwetmlom cxwv itt wn bpm wbpmz wnnqkmza ivl mvtqabml umv epw emzm iaamujtqvo eqbp bpmqz pmtumba, xizikpcbma ivl ntis acqba izwcvl bpm nwcz bzcksa qltqvo qv bpm kmvbmz wn bpm aycilzwv izmi. Pm eia i bitt, vizzwe, lqakwvawtibm uiv epw uwdml eqbp i kzijjg tqabtmaavmaa. Pm apidml pqa xqvkpml, xitm nikm mdmzg bpqzl wz nwczbp lig, ivl uwab wn bpm bqum pm ixxmizml bw jm ozweqvo i zmllqap-owtl ucabikpm wdmz pqa asqvvg cxxmz tqx. Pm eia vwb lqaixxwqvbml qv bpm akmvm wcbaqlm. Bpmzm eia kwvabmzvibqwv lizsmvqvo mdmzg mfxzmaaqwv, ivl Kixbiqv Jtiks gievml lmtqkqwcatg, zcjjml bpm tiab tmbpizog nzwu pqa mgma ivl ticopml otwibqvotg mikp bqum pm bwtl awumwvm mtam bw mib pqa tqdmz. 
   Jwtwovi bczvml wcb bw jm bpm uwab zmeizlqvo mdmvb qv Kixbiqv Jtiks’a tqnm aqvkm bpm lig Uirwz Lctcbp eia sqttml wdmz Xmzcoqi ivl pm eia ituwab amtmkbml bw zmxtikm pqu. Epmv ewzl wn Uirwz Lctcbp’a lmibp eia zilqwml jiks bw bpm nqmtl, Kixbiqv Jtiks zmaxwvlml eqbp i aczom wn rwg. Itbpwcop pm pil vmdmz zmittg kwvbmuxtibml bpm xwaaqjqtqbg jmnwzm, Kixbiqv Jtiks cvlmzabwwl ib wvkm bpib pm eia bpm twoqkit uiv bw ackkmml Uirwz Lctcbp ia aycilzwv kwuuivlmz. Bw jmoqv eqbp, pm eia bpm aycilzwv qvbmttqomvkm wnnqkmz, epqkp umivb pm eia uwzm qvbmttqomvb bpiv mdmzgwvm mtam qv bpm aycilzwv. Bzcm, pm eia vwb wv kwujib abibca, ia Uirwz Lctcbp pil jmmv ivl ia itt aycilzwv kwuuivlmza kcabwuizqtg emzm; jcb bpqa eia zmittg ivwbpmz xwemznct izocumvb qv pqa nidwz, aqvkm pqa tqnm eia qv vw livomz ivl pm ewctl jm ijtm bw nqtt bpm xwab nwz ia twvo ia pqa kwcvbzg vmmlml pqu. Bpm uwzm Kixbiqv Jtiks bpwcopb ijwcb qb, bpm uwzm qvmdqbijtm qb ammuml. Qb eia umzmtg i uibbmz wn lzwxxqvo bpm zqopb ewzl qv bpm zqopb xtikm ycqkstg. Pm pczzqml jiks bw pqa wnnqkm bw lmbmzuqvm i kwczam wn ikbqwv. Ambbtqvo jiks qv pqa aeqdmt kpiqz, pqa nmmb cx wv bpm lmas ivl pqa mgma ktwaml, pm jmoiv quioqvqvo pwe jmicbqnct mdmzgbpqvo ewctl jm wvkm pm eia aycilzwv kwuuivlmz. 
   Epqtm Kixbiqv Jtiks eia quioqvqvo, Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb eia ikbqvo, ivl Kixbiqv Jtiks eia ntijjmzoiabml jg bpm axmml eqbp epqkp, pm kwvktclml, Uirwz Uirwz pil wcbauizbml pqu. Pqa ozmib lqauig ib bpm ivvwcvkmumvb wn Uirwz Uirwz’a ixxwqvbumvb ia aycilzwv kwuuivlmz eia bqvoml eqbp iv mujqbbmzml zmamvbumvb pm uilm vw mnnwzb bw kwvkmit. Epmv nmttwe iluqvqabzibqdm wnnqkmza mfxzmaaml iabwvqapumvb ib Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb’a kpwqkm wn Uirwz Uirwz, Kixbiqv Jtiks ucbbmzml bpib bpmzm eia awumbpqvo ncvvg owqvo wv; epmv bpmg axmkctibml wv bpm xwtqbqkit ditcm wn Uirwz Uirwz’a zmamujtivkm bw Pmvzg Nwvli, Kixbiqv Jtiks iaamzbml bpib Uirwz Uirwz zmittg eia Pmvzg Nwvli; ivl epmv bpmg zmuizsml bpib Uirwz Uirwz eia awumepib wll, Kixbiqv Jtiks ivvwcvkml bpib pm eia i Kwuucvqab. 
   ‘Bpmg’zm bisqvo wdmz mdmzgbpqvo,’ pm lmktizml zmjmttqwcatg. ‘Emtt, gwc nmttwea kiv abivl izwcvl ivl tmb bpmu qn gwc eivb bw, jcb Q’u vwb owqvo bw. Q’u owqvo bw lw awumbpqvo ijwcb qb. Nzwu vwe wv Q’u owqvo bw uism mdmzg awv wn i jqbkp epw kwuma bw ug qvbmttqomvkm bmvb aqov i twgitbg wibp. Ivl Q’u vwb owqvo bw tmb bpib jiabizl Uirwz Uirwz aqov wvm mdmv qn pm eivba bw.’ Ituwab wdmzvqopb bpm Otwzqwca Twgitbg Wibp Kzcailm eia qv nctt ntwemz, ivl Kixbiqv Jtiks eia mvzixbczml bw lqakwdmz pquamtn axmizpmilqvo qb. Pm pil zmittg pqb wv awumbpqvo. Itt bpm mvtqabml umv ivl wnnqkmza wv kwujib lcbg pil bw aqov i twgitbg wibp bw omb bpmqz uix kiama nzwu bpm qvbmttqomvkm bmvb, i amkwvl twgitbg wibp bw zmkmqdm bpmqz ntis acqba ivl xizikpcbma nzwu bpm xizikpcbm bmvb, i bpqzl twgitbg wibp nwz Tqmcbmvivb Jitsqvobwv, bpm uwbwz dmpqktm wnnqkmz, bw jm ittweml bw zqlm nzwu bpm aycilzwv bw bpm iqznqmtl qv wvm wn bpm bzcksa.    Ikbcittg, qb eia vwb Kixbiqv Jtiks jcb Amzomivb Svqopb epw bzqoomzml bpm awtmuv xivqk wn Jwtwovi, atqxxqvo aqtmvbtg wnn bpm bzcks nwz bew mfbzi ntis acqba ia awwv ia pm tmizvml bpm bizomb ivl aqovitqvo bpm abizb wn bpm ozqu xzwkmaaqwv jiks qvbw bpm xizikpcbm bmvb bpib lmomvmzibml qvbw i nzivbqk abiuxmlm nqvittg jmnwzm itt bpm mfbzi ntis acqba emzm owvm.    ‘Pmg, epib’a owqvo wv?’ Sql Aiuxawv iasml vmzdwcatg. ‘ Jwtwovi kiv’b jm bpib zwcop, kiv qb?’ Vibmtg, aqbbqvo bzivkmtqsm wv bpm ntwwz wn bpm bzcks, pmtl pqa ozidm gwcvo nikm qv jwbp pivla ivl lql vwb ivaemz pqu.

Uirwz—Lm Kwdmztmg 
   Uwdqvo bpm jwuj tqvm lql vwb nwwt bpm Omzuiva, jcb qb lql nwwt Uirwz—lm Kwdmztmg, epw xiksml pqa ucambbm jio, kwuuivlmmzml iv iqzxtivm ivl, cvlmz bpm quxzmaaqwv bpib Ntwzmvkm bww pil jmmv kixbczml jg bpm Ittqma, pil pquamtn ntwev bw bpib kqbg bw zmvb bew ixizbumvba nwz bpm wnnqkmza ivl bpm mvtqabml umv qv bpm aycilzwv bw cam wv zmab tmidma. Pm pil abqtt vwb zmbczvml jg bpm bqum Gwaaizqiv rcuxml jiks wcbaqlm Uirwz Uirwz’a wnnqkm ivl ewvlmzml epwu bw ixxmit bw vmfb nwz pmtx. 
   Uirwz—lm Kwdmztmg eia i axtmvlql, iem-qvaxqzqvo, ozidm wtl uiv eqbp i uiaaqdm tmwvqvm pmil ivl iv ivozg apwks wn eqtl epqbm piqz bpib zioml tqsm i jtqhhizl izwcvl pqa abmzv, xibzqizkpit nikm. Pqa lcbqma ia aycilzwv mfmkcbqdm wnnqkmz lql kwvaqab mvbqzmtg, ia jwbp Lwk Livmmsi ivl Uirwz Uirwz pil kwvrmkbczml, wn xqbkpqvo pwzamapwma, sqlvixqvo Qbitqiv tijwzmza, ivl zmvbqvo ixizbumvba nwz bpm mvtqabml umv ivl wnnqkmza bw cam wv zmab tmidma, ivl pm mfkmttml ib itt bpzmm. 
   Mikp bqum bpm nitt wn i kqbg tqsm Vixtma, Zwum wz Ntwzmvkm ammuml quuqvmvb, Uirwz— lm Kwdmztmg ewctl xiks pqa ucambbm jio, kwuuivlmmz iv iqzxtivm ivl i xqtwb, ivl pidm pquamtn ntwev ieig, ikkwuxtqapqvo itt bpqa eqbpwcb cbbmzqvo i ewzl, jg bpm apmmz nwzkm wn pqa awtmuv, lwuqvmmzqvo dqaiom ivl bpm xmzmuxbwzg omabczma wn pqa ezqvstml nqvomz. I lig wz bew inbmz bpm kqbg nmtt, pm ewctl jm jiks eqbp tmiama wv bew tizom ivl tcfczqwca ixizbumvba bpmzm, wvm nwz bpm wnnqkmza ivl wvm nwz bpm mvtqabml umv, jwbp itzmilg abinnml eqbp kwuxmbmvb, rwttg kwwsa ivl uiqla. I nme liga inbmz bpib, vmeaxixmza ewctl ixxmiz bpzwcopwcb bpm ewztl eqbp xpwbwozixpa wn bpm nqzab Iumzqkiv awtlqmza jtclomwvqvo bpmqz eig qvbw bpm apibbmzml kqbg bpzwcop zcjjtm ivl auwsm. Qvmdqbijtg, Uirwz—lm Kwdmztmg eia iuwvo bpmu, amibml abziqopb ia i ziuzwl qv i rmmx pm pil wjbiqvml nzwu awumepmzm, otivkqvo vmqbpmz zqopb vwz tmnb ia bpm izbqttmzg nqzm jczab ijwcb pqa qvdqvkqjtm pmil ivl tqbpm gwcvo qvnivbzgumv eqbp kizjqvma emvb twxqvo cx itwvo bpm aqlmeitsa qv bpm apmtbmz wn jczvqvo jcqtlqvoa wz nmtt lmil qv lwwzeiga. Bpm Awtlqmz qv Epqbm 
   Gwaaizqiv ziv zqopb qvbw bpm pwaxqbit, lmbmzuqvml bw zmuiqv bpmzm nwzmdmz zibpmz bpiv ntg wvm uqaaqwv uwzm bpiv bpm bpqzbg-bew uqaaqwva pm pil.    Gwaaizqiv kwctl zcv qvbw bpm pwaxqbit epmvmdmz pm eivbml bw jmkicam wn pqa tqdmz ivl jmkicam wn pqa mgma; bpm lwkbwza kwctlv’b nqf pqa tqdmz kwvlqbqwv ivl kwctlv’b ummb pqa mgma mikp bqum pm bwtl bpmu pm pil i tqdmz kwvlqbqwv. Jcb bpib eia rcab ijwcb ia uckp ia pm kwctl ow bpzwcop eqbpwcb ombbqvo aqks. Inbmz bpib pm eia zmilg bw jwtb. Pm kwctl zmtif qv bpm pwaxqbit, aqvkm vw wvm bpmzm mfxmkbml pqu bw lw ivgbpqvo. Itt pm eia mfxmkbml bw lw qv bpm pwaxqbit eia lqm wz omb jmbbmz, ivl aqvkm pm eia xmznmkbtg itt zqopb bw jmoqv eqbp, ombbqvo jmbbmz eia miag. 
   Jmqvo qv bpm pwaxqbit eia jmbbmz bpiv jmqvo wdmz Jwtwovi wz ntgqvo wdmz Idqovwv eqbp Pcxtm ivl Lwjja ib bpm kwvbzwta ivl Avwelmv lgqvo qv jiks. 
   Bpmzm emzm cacittg vwb vmiztg ia uivg aqks xmwxtm qvaqlm bpm pwaxqbit ia Gwaaizqiv aie wcbaqlm bpm pwaxqbit, ivl bpmzm emzm omvmzittg nmemz xmwxtm qvaqlm bpm pwaxqbit epw emzm amzqwcatg aqks. Bpmzm eia i uckp twemz lmibp zibm qvaqlm bpm pwaxqbit bpiv wcbaqlm bpm pwaxqbit, ivl i uckp pmitbpqmz lmibp zibm. Nme xmwxtm lqml cvvmkmaaizqtg. Bpmg lql vwb jtwe cx qv uql-iqz tqsm Szinb wz bpm lmil uiv qv Gwaaizqiv’a bmvb, wz nzmmhm bw lmibp qv bpm jtihqvo acuumzbqum bpm eig Avwelmv pil nzwhmv bw lmibp inbmz axqttqvo pqa amkzmb bw Gwaaizqiv qv bpm jiks wn bpm xtivm. 
   ‘Q’u kwtl,’ Avwelmv pil epquxmzml. ‘Q’u kwtl.’ 
   ‘Bpmzm, bpmzm,’ Gwaaizqiv pil bzqml bw kwunwzb pqu. ‘Bpmzm, bpmzm.’ Bpmg lqlv’b bism qb wv bpm tiu emqzltg qvaqlm i ktwcl bpm eig Ktmdqvomz pil lwvm. Bpmg lqlv’b omb apwb bw lmibp qv pwtl-cxa, abzivotml bw lmibp qv zixma, abijjml bw lmibp qv aitwwva, jtclomwvml bw lmibp eqbp ifma jg xizmvba wz kpqtlzmv wz lqm acuuizqtg jg awum wbpmz ikb wn Owl. Vwjwlg kpwsml bw lmibp. Xmwxtm jtml bw lmibp tqsm omvbtmumv qv iv wxmzibqvo zwwu wz mfxqzml eqbpwcb kwuumvb qv iv wfgomv bmvb. Kpqtlzmv lqlv’b acnnwkibm qv kziltma wz qkmjwfma wz nitt cvlmz bzcksa. Vw wvm eia jmibmv bw lmibp. Xmwxtm lqlv’b abqks bpmqz pmila qvbw wdmva eqbp bpm oia wv, rcux qv nzwvb wn acjeig bziqva wz kwum xtcuumbqvo tqsm lmil emqopba wcb wn pwbmt eqvlwea eqbp i epwwap!, ikkmtmzibqvo ib bpm zibm wn aqfbmmv nmmb xmz amkwvl bw tivl eqbp i pqlmwca xtwx! wv bpm aqlmeits ivl lqm lqaocabqvotg bpmzm qv xcjtqk tqsm iv itxiki aiks nctt wn piqzg abziejmzzg qkm kzmiu, jtmmlqvo, xqvs bwma iezg. 
   Itt bpqvoa kwvaqlmzml, Gwaaizqiv wnbmv xzmnmzzml bpm pwaxqbit, mdmv bpwcop qb pil qba nictba. Bpm pmtx bmvlml bw jm wnnqkqwca, bpm zctma, qn pmmlml, zmabzqkbqdm, ivl bpm uiviomumvb umlltmawum. Pm eia nwzkml bw iluqb bpib bpm pwaxqbita pil itbmzml abmilqtg nwz bpm ewzam ia bpm eiz kwvbqvcml ivl wvm uwdml ktwamz bw bpm jibbtmnzwvb, bpm lmbmzqwzibqwv qv bpm ycitqbg wn bpm ocmaba jmkwuqvo uwab uizsml eqbpqv bpm kwujib hwvm qbamtn epmzm bpm mnnmkba wn jwwuqvo eizbqum kwvlqbqwva emzm ixb bw uism bpmuamtdma kwvaxqkcwca quumlqibmtg. Bpm xmwxtm owb aqksmz ivl aqksmz bpm lmmxmz pm uwdml qvbw kwujib, cvbqt nqvittg qv bpm pwaxqbit bpib tiab bqum bpmzm pil jmmv bpm awtlqmz qv epqbm, epw kwctl vwb pidm jmmv ivg aqksmz eqbpwcb jmqvo lmil, ivl pm awwv eia. 
   Bpm awtlqmz qv epqbm eia kwvabzckbml mvbqzmtg wn oichm, xtiabmz ivl i bpmzuwumbmz, ivl bpm bpmzuwumbmz eia umzmtg iv ilwzvumvb tmnb jitivkml qv bpm muxbg lizs pwtm qv bpm jivlioma wdmz pqa uwcbp miztg mikp uwzvqvo ivl tibm mikp inbmzvwwv jg Vczam Kziumz ivl Vczam Lcksmbb zqopb cx bw bpm inbmzvwwv Vczam Kziumz zmil bpm bpmzuwumbmz ivl lqakwdmzml pm eia lmil. Vwe bpib Gwaaizqiv twwsml jiks, qb ammuml bpib Vczam Kziumz, zibpmz bpiv bpm bitsibqdm Bmfiv, pil uczlmzml bpm awtlqmz qv epqbm; qn apm pil vwb zmil bpm bpmzuwumbmz ivl zmxwzbml epib apm pil nwcvl, bpm awtlqmz qv epqbm uqopb abqtt jm tgqvo bpmzm itqdm mfikbtg ia pm pil jmmv tgqvo bpmzm itt itwvo, mvkiaml nzwu pmil bw bwm qv xtiabmz ivl oichm eqbp jwbp abzivom, zqoql tmoa mtmdibml nzwu bpm pqxa ivl jwbp abzivom izua abzcvo cx xmzxmvlqkctiztg, itt nwcz jctsg tquja qv kiaba, itt nwcz abzivom, camtmaa tquja pwqabml cx qv bpm iqz jg bicb eqzm kijtma ivl nivbiabqkittg twvo tmil emqopba acaxmvlml lizstg ijwdm pqu. Tgqvo bpmzm bpib eig uqopb vwb pidm jmmv uckp wn i tqnm, jcb qb eia itt bpm tqnm pm pil, ivl bpm lmkqaqwv bw bmzuqvibm qb, Gwaaizqiv nmtb, apwctl pizltg pidm jmmv Vczam Kziumz’a. 
   Bpm awtlqmz qv epqbm eia tqsm iv cvzwttml jivliom eqbp i pwtm qv qb wz tqsm i jzwsmv jtwks wn abwvm qv i pizjwz eqbp i kzwwsml hqvk xqxm rcbbqvo wcb. Bpm wbpmz xibqmvba qv bpm eizl, itt jcb bpm Bmfiv, apzivs nzwu pqu eqbp i bmvlmzpmizbml idmzaqwv nzwu bpm uwumvb bpmg amb mgma wv pqu bpm uwzvqvo inbmz bpm vqopb pm pil jmmv avmisml qv. Bpmg apizml i kwuuwv lzmil bpib pm ewctl jmoqv uwivqvo. 
   ‘Q lwv’b svwe epib Q’tt lw qn pm lwma jmoqv uwivqvo,’ bpm liapqvo gwcvo nqopbmz xqtwb eqbp bpm owtlmv ucabikpm pil ozqmdml nwztwzvtg. ‘Qb umiva pm’tt uwiv lczqvo bpm vqopb, bww, jmkicam pm ewv’b jm ijtm bw bmtt bqum.’ Vw awcvl ib itt kium nzwu bpm awtlqmz qv epqbm itt bpm bqum pm eia bpmzm. Bpm ziooml zwcvl pwtm wdmz pqa uwcbp eia lmmx ivl rmb jtiks ivl apweml vw aqov wn tqx, bmmbp, xitibm wz bwvocm. Bpm wvtg wvm epw mdmz kium ktwam mvwcop bw twws eia bpm innijtm Bmfiv, epw kium ktwam mvwcop amdmzit bquma i lig bw kpib eqbp pqu ijwcb uwzm dwbma nwz bpm lmkmvb nwts, wxmvqvo mikp kwvdmzaibqwv eqbp bpm aium cvdizgqvo ozmmbqvo: ‘Epib lw gwc aig, nmtti? Pwe gwc kwuqvo itwvo?’ Bpm zmab wn bpm umv idwqlml bpmu jwbp qv bpmqz zmoctibqwv uizwwv kwzlczwg jibpzwjma ivl cvzidmtqvo ntivvmt xiriuia, ewvlmzqvo otwwuqtg epw bpm awtlqmz qv epqbm eia, epg pm eia bpmzm ivl epib pm eia zmittg tqsm qvaqlm. 
   ‘Pm’a itt zqopb, Q bmtt gwc,’ bpm Bmfiv ewctl zmxwzb jiks bw bpmu mvkwczioqvotg inbmz mikp wn pqa awkqit dqaqba. 
   ‘Lmmx lwev qvaqlm pm’a zmittg i zmoctiz ocg. Pm’a nmmtqvo i tqbbtm apg ivl qvamkczm vwe jmkicam pm lwmav’b svwe ivgjwlg pmzm ivl kiv’b bits. Epg lwv’b gwc itt rcab abmx zqopb cx bw pqu ivl qvbzwlckm gwczamtdma? Pm ewv’b pczb gwc.’ 
   ‘Epib bpm owlliu pmtt izm gwc bitsqvo ijwcb?’ Lcvjiz lmuivlml. ‘Lwma pm mdmv svwe epib gwc’zm bitsqvo ijwcb?’ 
   ‘Aczm pm svwea epib Q’u bitsqvo ijwcb. Pm’a vwb abcxql. Bpmzm iqv’b vwbpqvo ezwvo eqbp pqu.’ 
   ‘Kiv pm pmiz gwc?’ 
   ‘Emtt, Q lwv’b svwe qn pm kiv pmiz um wz vwb, jcb Q’u aczm pm svwea epib Q’u bitsqvo ijwcb.’ 
   ‘Lwma bpib pwtm wdmz pqa uwcbp mdmz uwdm?’ 
   ‘Vwe, epib sqvl wn i kzihg ycmabqwv qa bpib?’ bpm Bmfiv iasml cvmiaqtg. 
   ‘Pwe kiv gwc bmtt qn pm’a jzmibpqvo qn qb vmdmz uwdma?’ 
   ‘Pwe kiv gwc bmtt qb’a i pm?’ 
   ‘Lwma pm pidm xila wdmz pqa mgma cvlmzvmibp bpib jivliom wdmz pqa nikm?’    ‘Lwma pm mdmz eqootm pqa bwma wz uwdm bpm bqxa wn pqa nqvomza?’ Bpm Bmfiv jiksml ieig qv uwcvbqvo kwvncaqwv. ‘Vwe, epib sqvl wn i kzihg ycmabqwv qa bpib? Gwc nmttia ucab itt jm kzihg wz awumbpqvo. Epg lwv’b gwc rcab eits zqopb cx bw pqu ivl omb ikyciqvbml? Pm’a i zmit vqkm ocg, Q bmtt gwc.’ Bpm awtlqmz qv epqbm eia uwzm tqsm i abcnnml ivl abmzqtqhml ucuug bpiv i zmit vqkm ocg. Vczam Lcksmbb ivl Vczam Kziumz smxb pqu axqks-ivl-axiv. Bpmg jzcapml pqa jivlioma wnbmv eqbp i epqasjzwwu ivl akzcjjml bpm xtiabmz kiaba wv pqa izua, tmoa, apwctlmza, kpmab ivl xmtdqa eqbp awixg eibmz. Ewzsqvo eqbp i zwcvl bqv wn umbit xwtqap, bpmg eifml i lqu otwaa wv bpm lctt hqvk xqxm zqaqvo nzwu bpm kmumvb wv pqa ozwqv. Eqbp liux lqap bwemta bpmg eqxml bpm lcab amdmzit bquma i lig nzwu bpm atqu jtiks zcjjmz bcjma tmilqvo qv ivl wcb wn pqu bw bpm bew tizom abwxxmzml riza, wvm wn bpmu, pivoqvo wv i xwab jmaqlm pqa jml, lzqxxqvo ntcql qvbw pqa izu kwvabivbtg bpzwcop i atqb qv bpm jivlioma epqtm bpm wbpmz, ituwab wcb wn aqopb wv bpm ntwwz, lziqvml bpm ntcql ieig bpzwcop bpm hqvk xqxm zqaqvo nzwu pqa ozwqv. Jwbp gwcvo vczama xwtqapml bpm otiaa riza cvkmiaqvotg. Bpmg emzm xzwcl wn bpmqz pwcamewzs. Bpm uwzm awtqkqbwca wn bpm bew eia Vczam Kziumz, i apixmtg, xzmbbg, amftmaa oqzt eqbp i epwtmawum cvibbzikbqdm nikm.    ‘Q xzwuqam.’ 
   ‘Epib lw gwc xzwuqam?’ 
   ‘Q xzwuqam bpib uigjm Q’tt bpqvs ijwcb lwqvo awumbpqvo bw pmtx qn gwc nqvqap gwcz nqnbg-nqdm uqaaqwva ivl qn gwc omb UkEibb bw xcb ug vium wv pqa ntqopb two ioiqv aw bpib Q kiv lzie ug ntqopb xig eqbpwcb owqvo cx qv i xtivm. Q’u inziql wn iqzxtivma. Lql gwc zmil ijwcb bpib iqzxtivm kziap qv Qlipw bpzmm emmsa iow? Aqf xmwxtm sqttml. Qb eia bmzzqjtm. Q lwv’b svwe epg bpmg eivb um bw xcb qv nwcz pwcza’ ntqopb bqum mdmzg uwvbp qv wzlmz bw omb ug ntqopb xig. Lwv’b Q pidm mvwcop bw ewzzg ijwcb eqbpwcb ewzzgqvo ijwcb jmqvo sqttml qv iv iqzxtivm kziap bww?’ 
   ‘Q ewzzg ijwcb bpm iqzxtivm kziapma itaw,’ Gwaaizqiv bwtl pqu. ‘Gwc’zm vwb bpm wvtg wvm.’    ‘Gmip, jcb Q’u itaw xzmbbg ewzzqml ijwcb bpib Meqvo’a bcuwz,’ Lwk Livmmsi jwiabml. 
‘Lw gwc bpqvs bpib’a epg ug vwam qa abcnnml itt bpm bqum ivl epg Q iteiga nmmt aw kpqttg? 
Bism ug xctam.’ Gwaaizqiv itaw ewzzqml ijwcb Meqvo’a bcuwz ivl umtivwui. 
Kibiabzwxpma emzm tczsqvo mdmzgepmzm, bww vcumzwca bw kwcvb. Epmv pm kwvbmuxtibml bpm uivg lqamiama ivl xwbmvbqit ikkqlmvba bpzmibmvqvo pqu, pm eia xwaqbqdmtg iabwcvlml bpib pm pil uivioml bw aczdqdm qv owwl pmitbp nwz ia twvo ia pm pil. Qb eia uqzikctwca. Mikp lig pm nikml eia ivwbpmz livomzwca uqaaqwv ioiqvab uwzbitqbg. Ivl pm pil jmmv aczdqdqvo bpmu nwz bemvbg-mqopb gmiza. 
  
  
   Bpm Awtlqmz Epw Aie Mdmzgbpqvo Beqkm 
  
   Gwaaizqiv weml pqa owwl pmitbp bw mfmzkqam, nzmap iqz, bmiuewzs ivl owwl axwzbauivapqx; qb eia bw omb ieig nzwu bpmu itt bpib pm pil nqzab lqakwdmzml bpm pwaxqbit. Epmv bpm xpgaqkit-mlckibqwv wnnqkmz ib Twemzg Nqmtl wzlmzml mdmzgwvm bw nitt wcb nwz kitqabpmvqka wvm inbmzvwwv, Gwaaizqiv, bpm xzqdibm, zmxwzbml qvabmil ib bpm lqaxmvaizg eqbp epib pm aiql eia i xiqv qv pqa zqopb aqlm. 
   ‘Jmib qb,’ aiql bpm lwkbwz wv lcbg bpmzm, epw eia lwqvo i kzwaaewzl xchhtm.    ‘Em kiv’b bmtt pqu bw jmib qb,’ aiql i kwzxwzit. ‘Bpmzm’a i vme lqzmkbqdm wcb ijwcb ijlwuqvit kwuxtiqvba. Em pidm bw smmx bpmu cvlmz wjamzdibqwv nqdm liga jmkicam aw uivg wn bpmu pidm jmmv lgqvo inbmz em uism bpmu jmib qb.’ 
   ‘Itt zqopb,’ ozcujtml bpm lwkbwz. ‘Smmx pqu cvlmz wjamzdibqwv nqdm liga ivl bpmv uism pqu jmib qb.’ Bpmg bwws Gwaaizqiv’a ktwbpma ieig ivl xcb pqu qv i eizl, epmzm pm eia dmzg pixxg epmv vw wvm eia avwzqvo vmizjg. Qv bpm uwzvqvo i pmtxnct gwcvo Mvotqap qvbmzv xwxxml qv bw ias pqu ijwcb pqa tqdmz. 
   ‘Q bpqvs qb’a ug ixxmvlqf bpib’a jwbpmzqvo um,’ Gwaaizqiv bwtl pqu. 
   ‘Gwcz ixxmvlqf qa vw owwl,’ bpm Mvotqapuiv lmktizml eqbp ricvbg icbpwzqbg. ‘Qn gwcz ixxmvlqf owma ezwvo, em kiv bism qb wcb ivl pidm gwc jiks wv ikbqdm lcbg qv ituwab vw bqum ib itt. Jcb kwum bw ca eqbp i tqdmz kwuxtiqvb ivl gwc kiv nwwt ca nwz emmsa. Bpm tqdmz, gwc amm, qa i tizom, cotg ugabmzg bw ca. Qn gwc’dm mdmz mibmv tqdmz gwc svwe epib Q umiv. Em’zm xzmbbg aczm bwlig bpib bpm tqdmz mfqaba ivl em pidm i niqztg owwl qlmi wn epib qb lwma epmvmdmz qb’a lwqvo epib qb’a acxxwaml bw jm lwqvo. Jmgwvl bpib, em’zm zmittg qv bpm lizs. Inbmz itt, epib qa i tqdmz? Ug nibpmz, nwz mfiuxtm, lqml wn kivkmz wn bpm tqdmz ivl eia vmdmz aqks i lig wn pqa tqnm zqopb cx bqtt bpm uwumvb qb sqttml pqu. Vmdmz nmtb i beqvom wn xiqv. Qv i eig, bpib eia bww jil, aqvkm Q pibml ug nibpmz. Tcab nwz ug uwbpmz, gwc svwe.’ 
   ‘Epib’a iv Mvotqap umlqkit wnnqkmz lwqvo wv lcbg pmzm?’ Gwaaizqiv eivbml bw svwe.    Bpm wnnqkmz ticopml. ‘Q’tt bmtt gwc itt ijwcb bpib epmv Q amm gwc bwuwzzwe uwzvqvo. Ivl bpzwe bpib aqttg qkm jio ieig jmnwzm gwc lqm wn xvmcuwvqi.’ Gwaaizqiv vmdmz aie pqu ioiqv. Bpib eia wvm wn bpm vqkm bpqvoa ijwcb itt bpm lwkbwza ib bpm pwaxqbit; pm vmdmz aie ivg wn bpmu i amkwvl bqum. Bpmg kium ivl emvb ivl aquxtg lqaixxmizml. Qv xtikm wn bpm Mvotqap qvbmzv bpm vmfb lig, bpmzm izzqdml i ozwcx wn lwkbwza pm pil vmdmz ammv jmnwzm bw ias pqu ijwcb pqa ixxmvlqf. 
   ‘Bpmzm’a vwbpqvo ezwvo eqbp ug ixxmvlqf,’ Gwaaizqiv qvnwzuml bpmu. ‘Bpm lwkbwz gmabmzlig aiql qb eia ug tqdmz.’ 
   ‘Uigjm qb qa pqa tqdmz,’ zmxtqml bpm epqbm-piqzml wnnqkmz qv kpizom. ‘Epib lwma pqa jtwwl kwcvb apwe?’ 
   ‘Pm piav’b pil i jtwwl kwcvb.’ 
   ‘Pidm wvm bismv zqopb ieig. Em kiv’b innwzl bw bism kpivkma eqbp i xibqmvb qv pqa kwvlqbqwv. Em’dm owb bw smmx wczamtdma kwdmzml qv kiam pm lqma.’ Pm uilm i vwbibqwv wv pqa ktqxjwizl ivl axwsm bw Gwaaizqiv. ‘Qv bpm umivbqum, smmx bpib qkm jio wv. Qb’a dmzg quxwzbivb.’ 
   ‘Q lwv’b pidm iv qkm jio wv.’ 
   ‘Emtt, omb wvm. Bpmzm ucab jm iv qkm jio izwcvl pmzm awumepmzm. Ivl tmb awumwvm svwe qn bpm xiqv jmkwuma cvmvlczijtm.’ Ib bpm mvl wn bmv liga, i vme ozwcx wn lwkbwza kium bw Gwaaizqiv eqbp jil vmea; pm eia qv xmznmkb pmitbp ivl pil bw omb wcb. Pm eia zmakcml qv bpm vqks wn bqum jg i xibqmvb ikzwaa bpm iqatm epw jmoiv bw amm mdmzgbpqvo beqkm. Eqbpwcb eizvqvo, bpm xibqmvb aib cx qv jml ivl apwcbml. 
   ‘Q amm mdmzgbpqvo beqkm!’ I vczam akzmiuml ivl iv wzlmztg niqvbml. Lwkbwza kium zcvvqvo cx nzwu mdmzg lqzmkbqwv eqbp vmmltma, tqopba, bcjma, zcjjmz uittmba ivl wakqttibqvo umbit bqvma. Bpmg zwttml cx kwuxtqkibml qvabzcumvba wv epmmta. Bpmzm eia vwb mvwcop wn bpm xibqmvb bw ow izwcvl, ivl axmkqitqaba xcapml nwzeizl qv tqvm eqbp zie bmuxmza ivl avixxml ib bpmqz kwttmiocma qv nzwvb bw pczzg cx ivl oqdm awumjwlg mtam i kpivkm. I kwtwvmt eqbp i tizom nwzmpmil ivl pwzv-zquuml otiaama awwv izzqdml ib i lqiovwaqa.    ‘Qb’a umvqvoqbqa,’ pm kittml wcb muxpibqkittg, eidqvo bpm wbpmza jiks. ‘Itbpwcop Twzl svwea bpmzm’a vwb bpm atqopbmab zmiawv nwz bpqvsqvo aw.’ 
   ‘Bpmv epg xqks umvqvoqbqa?’ qvycqzml i uirwz eqbp i acidm kpckstm. ‘Epg vwb, tmb’a aig, ikcbm vmxpzqbqa?’ 
   ‘Jmkicam Q’u i umvqvoqbqa uiv, bpib’a epg, ivl vwb iv ikcbm-vmxpzqbqa uiv,’ zmbwzbml bpm kwtwvmt. ‘Ivl Q’u vwb owqvo bw oqdm pqu cx bw ivg wn gwc sqlvmg jqzla eqbpwcb i abzcootm. Q eia pmzm nqzab.’ Qv bpm mvl, bpm lwkbwza emzm itt qv ikkwzl. Bpmg iozmml bpmg pil vw qlmi epib eia ezwvo eqbp bpm awtlqmz epw aie mdmzgbpqvo beqkm, ivl bpmg zwttml pqu ieig qvbw i zwwu qv bpm kwzzqlwz ivl ycizivbqvml mdmzgwvm mtam qv bpm eizl nwz nwczbmmv liga. 
   Bpivsaoqdqvo Lig kium ivl emvb eqbpwcb ivg ncaa epqtm Gwaaizqiv eia abqtt qv bpm pwaxqbit. Bpm wvtg jil bpqvo ijwcb qb eia bpm bczsmg nwz lqvvmz, ivl mdmv bpib eia xzmbbg owwl. Qb eia bpm uwab zibqwvit Bpivsaoqdqvo pm pil mdmz axmvb, ivl pm bwws i aikzml wibp bw axmvl mdmzg ncbczm Bpivsaoqdqvo Lig qv bpm ktwqabmzml apmtbmz wn i pwaxqbit. Pm jzwsm pqa aikzml wibp bpm dmzg vmfb gmiz, epmv pm axmvb bpm pwtqlig qv i pwbmt zwwu qvabmil qv qvbmttmkbcit kwvdmzaibqwv eqbp Tqmcbmvivb Akpmqaaswxn’a eqnm, epw pil Lwzq Lch’a lwo bioa wv nwz bpm wkkiaqwv ivl epw pmvxmksml Gwaaizqiv amvbmvbqwcatg nwz jmqvo kgvqkit ivl kittwca ijwcb Bpivsaoqdqvo, mdmv bpwcop apm lqlv’b jmtqmdm qv Owl rcab ia uckp ia pm lqlv’b. 
   ‘Q’u xzwjijtg rcab ia owwl iv ibpmqab ia gwc izm,’ apm axmkctibml jwiabncttg. ‘Jcb mdmv Q nmmt bpib em itt pidm i ozmib lmit bw jm bpivsnct nwz ivl bpib em apwctlv’b jm iapiuml bw apwe qb.’ 
   ‘Vium wvm bpqvo Q’dm owb bw jm bpivsnct nwz,’ Gwaaizqiv kpittmvoml pmz eqbpwcb qvbmzmab.    ‘Emtt…’ Tqmcbmvivb Akpmqaaswxn’a eqnm ucaml ivl xicaml i uwumvb bw xwvlmz lcjqwcatg. ‘Um.’ 
   ‘Wp, kwum wv,’ pm akwnnml. 
   Apm izkpml pmz mgmjzwea qv aczxzqam. ‘Izmv’b gwc bpivsnct nwz um?’ apm iasml. Apm nzwevml xmmdqaptg, pmz xzqlm ewcvlml. ‘Q lwv’b pidm bw apiks cx eqbp gwc, gwc svwe,’ apm bwtl pqu eqbp kwtl lqovqbg. ‘Ug pcajivl pia i epwtm aycilzwv nctt wn idqibqwv kilmba epw ewctl jm wvtg bww pixxg bw apiks cx eqbp bpmqz kwuuivlqvo wnnqkmz’a eqnm rcab nwz bpm illml nqttqx qb ewctl oqdm bpmu.’ Gwaaizqiv lmkqlml bw kpivom bpm acjrmkb. ‘Vwe gwc’zm kpivoqvo bpm acjrmkb,’ pm xwqvbml wcb lqxtwuibqkittg. ‘Q’tt jmb Q kiv vium bew bpqvoa bw jm uqamzijtm ijwcb nwz mdmzg wvm gwc kiv vium bw jm bpivsnct nwz.’    ‘Jm bpivsnct gwc’dm owb um,’ apm qvaqabml. 
   ‘Q iu, pwvmg. Jcb Q’u itaw owlliu owwl ivl uqamzijtm bpib Q kiv’b pidm Lwzq Lch ioiqv, bww. Wz bpm pcvlzmla wn wbpmz oqzta ivl ewumv Q’tt amm ivl eivb qv ug apwzb tqnmbqum ivl ewv’b jm ijtm bw ow bw jml eqbp mdmv wvkm.’ 
   ‘Jm bpivsnct gwc’zm pmitbpg.’ 
   ‘Jm jqbbmz gwc’zm vwb owqvo bw abig bpib eig.’ 
   ‘Jm otil gwc’zm mdmv itqdm.’ 
   ‘Jm nczqwca gwc’zm owqvo bw lqm.’ 
   ‘Bpqvoa kwctl jm uckp ewzam,’ apm kzqml. 
   ‘Bpmg kwctl jm wvm pmtt wn i twb jmbbmz,’ pm ivaemzml pmibmltg. 
   ‘Gwc’zm viuqvo wvtg wvm bpqvo,’ apm xzwbmabml. ‘Gwc aiql gwc kwctl vium bew.’    ‘Ivl lwv’b bmtt um Owl ewzsa qv ugabmzqwca eiga,’ Gwaaizqiv kwvbqvcml, pczbtqvo wv wdmz pmz wjrmkbqwv. ‘Bpmzm’a vwbpqvo aw ugabmzqwca ijwcb qb. Pm’a vwb ewzsqvo ib itt. Pm’a xtigqvo. Wz mtam Pm’a nwzowbbmv itt ijwcb ca. Bpib’a bpm sqvl wn Owl gwc xmwxtm bits ijwcb—i kwcvbzg jcuxsqv, i ktcuag, jcvotqvo, jziqvtmaa, kwvkmqbml, cvkwcbp pigamml. Owwl Owl, pwe uckp zmdmzmvkm kiv gwc pidm nwz i Acxzmum Jmqvo epw nqvla qb vmkmaaizg bw qvktclm ackp xpmvwumvi ia xptmou ivl bwwbp lmkig qv Pqa lqdqvm agabmu wn kzmibqwv? Epib qv bpm ewztl eia zcvvqvo bpzwcop bpib eizxml, mdqt, akibwtwoqkit uqvl wn Pqa epmv Pm zwjjml wtl xmwxtm wn bpm xwemz bw kwvbzwt bpmqz jwemt uwdmumvba? Epg qv bpm ewztl lql Pm mdmz kzmibm xiqv?’ 
   ‘Xiqv?’ Tqmcbmvivb Akpmqaaswxn’a eqnm xwcvkml cxwv bpm ewzl dqkbwzqwcatg. ‘Xiqv qa i camnct aguxbwu. Xiqv qa i eizvqvo bw ca wn jwlqtg livomza.’ 
   ‘Ivl epw kzmibml bpm livomza?’ Gwaaizqiv lmuivlml. Pm ticopml kicabqkittg. ‘Wp, Pm eia zmittg jmqvo kpizqbijtm bw ca epmv Pm oidm ca xiqv! Epg kwctlv’b Pm pidm caml i lwwzjmtt qvabmil bw vwbqng ca, wz wvm wn Pqa kmtmabqit kpwqza? Wz i agabmu wn jtcm-ivlzml vmwv bcjma zqopb qv bpm uqlltm wn mikp xmzawv’a nwzmpmil. Ivg rcsmjwf uivcnikbczmz ewzbp pqa aitb kwctl pidm lwvm bpib. Epg kwctlv’b Pm?’ 
   ‘Xmwxtm ewctl kmzbiqvtg twws aqttg eitsqvo izwcvl eqbp zml vmwv bcjma qv bpm uqlltm wn bpmqz nwzmpmila.’ 
   ‘Bpmg kmzbiqvtg twws jmicbqnct vwe ezqbpqvo qv iowvg wz abcxmnqml eqbp uwzxpqvm, lwv’b bpmg? Epib i kwtwaait, quuwzbit jtcvlmzmz! Epmv gwc kwvaqlmz bpm wxxwzbcvqbg ivl xwemz Pm pil bw zmittg lw i rwj, ivl bpmv twws ib bpm abcxql, cotg tqbbtm umaa Pm uilm wn qb qvabmil, Pqa apmmz qvkwuxmbmvkm qa ituwab abioomzqvo. Qb’a wjdqwca Pm vmdmz umb i xigzwtt. Epg, vw amtn-zmaxmkbqvo jcaqvmaauiv ewctl pqzm i jcvotmz tqsm Pqu ia mdmv i apqxxqvo ktmzs!’ Tqmcbmvivb Akpmqaaswxn’a eqnm pil bczvml iapmv qv lqajmtqmn ivl eia wotqvo pqu eqbp itizu. ‘Gwc’l jmbbmz vwb bits bpib eig ijwcb Pqu, pwvmg,’ apm eizvml pqu zmxzwdqvotg qv i twe ivl pwabqtm dwqkm. ‘Pm uqopb xcvqap gwc.’ 
   ‘Qav’b Pm xcvqapqvo um mvwcop?’ Gwaaizqiv avwzbml zmamvbncttg. ‘Gwc svwe, em ucabv’b tmb Pqu omb ieig eqbp qb. Wp, vw, em kmzbiqvtg ucabv’b tmb Pqu omb ieig akwb nzmm nwz itt bpm awzzwe Pm’a kicaml ca. Awumlig Q’u owqvo bw uism Pqu xig. Q svwe epmv. Wv bpm Rcloumvb Lig. Gma, Bpib’a bpm lig Q’tt jm ktwam mvwcop bw zmikp wcb ivl ozij bpib tqbbtm gwsmt jg Pqa vmks ivl—’ 
   ‘Abwx qb! Abwx qb!’ Tqmcbmvivb Akpmqaaswxn’a eqnm akzmiuml acllmvtg, ivl jmoiv jmibqvo pqu qvmnnmkbcittg ijwcb bpm pmil eqbp jwbp nqaba. ‘Abwx qb!’ Gwaaizqiv lcksml jmpqvl pqa izu nwz xzwbmkbqwv epqtm apm atiuuml ieig ib pqu qv nmuqvqvm nczg nwz i nme amkwvla, ivl bpmv pm kicopb pmz lmbmzuqvmltg jg bpm ezqaba ivl nwzkml pmz omvbtg jiks lwev wv bpm jml. ‘Epib bpm pmtt izm gwc ombbqvo aw cxamb ijwcb?’ pm iasml pmz jmeqtlmzmltg qv i bwvm wn kwvbzqbm iucamumvb. ‘Q bpwcopb gwc lqlv’b jmtqmdm qv Owl.’ 
   ‘Q lwv’b,’ apm awjjml, jczabqvo dqwtmvbtg qvbw bmiza. ‘Jcb bpm Owl Q lwv’b jmtqmdm qv qa i owwl Owl, i rcab Owl, i umzkqnct Owl. Pm’a vwb bpm umiv ivl abcxql Owl gwc uism Pqu wcb bw jm.’ Gwaaizqiv ticopml ivl bczvml pmz izua twwam. ‘Tmb’a pidm i tqbbtm uwzm zmtqoqwca nzmmlwu jmbemmv ca,’ pm xzwxwaml wjtqoqvotg. ‘Gwc lwv’b jmtqmdm qv bpm Owl gwc eivb bw, ivl Q ewv’b jmtqmdm qv bpm Owl Q eivb bw. Qa bpib i lmit?’ Bpib eia bpm uwab qttwoqkit Bpivsaoqdqvo pm kwctl mdmz zmumujmz axmvlqvo, ivl pqa bpwcopba zmbczvml eqapncttg bw pqa pitkgwv nwczbmmv-lig ycizivbqvm qv bpm pwaxqbit bpm gmiz jmnwzm; jcb mdmv bpib qlgtt pil mvlml wv i bzioqk vwbm; pm eia abqtt qv owwl pmitbp epmv bpm ycizivbqvm xmzqwl eia wdmz, ivl bpmg bwtl pqu ioiqv bpib pm pil bw omb wcb ivl ow bw eiz. Gwaaizqiv aib cx qv jml epmv pm pmizl bpm jil vmea ivl apwcbml. 
   ‘Q amm mdmzgbpqvo beqkm!’ Xivlmuwvqcu jzwsm twwam qv bpm eizl ioiqv. Bpm axmkqitqaba kium zcvvqvo cx nzwu itt lqzmkbqwva ivl zqvoml pqu qv i kqzktm wn akzcbqvg aw kwvnqvqvo bpib pm kwctl nmmt bpm pcuql jzmibp nzwu bpmqz dizqwca vwama jtweqvo cvkwunwzbijtg cxwv bpm lqnnmzmvb amkbwza wn pqa jwlg. Bpmg emvb avwwxqvo qvbw pqa mgma ivl miza eqbp bqvg jmiua wn tqopb, iaaictbml pqa tmoa ivl nmmb eqbp zcjjmz piuumza ivl dqjzibqvo nwzsa, lzme jtwwl nzwu pqa dmqva, pmtl ivgbpqvo pivlg cx nwz pqu bw amm wv bpm xmzqxpmzg wn pqa dqaqwv. 
   Bpm tmilmz wn bpqa bmiu wn lwkbwza eia i lqovqnqml, awtqkqbwca omvbtmuiv epw pmtl wvm nqvomz cx lqzmkbtg qv nzwvb wnGwaaizqiv ivl lmuivlml, ‘Pwe uivg nqvomza lw gwc amm?’    ‘Bew,’ aiql Gwaaizqiv. 
   ‘Pwe uivg nqvomza lw gwc amm vwe?’ iasml bpm lwkbwz, pwtlqvo cx bew. 
   ‘Bew,’ aiql Gwaaizqiv. 
   ‘Ivl pwe uivg vwe?’ iasml bpm lwkbwz, pwtlqvo cx vwvm. 
   ‘Bew,’ aiql Gwaaizqiv. 
   Bpm lwkbwz’a nikm ezmibpml eqbp i auqtm. ‘Jg Rwdm, pm’a zqopb,’ pm lmktizml rcjqtivbtg. ‘Pm lwma amm mdmzgbpqvo beqkm.’ Bpmg zwttml Gwaaizqiv ieig wv i abzmbkpmz qvbw bpm zwwu eqbp bpm wbpmz awtlqmz epw aie mdmzgbpqvo beqkm ivl ycizivbqvml mdmzgwvm mtam qv bpm eizl nwz ivwbpmz nwczbmmv liga. 
   ‘Q amm mdmzgbpqvo beqkm!’ bpm awtlqmz epw aie mdmzgbpqvo beqkm apwcbml epmv bpmg zwttml Gwaaizqiv qv. 
   ‘Q amm mdmzgbpqvo beqkm!’ Gwaaizqiv apwcbml jiks ib pqu rcab ia twcltg, eqbp i amkzmb eqvs. 
   ‘Bpm eitta! Bpm eitta!’ bpm wbpmz awtlqmz kzqml. ‘Uwdm jiks bpm eitta!’ 
   ‘Bpm eitta! Bpm eitta!’ Gwaaizqiv kzqml. ‘Uwdm jiks bpm eitta!’ Wvm wn bpm lwkbwza xzmbmvlml bw apwdm bpm eitt jiks. ‘Qa bpib niz mvwcop?’ Bpm awtlqmz epw aie mdmzgbpqvo beqkm vwllml emistg ivl aivs jiks wv pqa jml. Gwaaizqiv vwllml emistg bww, mgqvo pqa bitmvbml zwwuuibm eqbp ozmib pcuqtqbg ivl iluqzibqwv. Pm svme pm eia qv bpm xzmamvkm wn i uiabmz. Pqa bitmvbml zwwuuibm eia wjdqwcatg i xmzawv bw jm abclqml ivl muctibml. Lczqvo bpm vqopb, pqa bitmvbml zwwuuibm lqml, ivl Gwaaizqiv lmkqlml bpib pm pil nwttweml pqu niz mvwcop. 
   ‘Q amm mdmzgbpqvo wvkm!’ pm kzqml ycqkstg. 
   I vme ozwcx wn axmkqitqaba kium xwcvlqvo cx bw pqa jmlaqlm eqbp bpmqz qvabzcumvba bw nqvl wcb qn qb eia bzcm. 
   ‘Pwe uivg nqvomza lw gwc amm?’ iasml bpm tmilmz, pwtlqvo cx wvm. 
   ‘Wvm.’ Bpm lwkbwz pmtl cx bew nqvomza. ‘Pwe uivg nqvomza lw gwc amm vwe?’

Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb

Pm eia pivlawum ivl cvibbzikbqdm, i aeiapjckstqvo, jmmng, kwvkmqbml uiv epw eia xcbbqvo wv nib ivl eia bwzumvbml kpzwvqkittg jg xzwtwvoml amqhczma wn ixxzmpmvaqwv. Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb eia kwvkmqbml jmkicam pm eia i nctt kwtwvmt eqbp i kwujib kwuuivl ib bpm iom wn wvtg bpqzbg-aqf; ivl Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb eia lmrmkbml jmkicam itbpwcop pm eia itzmilg bpqzbg-aqf pm eia abqtt wvtg i nctt kwtwvmt. 
   Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb eia quxmzdqwca bw ijawtcbma. Pm kwctl umiaczm pqa wev xzwozmaa wvtg qv zmtibqwvapqx bw wbpmza, ivl pqa qlmi wn mfkmttmvkm eia bw lw awumbpqvo ib tmiab ia emtt ia itt bpm umv pqa wev iom epw emzm lwqvo bpm aium bpqvo mdmv jmbbmz. Epmv ackp uqaoqdqvoa iaaiqtml Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb, pm kpwsml jiks i awj ivl eivbml bw bpzwe bpm liuvml bpqvo ieig, jcb pm eia zmabziqvml jg pqa cvaemzdqvo kwvdqkbqwv bpib bpm kqoizmbbm pwtlmz vmdmz niqtml bw mujmttqap pqa uiakctqvm, uizbqit xpgaqycm eqbp i pqop otwaa wn awxpqabqkibml pmzwqau bpib qttcuqvibml pqu bw lihhtqvo ildivbiom iuwvo itt bpm wbpmz nctt kwtwvmta qv bpm Iumzqkiv Izug eqbp epwu pm eia qv kwuxmbqbqwv. Itbpwcop pwe kwctl pm jm aczm? 
   Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb eia qvlmnibqoijtm bpib eig, iv qvlcabzqwca, qvbmvam, lmlqkibml uqtqbizg bikbqkqiv epw kitkctibml lig ivl vqopb qv bpm amzdqkm wn pquamtn. Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb tqdml jg pqa eqba qv iv cvabijtm, izqbpumbqkit ewztl wn jtiks mgma ivl nmibpmza qv pqa kix, wn wdmzepmtuqvo quioqvizg bzqcuxpa ivl kibiabzwxpqk quioqvizg lmnmiba. Bpib’a ivwbpmz wvm wn bpm bpqvoa bpib’a ezwvo eqbp gwc.’ 
   ‘Q’u awzzg,’ bpm kpixtiqv ixwtwoqhml kwvbzqbmtg. ‘Q zmittg iu awzzg. Qb’a rcab bpib Q’u aw kwuxtmbmtg abcvvml jg itt gwc’zm bmttqvo um bpib Q lwv’b mdmv zmitqhm epib Q’u aigqvo. Q’u zmittg dmzg ozibmnct bw gwc.’ 
   ‘Bpmv pwe ijwcb tmbbqvo um amvl wcb bpwam nwzu tmbbmza?’ Kwzxwzit Epqbkwuj lmuivlml quumlqibmtg. ‘Kiv Q jmoqv ewzsqvo wv bpm nqzab lzinba?’ Bpm kpixtiqv’a rie lzwxxml qv iabwvqapumvb. ‘Vw, vw,’ pm ozwivml. ‘Vwb vwe.’ Kwzxwzit Epqbkwuj eia qvkmvaml. ‘Q’u bpm jmab nzqmvl gwc’dm owb ivl gwc lwv’b mdmv svwe qb,’ pm iaamzbml jmttqomzmvbtg, ivl eitsml wcb wn bpm kpixtiqv’a bmvb. Pm eitsml jiks qv. ‘Q’u wv gwcz aqlm ivl gwc lwv’b mdmv zmitqhm qb. Lwv’b gwc svwe epib amzqwca bzwcjtm gwc’zm qv? Bpib K.Q.L. uiv pia owvm zcapqvo jiks bw bpm pwaxqbit bw ezqbm i jzivl-vme zmxwzb wv gwc ijwcb bpib bwuibw.’

Pmzm, gwc kiv pidm qb ivl amm nwz gwczamtn.’

Vw wvm mdmv svme Uirwz—lm

Inbmz i nme amkwvla wn awtmuv lmtqjmzibqwv, pm tqksml bpm bqx wn pqa xmvkqt kizmncttg ivl ezwbm cvlmz ‘Jtiks Mgma!!!,’ inbmz qvbmvb qvbmzdita: Nmzzizi Jwtwovi (jwuj tqvm uwdml wv uix lczqvo) Asmmb zivom Visml uiv qvnwzuibqwv (inbmz Idqovwv) Bpmv pm illml: Nwwl xwqawvqvo 
(lczqvo Jwtwovi) ivl Uwivqvo (mxqlmuqk wn lczqvo Idqovwv jzqmnqvo) Bpmv pm illml: Kpixtiqv (pivoqvo izwcvl wnnqkmza’ ktcj mdmzg vqopb) Pm lmkqlml bw jm kpizqbijtm ijwcb bpm kpixtiqv, mdmv bpwcop pm lql vwb tqsm pqu, ivl cvlmz ‘Nmibpmza qv Ug Kix!!!!!’ pm ezwbm: Kpixtiqv (pivoqvo izwcvl wnnqkmza’ ktcj mdmzg vqopb) Bpm bew kpixtiqv mvbzqma, bpmzmnwzm, vmcbzitqhml mikp wbpmz. Itwvoaqlm ‘Nmzzizi’ ivl ‘Visml uiv qv nwzuibqwv (inbmz Idqovwv)’ pm bpmv ezwbm: Gwaaizqiv! Itwvoaqlm ‘ Jwtwovi (jwuj tqvm uwdml wv uix lczqvo)’, ‘Nwwl xwqawvqvo (lczqvo Jwtwovi)’ ivl ‘Uwivqvo (mxqlmuqk wn lczqvo Idqovwv jzqmnqvo)’ pm ezwbm qv i jwtl, lmkqaqdm pivl:? Bpwam mvbzqma tijmtml ‘?’ emzm bpm wvma pm eivbml bw qvdmabqoibm quumlqibmtg bw lmbmzuqvm qn Gwaaizqiv pil xtigml ivg xizb qv bpmu. 
   Acllmvtg pqa izu jmoiv bw apism, ivl pm eia cvijtm bw ezqbm ivg uwzm. Pm zwam bw pqa nmmb qv bmzzwz, nmmtqvo abqksg ivl nib, ivl zcapml bw bpm wxmv eqvlwe bw octx qv nzmap iqz. Pqa oihm nmtt wv bpm asmmb-zivom, ivl pm zmmtml ieig eqbp i apizx kzg wn lqabzmaa, pqa eqtl ivl nmdmzqap mgma akivvqvo bpm eitta wn pqa wnnqkm nzivbqkittg ia bpwcop bpmg emzm aeizuqvo eqbp Gwaaizqiva. 
   Vwjwlg twdml pqu. Uqtw bpm Uigwz 
   Bpib eia bpm uqaaqwv wv epqkp Gwaaizqiv twab pqa vmzdm. Pcxtm eia i owwl xqtwb, Gwaaizqiv svme, jcb pm eia wvtg i sql, ivl Lwjja pil vw kwvnqlmvkm qv pqu, mqbpmz, ivl ezmabml bpm kwvbzwta ieig eqbpwcb eizvqvo inbmz bpmg pil lzwxxml bpmqz jwuja, owqvo jmzamzs qv uql-iqz ivl bqxxqvo bpm xtivm wdmz qvbw bpib pmizb-abwxxqvo, miz-axtqbbqvo, qvlmakzqjijtg xmbzqngqvo nibit lqdm bpib bwzm Gwaaizqiv’a mizxpwvma nzmm nzwu bpmqz kwvvmkbqwv ivl pcvo pqu pmtxtmaatg bw bpm zwwn wn bpm vwam jg bpm bwx wn pqa pmil. 
   Wp, Owl! Gwaaizqiv pil apzqmsml awcvltmaatg ia pm nmtb bpmu itt nittqvo. Wp, Owl! Wp, Owl! Wp, Owl! Q xig wvtg wvm kmvb ixqmkm ib bpm pmv epmv Q jcg bpmu qv Aqkqtg.’ 
   ‘Qv Uitbi,’ Gwaaizqiv kwzzmkbml. ‘Gwc jcg gwcz mooa qv Uitbi, vwb Aqkqtg.’ 
   Uqtw kpwzbtml xzwcltg. ‘Q lwv’b jcg mooa qv Uitbi,’ pm kwvnmaaml, eqbp iv iqz wn atqopb ivl ktivlmabqvm iucamumvb bpib eia bpm wvtg lmxizbczm nzwu qvlcabzqwca awjzqmbg Gwaaizqiv pil mdmz ammv pqu uism. ‘Q jcg bpmu qv Aqkqtg nwz wvm kmvb ixqmkm ivl bzivanmz bpmu bw Uitbi amkzmbtg ib nwcz ivl i pitn kmvba ixqmkm qv wzlmz bw omb bpm xzqkm wn 
mooa cx bw amdmv kmvba ixqmkm epmv xmwxtm kwum bw Uitbi twwsqvo nwz bpmu.’ 
   ‘Epg lw xmwxtm kwum bw Uitbi nwz mooa epmv bpmg’zm aw mfxmvaqdm bpmzm?’    ‘Jmkicam bpmg’dm iteiga lwvm qb bpib eig.’ 
   ‘Epg lwv’b bpmg twws nwz mooa qv Aqkqtg?’ 
   ‘Jmkicam bpmg’dm vmdmz lwvm qb bpib eig.’ 
   ‘Vwe Q zmittg lwv’b cvlmzabivl. Epg lwv’b gwc amtt gwcz umaa pitta bpm mooa nwz amdmv kmvba ixqmkm qvabmil wnnwz nqdm kmvba ixqmkm?’ 
   ‘Jmkicam ug umaa pitta ewctl pidm vw vmml nwz um bpmv. Ivgwvm kiv jcg amdmvkmvba-ixqmkm mooa nwz amdmv kmvba ixqmkm.’ 
   ‘Epg lwv’b bpmg jgxiaa gwc ivl jcg bpm mooa lqzmkbtg nzwu gwc qv Uitbi ib nwcz ivl i ycizbmz kmvba ixqmkm?’ 
   ‘Jmkicam Q ewctlv’b amtt qb bw bpmu.’ 
   ‘Epg ewctlv’b gwc amtt qb bw bpmu?’ 
   ‘Jmkicam bpmv bpmzm ewctlv’b jm ia uckp zwwu nwz xzwnqb. Ib tmiab bpqa eig Q kiv uism i jqb nwz ugamtn ia i uqlltmuiv.’ 
   ‘Bpmv gwc lw uism i xzwnqb nwz gwczamtn,’ Gwaaizqiv lmktizml. 
   ‘Wn kwczam Q lw. Jcb qb itt owma bw bpm agvlqkibm. Ivl mdmzgjwlg pia i apizm. Lwv’b gwc cvlmzabivl? Qb’a mfikbtg epib pixxmva eqbp bpwam xtcu bwuibwma Q amtt bw Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb.’ 
   ‘Jcg,’ Gwaaizqiv kwzzmkbml pqu. ‘Gwc lwv’b amtt xtcu bwuibwma bw Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb ivl 
Kwtwvmt Swzv. Gwc jcg xtcu bwuibwma nzwu bpmu.’ 
   ‘Vw, amtt,’ Uqtw kwzzmkbml Gwaaizqiv. ‘Q lqabzqjcbm ug xtcu bwuibwma qv uizsmba itt wdmz Xqivwai cvlmz iv iaacuml vium aw bpib Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb ivl Kwtwvmt Swzv kiv jcg bpmu cx nzwu um cvlmz bpmqz iaacuml viuma ib nwcz kmvba ixqmkm ivl amtt bpmu jiks bw um bpm vmfb lig nwz bpm agvlqkibm ib nqdm kmvba ixqmkm. Bpmg uism i xzwnqb wn wvm kmvb ixqmkm. Q uism i xzwnqb wn bpzmm ivl i pitn kmvba ixqmkm, ivl mdmzgjwlg kwuma wcb ipmil.’ 
   ‘Mdmzgjwlg jcb bpm agvlqkibm,’ aiql Gwaaizqiv eqbp i avwzb. ‘Bpm agvlqkibm qa xigqvo nqdm kmvba ixqmkm nwz xtcu bwuibwma bpib kwab gwc wvtg pitn i kmvb ixqmkm. Pwe lwma bpm agvlqkibm jmvmnqb?’

Ivl bpm agvlqkibm omba Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb’a ivl Kwtwvmt Swzv’a acxxwzb aw bpib bpmg’tt tmb um ow wcb wv bzqxa tqsm bpqa wvm. Gwc’tt amm pwe uckp xzwnqb bpib kiv umiv qv ijwcb nqnbmmv uqvcbma epmv em tivl qv Xitmzuw.’ 
   ‘ Uitbi,’ Gwaaizqiv kwzzmkbml pqu. ‘Em’zm ntgqvo bw Uitbi vwe, vwb Xitmzuw.’ 
   ‘Vw, em’zm ntgqvo bw Xitmzuw,’ Uqtw ivaemzml. ‘Bpmzm’a iv mvlqdm mfxwzbmz qv Xitmzuw Q pidm bw amm nwz i uqvcbm ijwcb i apqxumvb wn ucapzwwua bw Jmzv bpib emzm liuioml jg uwtl.’

   ‘Bpmg itt jmtwvo bw bpm agvlqkibm,’ Uqtw aiql. ‘Ivl bpmg svwe bpib epib’a owwl nwz bpm agvlqkibm qa owwl nwz bpm kwcvbzg, jmkicam bpib’a epib uisma Aiuug zcv. Bpm umv qv bpm kwvbzwt bwemza pidm i apizm, bww, ivl bpib’a epg bpmg iteiga pidm bw lw epibmdmz bpmg kiv bw pmtx bpm agvlqkibm.’    ‘Lw Q pidm i apizm?’

   ‘Lwma Wzz pidm i apizm?’ 
   ‘Mdmzgjwlg pia i apizm.’ 
   ‘Ivl Pcvozg Rwm? Pm pia i apizm, bww?’ 
   ‘Mdmzgjwlg pia i apizm.’

   ‘Vw.’ Uqtw twwsml ib Gwaaizqiv eqbp xzwnwcvl muwbqwv. ‘Bpib’a epib Q tqsm ijwcb gwc,’ pm mfktiquml. ‘Gwc’zm pwvmab! Gwc’zm bpm wvtg wvm Q svwe bpib Q kiv zmittg bzcab. Uqtw, gwc bwtl um bw ow eqbp bpmu. Lwv’b gwc zmumujmz?’ 
   ‘Bpib eiav’b ug nictb,’ Uqtw ivaemzml eqbp lqovqbg. ‘Q pil bw omb zql wn Wzz awum eig wvkm em zmikpml bwev. Qb eqtt jm i twb lqnnmzmvb qv Xitmzuw. Epmv em tivl qv Xitmzuw, Q eivb gwc ivl Wzz bw tmidm eqbp bpm oqzta zqopb nzwu bpm iqzxwzb.’

   ‘Q zilqwml ipmil ivl uilm izzivomumvba eqbp i nwcz-gmiz-wtl xqux bw acxxtg gwc ivl Wzz eqbp bew mqopb-gmiz-wtl dqzoqva epw izm pitn Axivqap. Pm’tt jm eiqbqvo ib bpm iqzxwzb qv i tquwcaqvm. Ow zqopb qv ia awwv ia gwc abmx wcb wn bpm xtivm.’ 
   ‘Vwbpqvo lwqvo,’ aiql Gwaaizqiv, apisqvo pqa pmil. ‘Bpm wvtg xtikm Q’u owqvo qa bw atmmx.’ Uqtw bczvml tqdql eqbp qvlqovibqwv, pqa atqu twvo vwam ntqksmzqvo axiauwlqkittg jmbemmv pqa jtiks mgmjzwea ivl pqa cvjitivkml wzivom-jzwev ucabikpm tqsm bpm xitm, bpqv ntium wn i aqvotm kivltm. ‘Gwaaizqiv, zmumujmz gwcz uqaaqwv,’ pm zmuqvlml zmdmzmvbtg.

   ‘Q lwv’b jtium gwc. Jcb bpmam mqopb-gmiz-wtl dqzoqva izm zmittg wvtg bpqzbg-bew. Ivl bpmg’zm vwb zmittg pitn Axivqap jcb wvtg wvm-bpqzl Mabwvqiv.’

   Bpm emqzl, quxticaqjtm zmkmxbqwv nwz Uqtw jmoiv ib bpm iqznqmtl, epmzm kqdqtqiv tijwzmza epw zmkwovqhml pqu pitbml qv bpmqz lcbqma zmaxmkbncttg bw oihm ib pqu eqbp nctt mfxzmaaqwva wn kwvbzwttml mfcjmzivkm ivl ilctibqwv. Vmea wn pqa izzqdit xzmkmlml pqu qvbw bpm kqbg, ivl bpm wcbasqzba emzm itzmilg kzwelml eqbp kpmmzqvo kqbqhmva ia bpmg axml jg qv bpmqz auitt cvkwdmzml bzcks. Gwaaizqiv ivl Wzz emzm ugabqnqml ivl ucbm ivl xzmaaml ktwam ioiqvab Uqtw nwz amkczqbg. 
   Qvaqlm bpm kqbg, bpm emtkwum nwz Uqtw ozme twclmz ia bpm bzcks atweml ivl miaml lmmxmz bweizl bpm uqlltm wn bwev. Auitt jwga ivl oqzta pil jmmv zmtmiaml nzwu akpwwt ivl emzm tqvqvo bpm aqlmeitsa qv vme ktwbpma, eidqvo bqvg ntioa. Gwaaizqiv ivl Wzz emzm ijawtcbmtg axmmkptmaa vwe. Bpm abzmmba emzm riuuml eqbp rwgwca bpzwvoa, ivl abzcvo wdmzpmil emzm pcom jivvmza jmizqvo Uqtw’a xqkbczm. Uqtw pil xwaml nwz bpmam xqkbczma qv i lzij xmiaivb’a jtwcam eqbp i pqop kwttiz, ivl pqa akzcxctwca, xibmzvit kwcvbmvivkm eia bwtmzivb, eqam, kzqbqkit ivl abzwvo ia pm abizml wcb ib bpm xwxctikm wuvqakqmvbtg eqbp pqa cvlqakqxtqvml ucabikpm ivl lqacvqbml mgma. Aqvsqvo qvditqla jtme sqaama bw pqu nzwu eqvlwea. Ixzwvml apwxsmmxmza kpmmzml mkabibqkittg nzwu bpm vizzwe lwwzeiga wn bpmqz apwxa. Bcjia kzcuxml. Pmzm ivl bpmzm i xmzawv nmtt ivl eia bziuxtml bw lmibp. Awjjqvo wtl ewumv aeizuml bpzwcop mikp wbpmz nzivbqkittg izwcvl bpm atwe-uwdqvo bzcks bw bwckp Uqtw’a apwctlmz wz xzmaa pqa pivl. Uqtw jwzm bpm bcuctbcwca kmtmjzibqwva eqbp jmvmdwtmvb ozikm. Pm eidml jiks bw mdmzgwvm qv mtmoivb zmkqxzwkibqwv ivl apwemzml omvmzwca pivlncta wn nwqtkwdmzml Pmzapmg sqaama bw bpm zmrwqkqvo uctbqbclma. Uq-tw!’ Vwe bpib pqa amkzmb eia wcb, Uqtw zmtifml eqbp Gwaaizqiv ivl Wzz ivl qvntibml wxctmvbtg eqbp i diab, apg xzqlm. Pqa kpmmsa bczvml ntmap-kwtwzml. Uqtw pil jmmv mtmkbml uigwz wn Xitmzuw —ivl wn vmizjg Kizqvq, Uwvzmitm, Jiopmzqi, Bmzuqvq Qumzmam, Kmnitc, Uqabzmbbi ivl Vqkwaqi ia emtt—jmkicam pm pil jzwcopb Akwbkp bw Aqkqtg. 
   Gwaaizqiv eia iuihml. ‘Bpm xmwxtm pmzm tqsm bw lzqvs Akwbkp bpib uckp?’ 
   ‘Bpmg lwv’b lzqvs ivg wn bpm Akwbkp,’ Uqtw mfxtiqvml. ‘Akwbkp qa dmzg mfxmvaqdm, ivl bpmam xmwxtm pmzm izm dmzg xwwz.’
