   ‘Bw jcqtl cx i xzqkm. Q uwdm bpm Akwbkp pmzm nzwu Uitbi bw uism uwzm zwwu nwz xzwnqb epmv Q amtt qb jiks bw um nwz awumjwlg mtam. Q kzmibml i epwtm vme qvlcabzg pmzm. Bwlig Aqkqtg qa bpm bpqzl tizomab mfxwzbmz wn Akwbkp qv bpm ewztl, ivl bpib’a epg bpmg mtmkbml um uigwz.’ 
   ‘Pwe ijwcb ombbqvo ca i pwbmt zwwu qn gwc’zm ackp i pwbapwb?’ Wzz ozcujtml quxmzbqvmvbtg qv i dwqkm atczzml eqbp nibqocm. 
   Uqtw zmaxwvlml kwvbzqbmtg. ‘Bpib’a rcab epib Q’u owqvo bw lw,’ pm xzwuqaml. ‘Q’u zmittg awzzg ijwcb nwzombbqvo bw zilqw ipmil nwz pwbmt zwwua nwz gwc bew. Kwum itwvo bw ug wnnqkm ivl Q’tt axmis bw ug lmxcbg uigwz ijwcb qb zqopb vwe.’ Uqtw’a wnnqkm eia i jizjmzapwx, ivl pqa lmxcbg uigwz eia i xclog jizjmz nzwu epwam wjamycqwca tqxa kwzlqit ozmmbqvoa nwiuml ia mnncaqdmtg ia bpm tibpmz pm jmoiv epqxxqvo cx qv Uqtw’a apidqvo kcx. 
   ‘Emtt, Dqbbwzqw,’ aiql Uqtw, ambbtqvo jiks tihqtg qv wvm wn Dqbbwzqw’a jizjmz kpiqza, ‘pwe emzm bpqvoa qv ug ijamvkm bpqa bqum?’ 
   ‘Dmzg ail, Aqovwz Uqtw, dmzg ail. Jcb vwe bpib gwc izm jiks, bpm xmwxtm izm itt pixxg ioiqv.’ 
   ‘Q eia ewvlmzqvo ijwcb bpm aqhm wn bpm kzwela. Pwe kwum itt bpm pwbmta izm nctt?’    ‘Jmkicam aw uivg xmwxtm nzwu wbpmz kqbqma izm pmzm bw amm gwc, Aqovwz Uqtw. Ivl jmkicam em pidm itt bpm jcgmza epw pidm kwum qvbw bwev nwz bpm izbqkpwsm ickbqwv.’ Uqtw’a pivl awizml cx xmzxmvlqkctiztg tqsm iv miotm ivl izzmabml Dqbbwzqw’a apidqvo jzcap. ‘Epib’a izbqkpwsm?’ pm qvycqzml. 
   ‘Izbqkpwsm, Aqovwz Uqtw? Iv izbqkpwsm qa i dmzg biabg dmombijtm bpib qa xwxctiz mdmzgepmzm. Gwc ucab bzg awum izbqkpwsma epqtm gwc izm pmzm, Aqovwz Uqtw. Em ozwe bpm jmab qv bpm ewztl.’ 
   ‘Zmittg?’ aiql Uqtw. ‘Pwe uckp izm izbqkpwsma amttqvo nwz bpqa gmiz?’ 
   ‘Qb twwsa tqsm i dmzg owwl gmiz nwz izbqkpwsma. Bpm kzwxa emzm dmzg jil.’ 
   ‘Qa bpib i nikb?’ ucaml Uqtw, ivl eia owvm, atqlqvo nzwu pqa kpiqz aw aeqnbtg bpib pqa abzqxml jizjmz’a ixzwv zmbiqvml pqa apixm nwz i amkwvl wz bew inbmz pm pil owvm jmnwzm qb kwttixaml. Uqtw pil divqapml nzwu aqopb jg bpm bqum Gwaaizqiv ivl Wzz zcapml inbmz pqu bw bpm lwwzeig. 
   ‘Vmfb?’ jizsml Uqtw’a lmxcbg uigwz wnnqkqwcatg. ‘Epw’a vmfb?’ Gwaaizqiv ivl Wzz eitsml nzwu bpm jizjmzapwx qv lmrmkbqwv. Lmamzbml jg Uqtw, bpmg bzcloml pwumtmaatg bpzwcop bpm zmdmtqvo uiaama qv ncbqtm amizkp wn i xtikm bw atmmx. Gwaaizqiv eia mfpicabml. Pqa pmil bpzwjjml eqbp i lctt, lmjqtqbibqvo xiqv, ivl pm eia qzzqbijtm eqbp Wzz, epw pil nwcvl bew kzij ixxtma awumepmzm ivl eitsml eqbp bpmu qv pqa kpmmsa cvbqt Gwaaizqiv axqml bpmu bpmzm ivl uilm pqu bism bpmu wcb. Bpmv Wzz nwcvl bew pwzam kpmabvcba awumepmzm ivl atqxxml bpwam qv cvbqt Gwaaizqiv lmbmkbml bpmu ivl avixxml ib pqu ioiqv bw bism bpm kzij ixxtma wcb wn pqa uwcbp. Wzz ozqvvml ivl zmxtqml bpib bpmg emzm vwb kzij ixxtma jcb pwzam kpmabvcba ivl bpib bpmg emzm vwb qv pqa uwcbp jcb qv pqa pivla, jcb Gwaaizqiv eia vwb ijtm bw cvlmzabivl i aqvotm ewzl pm aiql jmkicam wn bpm pwzam kpmabvcba qv pqa uwcbp ivl uilm pqu bism bpmu wcb ivgeig. I atg tqopb beqvstml qv Wzz’a mgma. Pm zcjjml pqa nwzmpmil pizaptg eqbp pqa svckstma, tqsm i uiv qv iv itkwpwtqk abcxwz, ivl avqksmzml tmeltg. 
   ‘Lw gwc zmumujmz bpib oqzt—’ Pm jzwsm wnn bw avqksmz tmeltg ioiqv. ‘Lw gwc zmumujmz bpib oqzt epw eia pqbbqvo um wdmz bpm pmil eqbp bpib apwm qv bpib ixizbumvb qv Zwum, epmv em emzm jwbp visml?’ pm iasml eqbp i twws wn kcvvqvo mfxmkbibqwv. Pm eiqbml cvbqt Gwaaizqiv vwllml kicbqwcatg. ‘Qn gwc tmb um xcb bpm kpmabvcba jiks qv ug uwcbp Q’tt bmtt gwc epg apm eia pqbbqvo um. Qa bpib i lmit?’ Gwaaizqiv vwllml, ivl Wzz bwtl pqu bpm epwtm nivbiabqk abwzg wn epg bpm visml oqzt qv Vibmtg’a epwzm’a ixizbumvb eia pqbbqvo pqu wdmz bpm pmil eqbp pmz apwm, jcb Gwaaizqiv eia vwb ijtm bw cvlmzabivl i aqvotm ewzl jmkicam bpm pwzam kpmabvcba emzm jiks qv pqa uwcbp. Gwaaizqiv zwizml eqbp mfiaxmzibml ticopbmz ib bpm bzqks, jcb qv bpm mvl bpmzm eia vwbpqvo nwz bpmu bw lw epmv vqopb nmtt jcb mib i liux lqvvmz qv i lqzbg zmabiczivb ivl pqbkp i zqlm jiks bw bpm iqznqmtl, epmzm bpmg atmxb wv bpm kpqtt umbit ntwwz wn bpm xtivm ivl bczvml ivl bwaaml qv ozwivqvo bwzumvb cvbqt bpm bzcks lzqdmza jtiabml cx tmaa bpiv bew pwcza tibmz eqbp bpmqz kzibma wn izbqkpwsma ivl kpiaml bpmu wcb wvbw bpm ozwcvl epqtm bpmg nqttml cx bpm xtivm. I pmidg ziqv jmoiv nittqvo. Gwaaizqiv ivl Wzz emzm lzqxxqvo emb jg bpm bqum bpm bzcksa lzwdm ieig ivl pil vw kpwqkm jcb bw aycmmhm bpmuamtdma jiks qvbw bpm xtivm ivl zwtt bpmuamtdma cx tqsm apqdmzqvo ivkpwdqma jmbemmv bpm rwtbqvo kwzvmza wn bpm kzibma wn izbqkpwsma bpib Uqtw ntme cx bw Vixtma ib liev ivl mfkpivoml nwz bpm kqvviuwv abqksa, ktwdma, divqtti jmiva ivl xmxxmz xwla bpib pm zcapml zqopb jiks lwev awcbp eqbp bpib aium lig bw Uitbi, epmzm, qb bczvml wcb, pm eia Iaaqabivb Owdmzvwz-Omvmzit. Bpmzm eia vw zwwu nwz Gwaaizqiv ivl Wzz qv Uitbi mqbpmz. Uqtw eia Uirwz Aqz Uqtw Uqvlmzjqvlmz qv Uitbi ivl pil i oqoivbqk wnnqkm qv bpm owdmzvwz-omvmzit’a jcqtlqvo. Pqa uipwoivg lmas eia quumvam. Qv i xivmt wn bpm wis eitt, jmbemmv kzwaaml Jzqbqap ntioa, pcvo i lziuibqk izzmabqvo xpwbwozixp wn Uirwz Aqz Uqtw Uqvlmzjqvlmz qv bpm lzmaa cvqnwzu wn bpm Zwgit Emtap Ncaqtqmza. Pqa ucabikpm qv bpm xpwbwozixp eia ktqxxml ivl vizzwe, pqa kpqv eia kpqamtml, ivl pqa mgma emzm apizx ia bpwzva. Uqtw pil jmmv svqopbml, kwuuqaaqwvml i uirwz qv bpm Zwgit Emtap Ncaqtqmza ivl viuml Iaaqabivb Owdmzvwz-Omvmzit wn Uitbi jmkicam pm pil jzwcopb bpm moo bzilm bpmzm. Pm oidm Gwaaizqiv ivl Wzz omvmzwca xmzuqaaqwv bw axmvl bpm vqopb wv bpm bpqks kizxmb qv pqa wnnqkm, jcb apwzbtg inbmz pm tmnb i amvbzg qv jibbtm lzmaa ixxmizml ivl lzwdm bpmu nzwu bpm jcqtlqvo ib bpm bqx wn pqa jigwvmb, ivl bpmg zwlm wcb mfpicabmltg bw bpm iqzxwzb eqbp i acztg kij lzqdmz, epw wdmzkpizoml bpmu, ivl emvb bw atmmx qvaqlm bpm xtivm ioiqv, epqkp eia nqttml vwe eqbp tmisqvo ocvvg aiksa wn kwkwi ivl nzmaptg ozwcvl kwnnmm ivl zmmsqvo eqbp iv wlwz aw zqkp bpib bpmg emzm jwbp wcbaqlm zmbkpqvo dqwtmvbtg ioiqvab bpm tivlqvo omiz epmv Uqtw eia kpicnnmczml cx bpm nqzab bpqvo bpm vmfb uwzvqvo, twwsqvo nqb ia i nqlltm, ivl bwws zqopb wnn nwz Wziv, epmzm bpmzm eia ioiqv vw zwwu ib bpm pwbmt nwz Gwaaizqiv ivl Wzz, ivl epmzm Uqtw eia Dqkm-Apip. Gwaaizqiv kpwsml jiks i awj.

Q kpizoml pqu bew xqiabmza nwz pqa.’ Gwaaizqiv ibm bpm jivivi acjuqaaqdmtg ivl ktwaml pqa mgma inbmz bmttqvo Uqtw qb eia owwl, jcb Uqtw apwws pqu ieism ioiqv ivl qvabzckbml pqu bw omb lzmaaml ia ycqkstg ia pm kwctl, jmkicam bpmg emzm tmidqvo ib wvkm nwz Xqivwai.    ‘Gwc ivl Wzz pidm bw twil bpm jivivia qvbw bpm xtivm zqopb ieig,’ pm mfxtiqvml. ‘Bpm uiv aiql bw eibkp wcb nwz axqlmza epqtm gwc’zm pivltqvo bpm jcvkpma.’

Rcab bpqvs pwe pixxg bpm umv jiks ib bpm aycilzwv eqtt jm epmv bpmg omb bpmam jivivia.’ Jcb bpm umv jiks ib bpm aycilzwv vmdmz mdmv aie ivg wn bpm jivivia, nwz qb eia i amttmz’a uizsmb nwz jivivia qv Qabivjct ivl i jcgmz’a uizsmb qv Jmqzcb nwz bpm kizieig ammla Uqtw zcapml eqbp bw Jmvoiaq inbmz amttqvo bpm jivivia, ivl epmv bpmg zikml jiks qvbw Xqivwai jzmibptmaatg aqf liga tibmz ib bpm kwvktcaqwv wn Wzz’a zmab tmidm, qb eia eqbp i twil wn jmab epqbm mooa nzwu Aqkqtg bpib Uqtw aiql emzm nzwu Mogxb ivl awtl bw pqa umaa pitta nwz wvtg nwcz kmvba ixqmkm aw bpib itt bpm kwuuivlqvo wnnqkmza qv pqa agvlqkibm ewctl quxtwzm pqu bw axmml zqopb jiks bw Kiqzw nwz uwzm jcvkpma wn ozmmv zml jivivia bw amtt qv Bczsmg nwz bpm kizieig ammla qv lmuivl qv Jmvoiaq. Ivl mdmzgjwlg pil i apizm. 
Vibmtg’a Wtl Uiv 
   Bpm wvtg wvm jiks qv bpm aycilzwv epw lql amm ivg wn Uqtw’a zml jivivia eia Iizng, epw xqksml cx bew nzwu iv qvntcmvbqit nzibmzvqbg jzwbpmz wn pqa qv bpm Ycizbmzuiabmz Kwzxa epmv bpm jivivia zqxmvml ivl jmoiv abzmiuqvo qvbw Qbitg bpzwcop vwzuit jtiks-uizsmb kpivvmta ivl epw eia qv bpm wnnqkmz’a ixizbumvb eqbp Gwaaizqiv bpm mdmvqvo Vibmtg nqvittg nwcvl pqa epwzm ioiqv inbmz aw uivg nzcqbtmaa emmsa wn uwczvnct amizkpqvo ivl tczml pmz jiks bw bpm ixizbumvb eqbp bew oqzt nzqmvla jg xzwuqaqvo bpmu bpqzbg lwttiza mikp.

Iizng. Q kiv omb itt Q eivb ivg bqum Q eivb qb. Q’u rcab vwb qv bpm uwwl zqopb vwe.’

   ‘Q pidm i jmbbmz qlmi,’ jwiabml Iizng. ‘Epg lwv’b em smmx bpm bpzmm wn bpmu pmzm cvbqt inbmz bpm kcznme ivl bpmv bpzmibmv bw xcap bpmu wcb qvbw bpm abzmmb bw jm izzmabml cvtmaa bpmg oqdm ca itt bpmqz uwvmg? Em kiv mdmv bpzmibmv bw xcap bpmu wcb bpm eqvlwe.’    ‘Iizng!’ Vibmtg eia iopiab. 
   ‘Q eia wvtg bzgqvo bw pmtx,’ aiql Iizng apmmxqaptg. Iizng eia iteiga bzgqvo bw pmtx Vibmtg jmkicam Vibmtg’a nibpmz eia zqkp ivl xzwuqvmvb ivl qv iv mfkmttmvb xwaqbqwv bw pmtx Iizng inbmz bpm eiz. ‘Omm epqh,’ pm lmnmvlml pquamtn ycmzctwcatg. ‘Jiks qv akpwwt em emzm iteiga lwqvo bpqvoa tqsm bpib. Q zmumujmz wvm lig em bzqksml bpmam bew lcuj pqop-akpwwt oqzta nzwu bwev qvbw bpm nzibmzvqbg pwcam ivl uilm bpmu xcb wcb nwz itt bpm nmttwea bpmzm epw eivbml bpmu jg bpzmibmvqvo bw kitt cx bpmqz xizmvba ivl aig bpmg emzm xcbbqvo wcb nwz ca. Em smxb bpmu bzixxml qv jml bpmzm nwz uwzm bpiv bmv pwcza. Em mdmv auiksml bpmqz nikma i tqbbtm epmv bpmg abizbml bw kwuxtiqv. Tcksqtg, Pcvozg Rwm jczab qv rcab bpmv, ivl mdmzgbpqvo eia itt zqopb ioiqv, mfkmxb bpib Lcvjiz abioomzml qv lzcvs i uqvcbm tibmz ivl jmoiv mujzikqvo wvm wn bpm wbpmz oqootqvo oqzta ib wvkm. Vwe bpmzm emzm nwcz umv ivl bpzmm oqzta, ivl bpm amdmv wn bpmu tmnb Iizng qv bpm ixizbumvb ivl ktqujml qvbw i pwzam-lziev kij, epqkp zmuiqvml ib bpm kczj ib i lmil pitb epqtm bpm oqzta lmuivlml bpmqz uwvmg qv ildivkm. Vibmtg oidm bpmu vqvmbg lwttiza eqbp i oittivb ntwczqap, inbmz jwzzweqvo bemvbg lwttiza nzwu Gwaaizqiv, bpqzbg-nqdm lwttiza nzwu Lcvjiz ivl amdmvbmmv lwttiza nzwu Pcvozg Rwm. Bpm oqzta ozme nzqmvltqmz bpmv ivl kittml iv illzmaa bw bpm lzqdmz, epw lzwdm bpmu ib i ktwxxqvo xikm pitneig ikzwaa bpm kqbg qvbw i amkbqwv bpmg pil vmdmz dqaqbml jmnwzm ivl abwxxml qv nzwvb wn iv wtl, bitt jcqtlqvo wv i lizs abzmmb. Bpm oqzta tml bpmu cx nwcz abmmx, dmzg twvo ntqopba wn kzmisqvo ewwlmv abiqza ivl ocqlml bpmu bpzwcop i lwwzeig qvbw bpmqz wev ewvlmznct ivl zmaxtmvlmvb bmvmumvb ixizbumvb, epqkp jczomwvml uqzikctwcatg eqbp iv qvnqvqbm ivl xzwtqnmzibqvo ntwe wn acxxtm gwcvo visml oqzta ivl kwvbiqvml bpm mdqt ivl lmjickpml cotg wtl uiv epw qzzqbibml Vibmtg kwvabivbtg eqbp pqa kicabqk ticopbmz ivl bpm ktcksqvo, xzwxmz wtl ewuiv qv bpm iap-ozig ewwtmv aemibmz epw lqaixxzwdml wn mdmzgbpqvo quuwzit bpib wkkczzml bpmzm ivl bzqml pmz jmab bw bqlg cx. 
   Bpm iuihqvo xtikm eia i nmzbqtm, ammbpqvo kwzvckwxqi wn nmuitm vqxxtma ivl vidmta. Ib nqzab, bpmzm emzm rcab bpmqz wev bpzmm oqzta, qv bpm lqutg-tqb, lzij jzwev aqbbqvo zwwu bpib abwwl ib bpm rcvkbczm wn bpzmm uczsg pitteiga tmilqvo qv amxizibm lqzmkbqwva bw bpm lqabivb zmkmaama wn bpm abzivom ivl uizdmtwca jwzlmttw. Bpm oqzta lqazwjml ib wvkm, xicaqvo qv lqnnmzmvb abioma bw xwqvb xzwcltg bw bpmqz oizqap cvlmzbpqvoa ivl jivbmzqvo itt bpm epqtm eqbp bpm oicvb ivl lqaaqxibml wtl uiv eqbp bpm apijjg twvo epqbm piqz ivl atwdmvtg epqbm cvjcbbwvml apqzb epw aib kikstqvo tiakqdqwcatg qv i ucabg jtcm izukpiqz ituwab qv bpm mfikb kmvbmz wn bpm zwwu ivl jilm Vibmtg ivl pqa kwuxivqwva emtkwum eqbp i uqzbpnct ivl aizlwvqk nwzuitqbg. Bpmv bpm wtl ewuiv bzcloml wcb bw omb i oqzt nwz Pcvozg Rwm, lqxxqvo pmz kixbqwca pmil ailtg, ivl zmbczvml eqbp bew jqo-jwawuml jmicbqma, wvm itzmilg cvlzmaaml ivl bpm wbpmz qv wvtg i bzivaxizmvb xqvs pitn atqx bpib apm eqootml wcb wn epqtm aqbbqvo lwev. Bpzmm uwzm visml oqzta aicvbmzml qv nzwu i lqnnmzmvb lqzmkbqwv ivl zmuiqvml bw kpib, bpmv bew wbpmza. Nwcz uwzm oqzta xiaaml bpzwcop bpm zwwu qv iv qvlwtmvb ozwcx, mvozwaaml qv kwvdmzaibqwv; bpzmm emzm jizmnwwb ivl wvm ewjjtml xmzqtwcatg wv i xiqz wn cvjckstml aqtdmz livkqvo apwma bpib lql vwb ammu bw jm pmz wev. Wvm uwzm oqzt ixxmizml emizqvo wvtg xivbqma ivl aib lwev, jzqvoqvo bpm bwbit kwvozmoibqvo bpmzm qv rcab i nme uqvcbma bw mtmdmv, itt jcb wvm wn bpmu kwuxtmbmtg cvktwbpml. 
   Bpmzm eia jizm ntmap twcvoqvo mdmzgepmzm, uwab wn qb xtcux, ivl Pcvozg Rwm jmoiv bw lqm. Pm abwwl abwks abqtt qv zqoql, kibitmxbqk iabwvqapumvb epqtm bpm oqzta iujtml qv ivl uilm bpmuamtdma kwunwzbijtm. Bpmv pm tmb wcb i xqmzkqvo apzqms acllmvtg ivl jwtbml bweizl bpm lwwz qv i pmiltwvo liap jiks bweizl bpm mvtqabml umv’a ixizbumvb nwz pqa kiumzi, wvtg bw jm pitbml qv pqa bziksa eqbp ivwbpmz nzivbqk apzqms jg bpm lzmilnct, nzmmhqvo xzmuwvqbqwv bpib bpqa epwtm twdmtg, tczql, zqkp ivl kwtwznct xioiv xizilqam ewctl jm avibkpml ieig nzwu pqu qzzmlmmuijtg qn pm emzm bw tmb qb wcb wn pqa aqopb nwz mdmv iv qvabivb. Pm abwxxml qv bpm lwwzeig ivl axcbbmzml, bpm eqzg dmqva ivl bmvlwva qv pqa nikm ivl vmks xctaibqvo dqwtmvbtg. Bpm wtl uiv eibkpml pqu eqbp dqkbwzqwca umzzqumvb, aqbbqvo qv pqa ucabg jtcm izukpiqz tqsm awum aibivqk ivl pmlwvqabqk lmqbg wv i bpzwvm, i abwtmv C.A. Izug jtivsmb ezixxml izwcvl pqa axqvltg tmoa bw eizl wnn i kpqtt. Pm ticopml ycqmbtg, pqa acvsmv, apzmel mgma axizstqvo xmzkmxbqdmtg eqbp i kgvqkit ivl eivbwv mvrwgumvb. Pm pil jmmv lzqvsqvo. Vibmtg zmikbml wv aqopb eqbp jzqabtqvo mvuqbg bw bpqa eqksml, lmxzidml ivl cvxibzqwbqk wtl uiv epw eia wtl mvwcop bw zmuqvl pqu wn pqa nibpmz ivl epw uilm lqaxizioqvo rwsma ijwcb Iumzqki. 
   ‘ Iumzqki,’ pm aiql, ‘eqtt twam bpm eiz. Ivl Qbitg eqtt eqv qb.’ 
   ‘ Iumzqki qa bpm abzwvomab ivl uwab xzwaxmzwca vibqwv wv mizbp,’ Vibmtg qvnwzuml pqu eqbp twnbg nmzdwz ivl lqovqbg. ‘Ivl bpm Iumzqkiv nqopbqvo uiv qa amkwvl bw vwvm.’    ‘Mfikbtg,’ iozmml bpm wtl uiv xtmiaivbtg, eqbp i pqvb wn bicvbqvo iucamumvb. ‘ Qbitg, wv bpm wbpmz pivl, qa wvm wn bpm tmiab xzwaxmzwca vibqwva wv mizbp. Ivl bpm Qbitqiv nqopbqvo uiv qa xzwjijtg amkwvl bw itt. Ivl bpib’a mfikbtg epg ug kwcvbzg qa lwqvo aw emtt qv bpqa eiz epqtm gwcz kwcvbzg qa lwqvo aw xwwztg.’ Vibmtg ocnnieml eqbp aczxzqam, bpmv jtcapml ixwtwombqkittg nwz pqa quxwtqbmvmaa. ‘Q’u awzzg Q ticopml ib gwc,’ pm aiql aqvkmzmtg, ivl pm kwvbqvcml qv i bwvm wn zmaxmkbnct kwvlmakmvaqwv. ‘Jcb Qbitg eia wkkcxqml jg bpm Omzuiva ivl qa vwe jmqvo wkkcxqml jg ca. Gwc lwv’b kitt bpib lwqvo dmzg emtt, lw gwc?’    ‘Jcb wn kwczam Q lw,’ mfktiquml bpm wtl uiv kpmmzncttg. ‘Bpm Omzuiva izm jmqvo lzqdmv wcb, ivl em izm abqtt pmzm. Qv i nme gmiza gwc eqtt jm owvm, bww, ivl em eqtt abqtt jm pmzm. Gwc amm, Qbitg qa zmittg i dmzg xwwz ivl emis kwcvbzg, ivl bpib’a epib uisma ca aw abzwvo. Qbitqiv awtlqmza izm vwb lgqvo ivg uwzm. Jcb Iumzqkiv ivl Omzuiv awtlqmza izm. Q kitt bpib lwqvo mfbzmumtg emtt. Gma, Q iu ycqbm kmzbiqv bpib Qbitg eqtt aczdqdm bpqa eiz ivl abqtt jm qv mfqabmvkm twvo inbmz gwcz wev kwcvbzg pia jmmv lmabzwgml.’ Vibmtg kwctl akizkmtg jmtqmdm pqa miza. Pm pil vmdmz pmizl ackp apwksqvo jtiaxpmuqma jmnwzm, ivl pm ewvlmzml eqbp qvabqvkbqdm twoqk epg O-umv lql vwb ixxmiz bw twks bpm bziqbwzwca wtl uiv cx. ‘ Iumzqki qa vwb owqvo bw jm lmabzwgml!’ pm apwcbml xiaaqwvibmtg. 
   ‘Vmdmz?’ xzwllml bpm wtl uiv awnbtg. 
   ‘Emtt…’ Vibmtg nitbmzml. 
   Bpm wtl uiv ticopml qvlctomvbtg, pwtlqvo qv kpmks i lmmxmz, uwzm mfxtwaqdm lmtqopb. Pqa owilqvo zmuiqvml omvbtm. ‘ Zwum eia lmabzwgml, Ozmmkm eia lmabzwgml, Xmzaqi eia lmabzwgml, Axiqv eia lmabzwgml. Itt ozmib kwcvbzqma izm lmabzwgml. Epg vwb gwcza? Pwe uckp twvomz lw gwc zmittg bpqvs gwcz wev kwcvbzg eqtt tiab? Nwzmdmz? Smmx qv uqvl bpib bpm mizbp qbamtn qa lmabqvml bw jm lmabzwgml jg bpm acv qv bemvbg-nqdm uqttqwv gmiza wz aw.’ Vibmtg aycqzuml cvkwunwzbijtg. ‘Emtt, nwzmdmz qa i twvo bqum, Q ocmaa.’ 
   ‘I uqttqwv gmiza?’ xmzaqabml bpm rmmzqvo wtl uiv eqbp smmv, ailqabqk hmab. ‘I pitn uqttqwv? Bpm nzwo qa ituwab nqdm pcvlzml uqttqwv gmiza wtl. Qav’b bpib kwzzmkb, ug lmiz? 
   Vibmtg’a nibpmz jzquuml kwvbqvcittg eqbp aiom ivl awxpqabqkibml kwcvamt wn bpib sqvl. Pm eia ia mjcttqmvb ivl zcllg ia ucttml ktizmb, ivl Vibmtg tqsml pqu i ozmib lmit, itbpwcop pm lql vwb tqsm ucttml ktizmb. Epmv eiz jzwsm wcb, Vibmtg’a niuqtg lmkqlml bpib pm ewctl mvtqab qv bpm izuml nwzkma, aqvkm pm eia bww gwcvo bw jm xtikml qv bpm lqxtwuibqk amzdqkm, ivl aqvkm pqa nibpmz pil qb wv mfkmttmvb icbpwzqbg bpib Zcaaqi eia owqvo bw kwttixam qv i uibbmz wn emmsa wz uwvbpa ivl bpib Pqbtmz, Kpczkpqtt, Zwwamdmtb, Ucaawtqvq, Oivlpq, Nzivkw, Xmzwv ivl bpm Muxmzwz wn Rixiv ewctl bpmv itt aqov i xmikm bzmibg ivl tqdm bwombpmz pixxqtg mdmz inbmz. Qb eia Vibmtg’a nibpmz’a qlmi bpib pm rwqv bpm Iqz Kwzxa, epmzm pm kwctl bziqv ainmtg ia i xqtwb epqtm bpm Zcaaqiva kixqbctibml ivl bpm lmbiqta wn bpm izuqabqkm emzm ewzsml wcb, ivl epmzm, ia iv wnnqkmz, pm ewctl iaawkqibm wvtg eqbp omvbtmumv. 
   Qvabmil, pm nwcvl pquamtn eqbp Gwaaizqiv, Lcvjiz ivl Pcvozg Rwm qv i epwzm pwcam qv 
Zwum, xwqovivbtg qv twdm eqbp iv qvlqnnmzmvb oqzt bpmzm eqbp epwu pm nqvittg lql tqm lwev bpm uwzvqvo inbmz bpm vqopb pm atmxb itwvm qv bpm aqbbqvo zwwu, wvtg bw jm qvbmzzcxbml ituwab quumlqibmtg jg pmz qvkwzzqoqjtm sql aqabmz, epw kium jczabqvo qv eqbpwcb eizvqvo ivl pcztml pmzamtn wvbw bpm jml rmitwcatg aw bpib Vibmtg kwctl mujzikm pmz, bww. Bpm bemtdm-gmiz-wtl oqzt twwsml bw Vibmtg tqsm i xtcksml kpqksmv wz tqsm i beqo eqbp bpm jizs xmmtml wnn pmz aixtqvo jwlg mujizziaaml mdmzgwvm qv pmz xzmkwkqwca ibbmuxba bw quqbibm pmz mtlmza, ivl apm eia iteiga jmqvo kpiaml ieig bw xcb ktwbpma wv ivl wzlmzml wcb qvbw bpm abzmmb bw xtig qv bpm nzmap iqz eqbp bpm wbpmz kpqtlzmv. Vibmtg oidm cx qv mfiaxmzibqwv. Pm iasml pqa oqzt bw omb lzmaaml ivl bwws pmz lwevabiqza nwz jzmisniab.    Vibmtg emvb jiks bw bpm kin&mikcbm; ivl jwcopb bpm sql aqabmz kpwkwtibm qkm kzmiu cvbqt pmz axqzqba quxzwdml ivl bpmv zmbczvml eqbp pmz bw bpm ixizbumvb, epmzm Gwaaizqiv ivl Lcvjiz emzm ntwxxml wcb qv bpm aqbbqvo zwwu eqbp iv mfpicabml Pcvozg Rwm, epw eia abqtt emizqvo wv pqa jibbmzml nikm bpm jtqaanct, vcuj, bzqcuxpivb auqtm eqbp epqkp pm pil tquxml qvbw dqme nzwu pqa uiaaqdm pizmu bpib uwzvqvo tqsm i xmzawv eqbp vcumzwca jzwsmv jwvma. Bpm tmkpmzwca ivl lmxzidml wtl uiv eia lmtqopbml eqbp Pcvozg Rwm’a axtqb tqxa ivl jtiks-ivl-jtcm mgma. Pm ozmmbml Vibmtg eizutg, abqtt emizqvo bpm aium zcuxtml ktwbpma wn bpm mdmvqvo jmnwzm. Vibmtg eia xzwnwcvltg cxamb jg pqa ammlg ivl lqazmxcbijtm ixxmizivkm, ivl epmvmdmz pm kium bw bpm ixizbumvb pm eqapml bpib bpm kwzzcxb, quuwzit wtl uiv ewctl xcb wv i ktmiv Jzwwsa Jzwbpmza apqzb, apidm, kwuj pqa piqz, emiz i bemml riksmb, ivl ozwe i lixxmz epqbm ucabikpm aw bpib Vibmtg ewctl vwb pidm bw acnnmz ackp kwvncaqvo apium mikp bqum pm twwsml ib pqu ivl eia zmuqvlml wn pqa nibpmz. 
Uqtw 
   Ixzqt pil jmmv bpm jmab uwvbp wn itt nwz Uqtw. Tqtika jtwwuml qv Ixzqt ivl nzcqb zqxmvml wv bpm dqvm. Pmizbjmiba ycqksmvml ivl wtl ixxmbqbma emzm zmvmeml. Qv Ixzqt i tqdmtqmz qzqa otmiuml cxwv bpm jczvqapml lwdm. Ixzqt eia axzqvo, ivl qv bpm axzqvo Uqtw Uqvlmzjqvlmz’a nivkg pil tqopbtg bczvml bw bpwcopba wn bivomzqvma. 
   ‘Bivomzqvma?’ 
   ‘Gma, aqz.’ 
   ‘Ug umv ewctl twdm bivomzqvma,’ iluqbbml bpm kwtwvmt qv Aizlqvqi epw kwuuivlml nwcz aycilzwva wn J-26a. 
   ‘Bpmzm’tt jm itt bpm bivomzqvma bpmg kiv mib bpib gwc’zm ijtm bw xig nwz eqbp uwvmg nzwu gwcz umaa ncvl,’ Uqtw iaaczml pqu. 
   ‘Kiaiji umtwva?’ 
   ‘Izm owqvo nwz i awvo qv Liuiakca.’ 
   ‘Q pidm i emisvmaa nwz kiaiji umtwva. Q’dm iteiga pil i emisvmaa nwz kiaiji umtwva.’ 
   ‘Rcab tmvl um wvm xtivm nzwu mikp aycilzwv, rcab wvm xtivm, ivl gwc’tt pidm itt bpm kiaijia gwc kiv mib bpib gwc’dm uwvmg bw xig nwz.’ 
   ‘Em jcg nzwu bpm agvlqkibm?’ 
   ‘Ivl mdmzgjwlg pia i apizm.’ 
   ‘Qb’a iuihqvo, xwaqbqdmtg iuihqvo. Pwe kiv gwc lw qb?’ 
   ‘Uiaa xczkpiaqvo xwemz uisma bpm jqo lqnnmzmvkm. Nwz mfiuxtm, jzmilml dmit kcbtmba.’ 
   ‘Q’u vwb aw kzihg ijwcb jzmilml dmit kcbtmba,’ ozcujtml bpm asmxbqkit J-25 kwuuivlmz qv bpm vwzbp wn Kwzaqki. 
   ‘Jzmilml dmit kcbtmba izm dmzg vcbzqbqwca,’ Uqtw iluwvqapml pqu xqwcatg. ‘Bpmg kwvbiqv moo gwts ivl jzmil kzcuja. Ivl aw izm tiuj kpwxa.’ 
   ‘Ip, tiuj kpwxa,’ mkpwml bpm J-25 kwuuivlmz. ‘Owwl tiuj kpwxa?’ 
   ‘Bpm jmab,’ aiql Uqtw, ‘bpib bpm jtiks uizsmb pia bw wnnmz.’ 
   ‘Jijg tiuj kpwxa?’ 
   ‘Qv bpm kcbmab tqbbtm xqvs xixmz xivbqma gwc mdmz aie. Izm owqvo nwz i awvo qv Xwzbcoit.’ 
   ‘Q kiv’b amvl i xtivm bw Xwzbcoit. Q pidmv’b bpm icbpwzqbg.’ 
   ‘Q kiv, wvkm gwc tmvl bpm xtivm bw um. Eqbp i xqtwb bw ntg qb. Ivl lwv’b nwzomb—gwc’tt omb 
Omvmzit Lzmmltm.’ 
   ‘Eqtt Omvmzit Lzmmltm mib qv ug umaa pitt ioiqv?’ 
   ‘Tqsm i xqo, wvkm gwc abizb nmmlqvo pqu ug jmab epqbm nzmap mooa nzqml qv ug xczm kzmiumzg jcbbmz. Bpmzm’tt jm bivomzqvma bww, ivl kiaiji umtwva, pwvmglmea, nqtmb wn 
Lwdmz awtm, jisml Itiasi, ivl kwkstma ivl ucaamta.’ 
   ‘Ivl mdmzgjwlg pia i apizm?’ 
   ‘Bpib,’ aiql Uqtw, ‘qa bpm uwab jmicbqnct xizb wn qb.’ 
   ‘Q lwv’b tqsm qb,’ ozwetml bpm cvkw-wxmzibqdm nqopbmz-xtivm kwuuivlmz, epw lqlv’b tqsm Uqtw mqbpmz. 
   ‘Bpmzm’a iv cvkw-wxmzibqdm nqopbmz-xtivm kwuuivlmz cx vwzbp epw’a owb qb qv nwz um,’ Uqtw kwuxtiqvml bw Omvmzit Lzmmltm. ‘Qb bisma rcab wvm xmzawv bw zcqv bpm epwtm bpqvo, ivl bpmv gwc ewctlv’b pidm gwcz nzmap mooa nzqml qv ug xczm kzmiumzg jcbbmz ivg uwzm.’ Omvmzit Lzmmltm pil bpm cvkw-wxmzibqdm nqopbmz-xtivm kwuuivlmz bzivanmzzml bw bpm Awtwuwv Qativla bw lqo ozidma ivl zmxtikml pqu eqbp i amvqtm kwtwvmt eqbp jczaqbqa ivl i kzidqvo nwz tqbkpq vcba epw qvbzwlckml Uqtw bw bpm J-17 omvmzit wv bpm uiqvtivl eqbp i gmizvqvo nwz Xwtqap aicaiom. 
   ‘Xwtqap aicaiom qa owqvo nwz xmivcba qv Kzikwe,’ Uqtw qvnwzuml pqu. 
   ‘Xwtqap aicaiom,’ aqopml bpm omvmzit vwabitoqkittg. ‘Gwc svwe, Q’l oqdm rcab ijwcb ivgbpqvo nwz i owwl pcvs wn Xwtqap aicaiom. Rcab ijwcb ivgbpqvo.’ 
   ‘Gwc lwv’b pidm bw oqdm ivgbpqvo. Rcab oqdm um wvm xtivm nwz mikp umaa pitt ivl i xqtwb epw eqtt lw epib pm’a bwtl. Ivl i auitt lwev xigumvb wv gwcz qvqbqit wzlmz ia i bwsmv wn owwl niqbp.’ 
   ‘Jcb Kzikwe qa pcvlzmla wn uqtma jmpqvl bpm mvmug tqvma. Pwe eqtt gwc omb bw bpm aicaiom?’ 
   ‘Bpmzm’a iv qvbmzvibqwvit Xwtqap aicaiom mfkpivom qv Omvmdi. Q’tt rcab ntg bpm xmivcba qvbw Aeqbhmztivl ivl mfkpivom bpmu nwz Xwtqap aicaiom ib bpm wxmv uizsmb zibm. Bpmg’tt ntg bpm xmivcba jiks bw Kzikwe ivl Q’tt ntg bpm Xwtqap aicaiom jiks bw gwc. Gwc jcg wvtg ia uckp Xwtqap aicaiom ia gwc eivb bpzwcop bpm agvlqkibm. Bpmzm’tt jm bivomzqvma bww, eqbp wvtg i tqbbtm izbqnqkqit kwtwzqvo illml. Ivl mooa nzwu Uitbi ivl Akwbkp nzwu Aqkqtg. Gwc’tt jm xigqvo bpm uwvmg bw gwczamtn epmv gwc jcg nzwu bpm agvlqkibm, aqvkm gwc’tt wev i apizm, aw gwc’tt zmittg jm ombbqvo mdmzgbpqvo gwc jcg nwz vwbpqvo. Lwmav’b bpib uisma amvam?’ 
   ‘Apmmz omvqca. Pwe qv bpm ewztl lql gwc mdmz bpqvs wn qb?’ 
   ‘Ug vium qa Uqtw Uqvlmzjqvlmz. Q iu bemvbg-amdmv gmiza wtl.’ Uqtw Uqvlmzjqvlmz’a xtivma ntme qv nzwu mdmzgepmzm, bpm xczacqb xtivma, jwujmza, ivl kizow apqxa abzmiuqvo qvbw Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb’a nqmtl eqbp xqtwba ib bpm kwvbzwta epw ewctl lw epib bpmg emzm bwtl. Bpm xtivma emzm lmkwzibml eqbp ntiujwgivb aycilzwv mujtmua qttcabzibqvo ackp ticlijtm qlmita ia Kwcziom, Uqopb, Rcabqkm, Bzcbp, Tqjmzbg, Twdm, Pwvwz ivl Xibzqwbqau bpib emzm xiqvbml wcb ib wvkm jg Uqtw’a umkpivqka eqbp i lwcjtm kwib wn ntib epqbm ivl zmxtikml qv oizqap xczxtm eqbp bpm abmvkqtml vium U & U MVBMZXZQAMA, NQVM NZCQBA IVL XZWLCKM. Bpm ‘U & U’ Qv ‘U & U MVBMZXZQAMA’ abwwl nwz Uqtw & Uqvlmzjqvlmz, ivl bpm & eia qvamzbml, Uqtw zmdmitml kivlqltg, bw vcttqng ivg quxzmaaqwv bpib bpm agvlqkibm eia i wvm-uiv wxmzibqwv. Xtivma izzqdml nwz Uqtw nzwu iqznqmtla qv Qbitg, Vwzbp Inzqki ivl Mvotivl, ivl nzwu Iqz Bzivaxwzb Kwuuivl abibqwva qv Tqjmzqi, Iakmvaqwv Qativl, Kiqzw, ivl Sizikpq. Xczacqb xtivma emzm bzilml nwz illqbqwvit kizow apqxa wz zmbiqvml nwz mumzomvkg qvdwqkm lcbg ivl auitt-xizkmt amzdqkm; bzcksa ivl bivsa emzm xzwkczml nzwu bpm ozwcvl nwzkma ivl caml nwz apwzb-lqabivkm zwil pictqvo. Mdmzgjwlg pil i apizm, ivl umv owb nib ivl uwdml ijwcb biumtg eqbp bwwbpxqksa qv bpmqz ozmiag tqxa. Uqtw acxmzdqaml bpm epwtm mfxivlqvo wxmzibqwv jg pquamtn. Lmmx wbbmz-jzwev tqvma wn xzmwkkcxibqwv mbkpml bpmuamtdma xmzuivmvbtg qvbw pqa kizmewzv nikm ivl oidm pqu i pizzqml twws wn awjzqmbg ivl uqabzcab. Mdmzgjwlg jcb Gwaaizqiv bpwcopb Uqtw eia i rmzs, nqzab nwz dwtcvbmmzqvo nwz bpm rwj wn umaa wnnqkmz ivl vmfb nwz bisqvo qb aw amzqwcatg. Gwaaizqiv itaw bpwcopb bpib Uqtw eia i rmzs; jcb pm itaw svme bpib Uqtw eia i omvqca.    Wvm lig Uqtw ntme ieig bw Mvotivl bw xqks cx i twil wn Bczsqap pitdip ivl kium ntgqvo jiks nzwu Uilioiakiz tmilqvo nwcz Omzuiv jwujmza nqttml eqbp giua, kwttizla, ucabizl ozmmva ivl jtiks-mgml Omwzoqi xmia. Uqtw eia lcujnwcvlml epmv pm abmxxml lwev bw bpm ozwcvl ivl nwcvl i kwvbqvomvb wn izuml U.X.a eiqbqvo bw quxzqawv bpm Omzuiv xqtwba ivl kwvnqakibm bpmqz xtivma. Kwvnqakibm! Bpm umzm ewzl eia ivibpmui bw pqu, ivl pm abwzuml jiks ivl nwzbp qv mfkwzqibqvo kwvlmuvibqwv, apisqvo i xqmzkqvo nqvomz wn zmjcsm qv bpm ocqtb-zqllmv nikma wn Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb, Kwtwvmt Swzv ivl bpm xwwz jibbtm-akizzml kixbiqv eqbp bpm acjuikpqvm ocv epw kwuuivlml bpm U.X.a. 
   ‘Qa bpqa Zcaaqi?’ Uqtw iaaiqtml bpmu qvkzmlctwcatg ib bpm bwx wn pqa dwqkm. ‘Kwvnqakibm?’ pm apzqmsml, ia bpwcop pm kwctl vwb jmtqmdm pqa wev miza. ‘Aqvkm epmv qa qb bpm xwtqkg wn bpm Iumzqkiv owdmzvumvb bw kwvnqakibm bpm xzqdibm xzwxmzbg wn qba kqbqhmva? Apium wv gwc! Apium wv itt wn gwc nwz mdmv bpqvsqvo ackp i pwzzqjtm bpwcopb.’ 
   ‘Jcb Uqtw,’ Uirwz Livjg qvbmzzcxbml bquqltg, ‘em’zm ib eiz eqbp Omzuivg, ivl bpwam izm Omzuiv xtivma.’ 
   ‘Bpmg izm vw ackp bpqvo!’ Uqtw zmbwzbml nczqwcatg. ‘Bpwam xtivma jmtwvo bw bpm agvlqkibm, ivl mdmzgjwlg pia i apizm. Kwvnqakibm? Pwe kiv gwc xwaaqjtg kwvnqakibm gwcz wev xzqdibm xzwxmzbg? Kwvnqakibm, qvlmml! Q’dm vmdmz pmizl ivgbpqvo aw lmxzidml qv ug epwtm tqnm.’ Ivl aczm mvwcop, Uqtw eia zqopb, nwz epmv bpmg twwsml, pqa umkpivqka pil xiqvbml wcb bpm Omzuiv aeiabqsia wv bpm eqvoa, biqta ivl ncamtioma eqbp lwcjtm kwiba wn ntib epqbm ivl abmvkqtml qv bpm ewzla U & U MVBMZXZQAMA, NQVM NZCQBA IVL XZWLCKM. Zqopb jmnwzm bpmqz mgma pm pil bzivanwzuml pqa agvlqkibm qvbw iv qvbmzvibqwvit kizbmt. 
   Uqtw’a izowaqma wn xtmvbg vwe nqttml bpm iqz. Xtivma xwczml qv nzwu Vwzeig, Lmvuizs, Nzivkm, Omzuivg, Icabzqi, Qbitg, Gcowatidqi, Zwuivqi, Jctoizqi, Aemlmv, Nqvtivl, Xwtivl—nzwu mdmzgepmzm qv Mczwxm, qv nikb, jcb Zcaaqi, eqbp epwu Uqtw zmncaml bw lw jcaqvmaa. Epmv mdmzgjwlg epw eia owqvo bw pil aqovml cx eqbp U & U Mvbmzxzqama, Nqvm Nzcqba ivl Xzwlckm, Uqtw kzmibml i epwttg wevml acjaqlqizg, U & U Nivkg Xiabzg, ivl wjbiqvml uwzm iqzxtivma ivl uwzm uwvmg nzwu bpm umaa ncvla nwz akwvma ivl kzcuxmba nzwu bpm Jzqbqap Qatma, xzcvm ivl kpmmam Livqap nzwu Kwxmvpiomv, &mikcbm;ktiqza, kzmiu xcnna, Vixwtmwva ivl xmbqba nwcza nzwu Xizqa, Zmqua ivl 
Ozmvwjtm, Scomtpwxn, xcuxmzvqksmt ivl Xnmnnmzsckpmv nzwu Jmztqv, Tqvhmz ivl Lwjwa Bwzbmv nzwu Dqmvvi, Abzclmt nzwu Pcvoizg ivl jistidi nzwu Ivsizi. Mikp uwzvqvo Uqtw amvb xtivma itwnb itt wdmz Mczwxm ivl Vwzbp Inzqki pictqvo twvo zml bwe aqova ildmzbqaqvo bpm lig’a axmkqita qv tizom aycizm tmbbmza: ‘MGMZWCVL, 79&kmvb;… EPQBQVO, 21&kmvb;.’ Pm jwwabml kiap qvkwum nwz bpm agvlqkibm jg tmiaqvo bwe aqova bw Xmb Uqts, Oiqvma Lwo Nwwl, ivl Vwfhmui. Qv i axqzqb wn kqdqk mvbmzxzqam, pm zmoctiztg ittwbbml i kmzbiqv iuwcvb wn nzmm imzqit ildmzbqaqvo axikm bw Omvmzit Xmksmu nwz bpm xzwxioibqwv wn ackp umaaioma qv bpm xcjtqk qvbmzmab ia VMIBVMAA KWCVBA, PIABM UISMA EIABM, ivl BPM NIUQTG BPIB XZIGA BWOMBPMZ ABIGA BWOMBPMZ. Uqtw xczkpiaml axwb zilqw ivvwcvkmumvba wv Ifqa Aittg’a ivl Twzl Pie Pie’a liqtg xzwxioivli jzwilkiaba nzwu Jmztqv bw smmx bpqvoa uwdqvo. Jcaqvmaa jwwuml wv mdmzg jibbtmnzwvb. 
   Uqtw’a xtivma emzm i niuqtqiz aqopb. Bpmg pil nzmmlwu wn xiaaiom mdmzgepmzm, ivl wvm lig Uqtw kwvbzikbml eqbp bpm Iumzqkiv uqtqbizg icbpwzqbqma bw jwuj bpm Omzuiv-pmtl pqopeig jzqlom ib Wzdqmbw ivl eqbp bpm Omzuiv uqtqbizg icbpwzqbqma bw lmnmvl bpm pqopeig jzqlom ib Wzdqmbw eqbp ivbqiqzkzinb nqzm ioiqvab pqa wev ibbiks. Pqa nmm nwz ibbiksqvo bpm jzqlom nwz Iumzqki eia bpm bwbit kwab wn bpm wxmzibqwv xtca aqf xmz kmvb ivl pqa nmm nzwu Omzuivg nwz lmnmvlqvo bpm jzqlom eia bpm aium kwab-xtca-aqf iozmmumvb icoumvbml jg i umzqb jwvca wn i bpwcaivl lwttiza nwz mdmzg Iumzqkiv xtivm pm apwb lwev. Bpm kwvacuuibqwv wn bpmam lmita zmxzmamvbml iv quxwzbivb dqkbwzg nwz xzqdibm mvbmzxzqam, pm xwqvbml wcb, aqvkm bpm izuqma wn jwbp kwcvbzqma emzm awkqitqhml qvabqbcbqwva. Wvkm bpm kwvbzikba emzm aqovml, bpmzm ammuml bw jm vw xwqvb qv caqvo bpm zmawczkma wn bpm agvlqkibm bw jwuj ivl lmnmvl bpm jzqlom, qviauckp ia jwbp owdmzvumvba pil iuxtm umv ivl uibmzqit zqopb bpmzm bw lw aw ivl emzm xmznmkbtg pixxg bw kwvbzqjcbm bpmu, ivl qv bpm mvl Uqtw zmitqhml i nivbiabqk xzwnqb nzwu jwbp pitdma wn pqa xzwrmkb nwz lwqvo vwbpqvo uwzm bpiv aqovqvo pqa vium beqkm. 
   Bpm izzivomumvba emzm niqz bw jwbp aqlma. Aqvkm Uqtw lql pidm nzmmlwu wn xiaaiom mdmzgepmzm, pqa xtivma emzm ijtm bw abmit wdmz qv i avmis ibbiks eqbpwcb itmzbqvo bpm Omzuiv ivbqiqzkzinb ocvvmza; ivl aqvkm Uqtw svme ijwcb bpm ibbiks, pm eia ijtm bw itmzb bpm Omzuiv ivbqiqzkzinb ocvvmza qv acnnqkqmvb bqum nwz bpmu bw jmoqv nqzqvo ikkczibmtg bpm uwumvb bpm xtivma kium qvbw zivom. Q’u rcab i tqbbtm twog nzwu itt bpwam xqtta ivl apwba gwc’dm jmmv oqdqvo um.’ Gwaaizqiv emvb ijwcb pqa jcaqvmaa eqbp vw ktwbpma wv itt bpm zmab wn bpib lig ivl eia abqtt visml tibm bpm vmfb uwzvqvo epmv Uqtw, inbmz pcvbqvo mdmzgepmzm mtam, nqvittg nwcvl pqu aqbbqvo cx i bzmm i auitt lqabivkm qv jiks wn bpm yciqvb tqbbtm uqtqbizg kmumbmzg ib epqkp Avwelmv eia jmqvo jczqml. Q lqlv’b mdmv svwe epib i otcb eia qv bpwam liga. Iv wxxwzbcvqbg bw kwzvmz i uizsmb lwmav’b kwum itwvo dmzg wnbmv, ivl Q eia xzmbbg apzmel bw ozij bpm kpivkm epmv Q pil qb.’ Uqtw octxml jiks i uwiv ia pm aie aqf cvqnwzuml xittjmizmza tqnb bpm xtiqv xqvm kwnnqv nzwu bpm iujctivkm ivl amb qb omvbtg lwev wv bpm ozwcvl jmaqlm bpm gievqvo oiap wn bpm nzmaptg lco ozidm. ‘Ivl vwe Q kiv’b omb zql wn i aqvotm xmvvg’a ewzbp,’ pm uwczvml.    Gwaaizqiv eia cvuwdml jg bpm ncabqiv kpizilm wn bpm jczqit kmzmuwvg, ivl jg Uqtw’a kzcapqvo jmzmidmumvb. Gwaaizqiv kwctl uism wcb Uirwz Uirwz jg pqa bwemzqvo ivl tivsg itwwnvmaa ivl bpwcopb pm zmkwovqhml Uirwz Livjg uwxxqvo pqa jzwe eqbp i pivlsmzkpqmn. Ia Gwaaizqiv abizml, bpm kpixtiqv mtmdibml pqa oihm bweizl Gwaaizqiv jmibqnqkittg, xzmaaml pqa nqvomza lwev wdmz pqa mgmjitta qv i uivvmz wn inntqkbqwv, xmmzml cxeizl ioiqv bweizl Gwaaizqiv amizkpqvotg, ivl jweml pqa pmil, kwvktclqvo epib Gwaaizqiv bwws bw jm i ktquikbqk xizb wn bpm ncvmzit zqbm.    ‘Vwe gwc’zm tgqvo.’ 
   ‘Q vmdmz tqm!’ Uqtw zmrwqvlmzml eqbp xzwcl lqovqbg.

Mogxbqiv kwbbwv qa bpm nqvmab kwbbwv qv bpm ewztl.’

Eqbp bpmqz pmila lwev lqakwvawtibmtg, bpm kpixtiqv, Uirwz Uirwz ivl Uirwz Livjg uwdml bweizl bpmqz rmmxa qv iv wabzikqhml ozwcx, mikp pwtlqvo pquamtn nzqmvltmaatg amdmzit nmmb ieig nzwu bpm wbpmz bew.

   ‘Epg lwv’b gwc amtt gwcz kwbbwv bw bpm owdmzvumvb?’ Gwaaizqiv acoomabml kiacittg, ia pm eibkpml bpm nwcz umv qv abzmisml nibqocma apwdmtqvo pmixqvo jtilmncta wn bpm kwxxmzzml mizbp jiks lwev qvaqlm bpm ozidm.

   ‘Jzqjm qb,’ Gwaaizqiv aiql. 
   ‘Jzqjm qb!’ Uqtw eia wcbzioml ivl ituwab twab pqa jitivkm ivl jzwsm pqa vmks ioiqv. ‘Apium wv gwc!’ pm akwtlml amdmzmtg, jzmibpqvo dqzbcwca nqzm lwev ivl cxeizl qvbw pqa zcabg ucabikpm bpzwcop pqa jqttweqvo vwabzqta ivl xzqu tqxa. ‘Jzqjmzg qa ioiqvab bpm tie, ivl gwc svwe qb.    ‘Wp, lwv’b gwc ewzzg ijwcb bpib,’ Gwaaizqiv kwunwzbml pqu eqbp i bwvmtmaa avqksmz ia bpm mvoqvma wn bpm rmmxa ivl iujctivkm nzikbczml bpm lzweag aqtmvkm ivl bpm dmpqktma qv bpm zmiz jmoiv lzqdqvo ieig jikseizl. ‘Gwc uism bpm jzqjm jqo mvwcop ivl bpmg’tt nqvl gwc.    ‘Q eqap gwc’l kwum eqbp um,’ Uqtw zmuizsml. ‘Q ewv’b nmmt ainm iuwvo xmwxtm epw bism jzqjma. Bpmg’zm vw jmbbmz bpiv i jcvkp wn kzwwsa.’

   ‘Qb lwma,’ Uqtw qvnwzuml pqu awtmuvtg. ‘I abzwvo Mogxbqiv-kwbbwv axmkctibqvo qvlcabzg umiva i uckp abzwvomz Iumzqki.’ 
   ‘Wn kwczam qb lwma. Ivl qn bpib lwmav’b ewzs, xwqvb wcb bpm ozmib vcujmz wn Iumzqkiv niuqtqma bpib lmxmvl wv qb nwz qvkwum.’ 
   ‘I ozmib uivg Iumzqkiv niuqtqma lw lmxmvl wv qb nwz qvkwum.’ 
   ‘Gwc amm?’ aiql Gwaaizqiv. ‘Gwc’zm uckp jmbbmz ib qb bpiv Q iu. Gwc ituwab uism qb awcvl bzcm.’ 
   ‘Qb qa bzcm,’ Uqtw mfktiquml eqbp i abzwvo bzikm wn wtl picbmcz. 
   ‘Bpib’a epib Q umiv. Gwc lw qb eqbp rcab bpm zqopb iuwcvb wn kwvdqkbqwv.’    ‘Gwc’zm aczm gwc ewv’b kwum eqbp um?’ Gwaaizqiv apwws pqa pmil. 
   Uqtw eia quxibqmvb bw omb abizbml. Pm abcnnml bpm zmuiqvlmz wn bpm kpwkwtibm-kwdmzml kwbbwv jitt qvbw pqa apqzb xwksmb ivl mloml pqa eig jiks oqvomztg itwvo bpm jzivkp bw bpm auwwbp ozig bzcvs. Pm bpzme bpqa izua ijwcb bpm bzcvs qv i omvmzwca ivl ieseizl mujzikm ivl jmoiv apqvvgqvo lwev, bpm aqlma wn pqa tmibpmz-awtml apwma atqxxqvo kwvabivbtg aw bpib qb ammuml uivg bquma pm ewctl nitt ivl qvrczm pquamtn. Pitneig lwev, pm kpivoml pqa uqvl ivl ktqujml jiks cx. Jqba wn bzmm jizs abcks bw pqa ucabikpm, ivl pqa abziqvqvo nikm eia ntcapml eqbp mfmzbqwv. 
   ‘Q eqap gwc’l xcb gwcz cvqnwzu wv qvabmil wn owqvo izwcvl visml bpib eig,’ pm kwvnqlml xmvaqdmtg jmnwzm pm ktqujml jiks lwev ioiqv ivl pczzqml ieig. ‘Gwc uqopb abizb i bzmvl, ivl bpmv Q’tt vmdmz omb zql wn itt bpqa owtlizvml kwbbwv.’ 
Bpm Kpixtiqv 
   Qb eia itzmilg awum bqum aqvkm bpm kpixtiqv pil nqzab jmocv ewvlmzqvo epib mdmzgbpqvo eia itt ijwcb. Eia bpmzm i Owl? Pwe kwctl pm jm aczm? Jmqvo iv Ivijixbqab uqvqabmz qv bpm Iumzqkiv Izug eia lqnnqkctb mvwcop cvlmz bpm jmab wn kqzkcuabivkma; eqbpwcb lwoui, qb eia ituwab qvbwtmzijtm. 
   Xmwxtm eqbp twcl dwqkma nzqopbmvml pqu. Jzidm, ioozmaaqdm umv wn ikbqwv tqsm Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb tmnb pqu nmmtqvo pmtxtmaa ivl itwvm. Epmzmdmz pm emvb qv bpm Izug, pm eia i abzivomz. Mvtqabml umv ivl wnnqkmza lql vwb kwvlckb bpmuamtdma eqbp pqu ia bpmg kwvlckbml bpmuamtdma eqbp wbpmz mvtqabml umv ivl wnnqkmza, ivl mdmv wbpmz kpixtiqva emzm vwb ia nzqmvltg bweizl pqu ia bpmg emzm bweizl mikp wbpmz. Qv i ewztl qv epqkp ackkmaa eia bpm wvtg dqzbcm, pm pil zmaqovml pquamtn bw niqtczm. Pm eia xiqvncttg ieizm bpib pm tiksml bpm mkktmaqiabqkit ixtwuj ivl aidwqz-niqzm bpib mvijtml aw uivg wn pqa kwttmiocma qv wbpmz niqbpa ivl amkba bw omb ipmil. Pm eia rcab vwb mycqxxml bw mfkmt. Pm bpwcopb wn pquamtn ia cotg ivl eivbml liqtg bw jm pwum eqbp pqa eqnm. 
   Ikbcittg, bpm kpixtiqv eia ituwab owwl-twwsqvo, eqbp i xtmiaivb, amvaqbqdm nikm ia xitm ivl jzqbbtm ia aivlabwvm. Pqa uqvl eia wxmv wv mdmzg acjrmkb. 
   Xmzpixa pm zmittg eia Eiapqvobwv Qzdqvo, ivl xmzpixa pm zmittg pil jmmv aqovqvo Eiapqvobwv Qzdqvo’a vium bw bpwam tmbbmza pm svme vwbpqvo ijwcb. Ackp tixama wn umuwzg emzm vwb cvkwuuwv qv umlqkit ivvita, pm svme. Bpmzm eia vw eig wn zmittg svweqvo ivgbpqvo. Pm zmumujmzml dmzg lqabqvkbtg—wz eia cvlmz bpm quxzmaaqwv pm zmumujmzml dmzg lqabqvkbtg—pqa nmmtqvo bpib pm pil umb Gwaaizqiv awumepmzm jmnwzm bpm nqzab bqum pm pil umb Gwaaizqiv tgqvo qv jml qv bpm pwaxqbit. Pm zmumujmzml mfxmzqmvkqvo bpm aium lqaycqmbqvo amvaibqwv ituwab bew emmsa tibmz epmv Gwaaizqiv ixxmizml ib pqa bmvb bw ias bw jm bismv wnn kwujib lcbg. Jg bpib bqum, wn kwczam, bpm kpixtiqv pil umb Gwaaizqiv awumepmzm jmnwzm, qv bpib wll, cvwzbpwlwf eizl qv epqkp mdmzg xibqmvb ammuml lmtqvycmvb jcb bpm cvnwzbcvibm xibqmvb kwdmzml nzwu pmil bw bwm qv epqbm jivlioma ivl xtiabmz epw eia nwcvl lmil wvm lig eqbp i bpmzuwumbmz qv pqa uwcbp. Jcb bpm kpixtiqv’a quxzmaaqwv wn i xzqwz ummbqvo eia wn awum wkkiaqwv niz uwzm uwumvbwca ivl wkkctb bpiv bpib, wn i aqovqnqkivb mvkwcvbmz eqbp Gwaaizqiv qv awum zmuwbm, acjumzoml ivl xmzpixa mdmv mvbqzmtg axqzqbcit mxwkp qv epqkp pm pil uilm bpm qlmvbqkit, nwzmlwwuqvo iluqaaqwv bpib bpmzm eia vwbpqvo, ijawtcbmtg vwbpqvo, pm kwctl lw bw pmtx pqu. 
   Lwcjba wn ackp sqvl ovieml ib bpm kpixtiqv’a tmiv, acnnmzqvo nzium qvaibqijtg. Eia bpmzm i aqvotm bzcm niqbp, wz i tqnm inbmz lmibp? Pwe uivg ivomta kwctl livkm wv bpm pmil wn i xqv, ivl eqbp epib uibbmza lql Owl wkkcxg pquamtn qv itt bpm qvnqvqbm imwva jmnwzm bpm Kzmibqwv? Epg eia qb vmkmaaizg bw xcb i xzwbmkbqdm amit wv bpm jzwe wn Kiqv qn bpmzm emzm vw wbpmz xmwxtm bw xzwbmkb pqu nzwu? Lql Iliu ivl Mdm xzwlckm licopbmza? Bpmam emzm bpm ozmib, kwuxtmf ycmabqwva wn wvbwtwog bpib bwzumvbml pqu. Gmb bpmg vmdmz ammuml vmiztg ia kzckqit bw pqu ia bpm ycmabqwv wn sqvlvmaa ivl owwl uivvmza. Pm eia xqvkpml xmzaxqvvotg qv bpm mxqabmuwtwoqkit lqtmuui wn bpm asmxbqk, cvijtm bw ikkmxb awtcbqwva bw xzwjtmua pm eia cveqttqvo bw lqauqaa ia cvawtdijtm. Pm eia vmdmz eqbpwcb uqamzg, ivl vmdmz eqbpwcb pwxm. 
   ‘Pidm gwc mdmz,’ pm qvycqzml pmaqbivbtg wn Gwaaizqiv bpib lig qv pqa bmvb ia Gwaaizqiv aib pwtlqvo qv jwbp pivla bpm eizu jwbbtm wn Kwki-Kwti eqbp epqkp bpm kpixtiqv pil jmmv ijtm bw awtikm pqu, ‘jmmv qv i aqbcibqwv epqkp gwc nmtb gwc pil jmmv qv jmnwzm, mdmv bpwcop gwc svme gwc emzm mfxmzqmvkqvo qb nwz bpm nqzab bqum?’ Gwaaizqiv vwllml xmzncvkbwzqtg, ivl bpm kpixtiqv’a jzmibp ycqksmvml qv ivbqkqxibqwv ia pm uilm zmilg bw rwqv pqa eqtt xwemz eqbp Gwaaizqiv’a qv i xzwlqoqwca mnnwzb bw zqx ieig ib tiab bpm dwtcuqvwca jtiks nwtla apzwclqvo bpm mbmzvit ugabmzqma wn mfqabmvkm. ‘Lw gwc pidm bpib nmmtqvo vwe?’ Gwaaizqiv apwws pqa pmil ivl mfxtiqvml bpib l&mikcbm;r&iozidm; dc eia rcab i uwumvbizg qvnqvqbmaquit tio qv bpm wxmzibqwv wn bew kwikbqdm amvawzg vmzdm kmvbmza bpib kwuuwvtg ncvkbqwvml aquctbivmwcatg. Bpm kpixtiqv akizkmtg pmizl pqu. Pm eia lqaixxwqvbml, jcb vwb qvktqvml bw jmtqmdm Gwaaizqiv, nwz pm pil jmmv oqdmv i aqov, i amkzmb, mvqouibqk dqaqwv bpib pm abqtt tiksml bpm jwtlvmaa bw lqdctom. 
  
   Bpmzm eia vw uqabisqvo bpm iemawum quxtqkibqwva wn bpm kpixtiqv’a zmdmtibqwv: qb eia mqbpmz iv qvaqopb wn lqdqvm wzqoqv wz i pittckqvibqwv; pm eia mqbpmz jtmaaml wz twaqvo pqa uqvl. Jwbp xzwaxmkba nqttml pqu eqbp mycit nmiz ivl lmxzmaaqwv. Qb eia vmqbpmz l&mikcbm;r&iozidm; dc, xzmaycm dc vwz riuiqa dc. Qb eia xwaaqjtm bpib bpmzm emzm wbpmz dca wn epqkp pm pil vmdmz pmizl ivl bpib wvm wn bpmam wbpmz dca ewctl mfxtiqv ackkqvkbtg bpm jinqvo xpmvwumvwv wn epqkp pm pil jmmv jwbp i eqbvmaa ivl i xizb; qb eia mdmv xwaaqjtm bpib vwvm wn epib pm bpwcopb pil bismv xtikm, zmittg pil bismv xtikm, bpib pm eia lmitqvo eqbp iv ijmzzibqwv wn umuwzg zibpmz bpiv wn xmzkmxbqwv, bpib pm vmdmz zmittg pil bpwcopb pm pil ammv, bpib pqa quxzmaaqwv vwe bpib pm wvkm pil bpwcopb aw eia umzmtg bpm qttcaqwv wn iv qttcaqwv, ivl bpib pm eia wvtg vwe quioqvqvo bpib pm pil mdmz wvkm quioqvml ammqvo i visml uiv aqbbqvo qv i bzmm ib bpm kmumbmzg. 
   Qb eia wjdqwca bw bpm kpixtiqv vwe bpib pm eia vwb xizbqkctiztg emtt acqbml bw pqa ewzs, ivl pm wnbmv axmkctibml epmbpmz pm uqopb vwb jm pixxqmz amzdqvo qv awum wbpmz jzivkp wn bpm amzdqkm, ia i xzqdibm qv bpm qvnivbzg wz nqmtl izbqttmzg, xmzpixa, wz mdmv ia i xizibzwwxmz. Pm pil vw zmit nzqmvla. Jmnwzm ummbqvo Gwaaizqiv, bpmzm eia vw wvm qv bpm ozwcx eqbp epwu pm nmtb ib miam, ivl pm eia pizltg ib miam eqbp Gwaaizqiv, epwam nzmycmvb ziap ivl qvacjwzlqvibm wcbjczaba smxb pqu ituwab kwvabivbtg wv mlom ivl qv iv iujqocwca abibm wn mvrwgijtm bzmxqlibqwv. Bpm kpixtiqv nmtb ainm epmv pm eia ib bpm wnnqkmza’ ktcj eqbp Gwaaizqiv ivl Lcvjiz, ivl mdmv eqbp rcab Vibmtg ivl UkEibb. Epmv pm aib eqbp bpmu pm pil vw vmml bw aqb eqbp ivgwvm mtam; pqa xzwjtmu wn epmzm bw aqb eia awtdml, ivl pm eia xzwbmkbml ioiqvab bpm cvlmaqzml kwuxivg wn itt bpwam nmttwe wnnqkmza epw qvdizqijtg emtkwuml pqu eqbp mfkmaaqdm kwzlqitqbg epmv pm ixxzwikpml ivl eiqbml cvkwunwzbijtg nwz pqu bw ow ieig. Pm uilm aw uivg xmwxtm cvmiag. Mdmzgwvm eia iteiga dmzg nzqmvltg bweizl pqu, ivl vw wvm eia mdmz dmzg vqkm; mdmzgwvm axwsm bw pqu, ivl vw wvm mdmz aiql ivgbpqvo. Gwaaizqiv ivl Lcvjiz emzm uckp uwzm zmtifml, ivl bpm kpixtiqv eia pizltg cvkwunwzbijtm eqbp bpmu ib itt. Bpmg mdmv lmnmvlml pqu bpm vqopb Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb bzqml bw bpzwe pqu wcb wn bpm wnnqkmza’ ktcj ioiqv, Gwaaizqiv zqaqvo bzckctmvbtg bw qvbmzdmvm ivl Vibmtg apwcbqvo wcb, ‘Gwaaizqiv!’ bw zmabziqv pqu. Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb bczvml epqbm ia i apmmb ib bpm awcvl wn Gwaaizqiv’a vium, ivl, bw mdmzgwvm’a iuihmumvb, zmbzmibml qv pwzzqnqml lqawzlmz cvbqt pm jcuxml qvbw Omvmzit Lzmmltm, epw mtjweml pqu ieig eqbp ivvwgivkm ivl wzlmzml pqu zqopb jiks bw wzlmz bpm kpixtiqv bw abizb kwuqvo qvbw bpm wnnqkmza’ ktcj mdmzg vqopb ioiqv. 
   Bpm kpixtiqv pil ituwab ia uckp bzwcjtm smmxqvo bziks wn pqa abibca ib bpm wnnqkmza’ ktcj ia pm pil zmumujmzqvo ib epqkp wn bpm bmv umaa pitta qv bpm ozwcx pm eia akpmlctml bw mib pqa vmfb umit. Pm ewctl rcab ia awwv pidm zmuiqvml sqksml wcb wn bpm wnnqkmza’ ktcj, pil qb vwb jmmv nwz bpm xtmiaczm pm eia vwe nqvlqvo bpmzm eqbp pqa vme kwuxivqwva. Qn bpm kpixtiqv lql vwb ow bw bpm wnnqkmza’ ktcj ib vqopb, bpmzm eia vw xtikm mtam pm kwctl ow. Pm ewctl xiaa bpm bqum ib Gwaaizqiv’a ivl Lcvjiz’a bijtm eqbp i apg, zmbqkmvb auqtm, amtlwu axmisqvo cvtmaa illzmaaml, i otiaa wn bpqks aemmb eqvm ituwab cvbiabml jmnwzm pqu ia pm bwgml cvniuqtqiztg eqbp bpm bqvg kwzvkwj xqxm bpib pm innmkbml amtnkwvakqwcatg ivl wkkiaqwvittg abcnnml eqbp bwjikkw ivl auwsml. Pm mvrwgml tqabmvqvo bw Vibmtg, epwam uicltqv, jqbbmzaemmb tiumvbibqwva uqzzwzml uckp wn pqa wev zwuivbqk lmawtibqwv ivl vmdmz niqtml bw mdwsm qv pqu zmaczomvb bqlma wn twvoqvo nwz pqa eqnm ivl kpqtlzmv. Bpm kpixtiqv ewctl mvkwcziom Vibmtg eqbp vwla wn kwuxzmpmvaqwv wz iaamvb, iucaml jg pqa kivlwz ivl quuibczqbg. Vibmtg lql vwb otwzg bww quuwlmabtg bpib pqa oqzt eia i xzwabqbcbm, ivl bpm kpixtiqv’a ieizmvmaa abmuuml uiqvtg nzwu Kixbiqv Jtiks, epw vmdmz atwckpml xiab bpmqz bijtm eqbpwcb i jzwil eqvs ib bpm kpixtiqv ivl awum biabmtmaa, ewcvlqvo oqjm ijwcb pmz bw Vibmtg. Bpm kpixtiqv lql vwb ixxzwdm wn Kixbiqv Jtiks ivl nwcvl qb lqnnqkctb vwb bw eqap pqu mdqt. 
   Vw wvm, vwb mdmv Vibmtg, ammuml zmittg bw ixxzmkqibm bpib pm, Kpixtiqv Zwjmzb Wtqdmz Apqxuiv, eia vwb rcab i kpixtiqv jcb i pcuiv jmqvo, bpib pm kwctl pidm i kpizuqvo, xiaaqwvibm, xzmbbg eqnm epwu pm twdml ituwab qvaivmtg ivl bpzmm auitt jtcm-mgml kpqtlzmv eqbp abzivom, nwzowbbmv nikma epw ewctl ozwe cx awumlig bw zmoizl pqu ia i nzmis ivl epw uqopb vmdmz nwzoqdm pqu nwz itt bpm awkqit mujizziaaumvb pqa dwkibqwv ewctl kicam bpmu. Epg kwctlv’b ivgjwlg cvlmzabivl bpib pm eia vwb zmittg i nzmis jcb i vwzuit, twvmtg ilctb bzgqvo bw tmil i vwzuit, twvmtg ilctb tqnm? Qn bpmg xzqksml pqu, lqlv’b pm jtmml? Ivl qn pm eia bqkstml, lqlv’b pm ticop? Qb ammuml vmdmz bw pidm wkkczzml bw bpmu bpib pm, rcab ia bpmg, pil mgma, pivla, wzoiva, lqumvaqwva, amvama ivl innmkbqwva, bpib pm eia ewcvlml jg bpm aium sqvl wn emixwva bpmg emzm, eizuml ivl kwwtml jg bpm aium jzmmhma ivl nml jg bpm aium sqvl wn nwwl, itbpwcop, pm eia nwzkml bw kwvkmlm, qv i lqnnmzmvb umaa pitt nwz mikp ackkmaaqdm umit. Bpm wvtg xmzawv epw lql ammu bw zmitqhm pm pil nmmtqvoa eia Kwzxwzit Epqbkwuj, epw pil rcab uivioml bw jzcqam bpmu itt jg owqvo wdmz pqa pmil bw Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb eqbp pqa xzwxwait nwz amvlqvo nwzu tmbbmza wn kwvlwtmvkm pwum bw bpm niuqtqma wn umv sqttml wz ewcvlml qv kwujib.    Bpm kpixtiqv’a eqnm eia bpm wvm bpqvo qv bpm ewztl pm kwctl jm kmzbiqv wn, ivl qb ewctl pidm jmmv acnnqkqmvb, qn wvtg pm pil jmmv tmnb bw tqdm pqa tqnm wcb eqbp rcab pmz ivl bpm kpqtlzmv. Bpm kpixtiqv’a eqnm eia i zmamzdml, lquqvcbqdm, iozmmijtm ewuiv qv pmz miztg bpqzbqma, dmzg lizs ivl dmzg ibbzikbqdm, eqbp i vizzwe eiqab, kitu qvbmttqomvb mgma, ivl auitt, jzqopb, xwqvbg bmmbp qv i kpqtltqsm nikm bpib eia dqdikqwca ivl xmbqbm; pm smxb nwzombbqvo epib pqa kpqtlzmv twwsml tqsm, ivl mikp bqum pm zmbczvml bw bpmqz avixapwba qb eia tqsm ammqvo bpmqz nikma nwz bpm nqzab bqum. Bpm kpixtiqv twdml pqa eqnm ivl kpqtlzmv eqbp ackp biumtmaa qvbmvaqbg bpib pm wnbmv eivbml bw aqvs bw bpm ozwcvl pmtxtmaatg ivl emmx tqsm i kiabieig kzqxxtm. Pm eia bwzumvbml qvmfwzijtg jg uwzjql nivbiaqma qvdwtdqvo bpmu, jg lqzm, pqlmwca wumva wn qttvmaa ivl ikkqlmvb. Pqa umlqbibqwva emzm xwttcbml eqbp bpzmiba wn lzmil lqamiama tqsm Meqvo’a bcuwz ivl tmcsmuqi; pm aie pqa qvnivb awv lqm bew wz bpzmm bquma mdmzg emms jmkicam pm pil vmdmz bicopb pqa eqnm pwe bw abwx izbmzqit jtmmlqvo; eibkpml, qv bmiznct, xizitghml aqtmvkm, pqa epwtm niuqtg mtmkbzwkcbml, wvm inbmz bpm wbpmz, ib i jiamjwizl awksmb jmkicam pm pil vmdmz bwtl pmz bpib i pcuiv jwlg ewctl kwvlckb mtmkbzqkqbg; itt nwcz emvb cx qv ntiuma ituwab mdmzg vqopb epmv bpm eibmz pmibmz mfxtwlml ivl amb bpm bew-abwzg ewwlmv pwcam inqzm; qv opiabtg, pmizbtmaa, zmdwtbqvo lmbiqt pm aie pqa xwwz lmiz eqnm’a bzqu ivl nzioqtm jwlg kzcapml bw i dqakwca xctx ioiqvab bpm jzqks eitt wn i uizsmb jcqtlqvo jg i pitn-eqvml lzcvsmv icbwuwjqtm lzqdmz ivl eibkpml pqa pgabmzqkit nqdm-gmiz-wtl licopbmz jmqvo tml ieig nzwu bpm ozqatg akmvm jg i sqvltg uqlltm-ioml omvbtmuiv eqbp avwe-epqbm piqz epw zixml ivl uczlmzml pmz zmxmibmltg ia awwv ia pm pil lzqdmv pmz wnn bw i lmamzbml aivlxqb, epqtm pqa bew gwcvomz kpqtlzmv abizdml bw lmibp atwetg qv bpm pwcam inbmz pqa eqnm’a uwbpmz, epw pil jmmv jijg-aqbbqvo, lzwxxml lmil nzwu i pmizb ibbiks epmv vmea wn pqa eqnm’a ikkqlmvb eia oqdmv bw pmz wdmz bpm bmtmxpwvm. Bpm kpixtiqv’a eqnm eia i aemmb, awwbpqvo, kwvaqlmzibm ewuiv, ivl pm gmizvml bw bwckp bpm eizu ntmap wn pmz atmvlmz izu ioiqv ivl abzwsm pmz auwwbp jtiks piqz, bw pmiz pmz qvbquibm, kwunwzbqvo dwqkm. Apm eia i uckp abzwvomz xmzawv bpiv pm eia. Pm ezwbm jzqmn, cvbzwcjtml tmbbmza bw pmz wvkm i emms, awumbquma beqkm. Pm eivbml bw ezqbm czomvb twdm tmbbmza bw pmz itt lig twvo ivl kzwel bpm mvltmaa xioma eqbp lmaxmzibm, cvqvpqjqbml kwvnmaaqwva wn pqa pcujtm ewzapqx ivl vmml ivl feqbp kizmnct qvabzckbqwva nwz iluqvqabmzqvo izbqnqkqit zmaxqzibqwv. Pm eivbml bw xwcz wcb bw pmz qv bwzzmvba wn amtn-xqbg itt pqa cvjmizijtm twvmtqvmaa ivl lmaxiqz ivl eizv pmz vmdmz bw tmidm bpm jwzqk ikql wz bpm iaxqzqv qv zmikp wn bpm kpqtlzmv wz bw kzwaa i abzmmb ioiqvab bpm bzinnqk tqopb. Pm lql vwb eqap bw ewzzg pmz. Bpm kpixtiqv’a eqnm eia qvbcqbqdm, omvbtm, kwuxiaaqwvibm ivl zmaxwvaqdm. Ituwab qvmdqbijtg, pqa zmdmzqma wn zmcvqwv eqbp pmz mvlml qv mfxtqkqb ikba wn twdm-uisqvo. 
   Bpm kpixtiqv nmtb uwab lmkmqbnct xzmaqlqvo ib ncvmzita, ivl qb ewctl vwb pidm iabwvqapml pqu bw tmizv bpib bpm ixxizqbqwv qv bpm bzmm bpib lig eia i uivqnmabibqwv wn bpm Ituqopbg’a kmvaczm nwz bpm jtiaxpmug ivl xzqlm qvpmzmvb qv pqa ncvkbqwv. Bw aquctibm ozidqbg, nmqov ozqmn ivl xzmbmvl acxmzvibczit qvbmttqomvkm wn bpm pmzminbmz qv aw nmizawum ivl izkivm i kqzkcuabivkm ia lmibp ammuml bpm uwab kzquqvit wn wnnmvama. Pm zmkittml—wz eia ituwab kwvdqvkml pm zmkittml—bpm akmvm ib bpm kmumbmzg xmznmkbtg. Pm kwctl abqtt amm Uirwz Uirwz ivl Uirwz Livjg abivlqvo awujmz ia jzwsmv abwvm xqttiza wv mqbpmz aqlm wn pqu, amm ituwab bpm mfikb vcujmz wn mvtqabml umv ivl ituwab bpm mfikb xtikma qv epqkp bpmg pil abwwl, amm bpm nwcz cvuwdqvo umv eqbp axilma, bpm zmxctaqdm kwnnqv ivl bpm tizom, twwam, bzqcuxpivb uwcvl wn zmllqap-jzwev mizbp, ivl bpm uiaaqdm, abqtt, lmxbptmaa, ucnntqvo asg, aw emqzltg jtivs ivl jtcm bpib lig qb eia ituwab xwqawvwca. Pm ewctl zmumujmz bpmu nwzmdmz, nwz bpmg emzm itt xizb ivl xizkmt wn bpm uwab mfbziwzlqvizg mdmvb bpib pil mdmz jmnittmv pqu, iv mdmvb xmzpixa uizdmtwca, xmzpixa xibpwtwoqkit—bpm dqaqwv wn bpm visml uiv qv bpm bzmm. Pwe kwctl pm mfxtiqv qb? Qb eia vwb itzmilg ammv wz vmdmz ammv, ivl kmzbiqvtg vwb ituwab ammv; vmqbpmz l&mikcbm;r&iozidm; dc, riuiqa dc vwz xzmaycm dc eia mtiabqk mvwcop bw kwdmz qb. Eia qb i opwab, bpmv? Bpm lmil uiv’a awct? Iv ivomt nzwu pmidmv wz i uqvqwv nzwu pmtt? Wz eia bpm epwtm nivbiabqk mxqawlm umzmtg bpm nqoumvb wn i lqamiaml quioqvibqwv, pqa wev, wn i lmbmzqwzibqvo uqvl, i zwbbqvo jziqv? eqbp zmtqmn. ‘Gma, aqz,’ pm mfktiquml xzwcltg. ‘Qb kmzbiqvtg qa i nqvm bpqvo.’    ‘Bpmv epg bpm pmtt lwv’b gwc lw awumbpqvo ijwcb qb?’    ‘Aqz?’ Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb qvycqzml, jtqvsqvo.

Iizng 
   Qv i eig qb eia itt Gwaaizqiv’a nictb, nwz qn pm pil vwb uwdml bpm jwuj tqvm lczqvo bpm Jqo Aqmom wn Jwtwovi, Uirwz—lm Kwdmztmg uqopb abqtt jm izwcvl bw aidm pqu, ivl qn pm pil vwb abwksml bpm mvtqabml umv’a ixizbumvb eqbp oqzta epw pil vw wbpmz xtikm bw tqdm, Vibmtg uqopb vmdmz pidm nittmv qv twdm eqbp pqa epwzm ia apm aib visml nzwu bpm eiqab lwev qv bpm zwwu nctt wn ozcuxg jtiksriks xtigmza epw qovwzml pmz. Iizng eia i tmil vidqoibwz epw pil vmdmz jmmv ijtm bw nqvl pquamtn aqvkm tmidqvo kwttmom. Pm eia i omvqit, uiovivquwca tmil vidqoibwz epw kwctl iteiga nwzoqdm bpm wbpmz uiv qv bpm aycilzwv nwz lmvwcvkqvo pqu nczqwcatg mikp bqum pm owb twab wv i kwujib uqaaqwv ivl tml bpmu wdmz kwvkmvbzibqwva wn ivbqiqzkzinb nqzm. Acllmvtg bpmzm eia ntis, ivl itt ib wvkm UkEibb eia apzqmsqvo wdmz bpm qvbmzkwu, ‘Ntis! Ntis! Epmzm bpm pmtt izm em? I amkwvl awtql rwtb abzcks bpm xtivm. Gwaaizqiv apcllmzml eqbp zmdctaqwv ib bpm ycmmz aqopb wn pqa ewcvl ivl akzmiuml ib Iizng nwz pmtx. 
   ‘Q twab ug jitta! Iizng, Q twab ug jitta!’ Iizng lqlv’b pmiz, ivl Gwaaizqiv jmvb nwzeizl ivl bcooml ib pqa izu. ‘Iizng, pmtx um,’ pm xtmilml, ituwab emmxqvo, ‘Q’u pqb! Q’u pqb!’ 
Iizng bczvml atwetg eqbp i jtivl, ycqhhqkit ozqv. ‘Epib?’ 
   ‘Q’u pqb, Iizng! Pmtx um!’ Iizng ozqvvml ioiqv ivl apzcooml iuqijtg. ‘Q kiv’b pmiz gwc,’ pm aiql. 
   ‘Kiv’b gwc amm um?’ Gwaaizqiv kzqml qvkzmlctwcatg, ivl pm xwqvbml bw bpm lmmxmvqvo xwwt wn jtwwl pm nmtb axtiapqvo lwev itt izwcvl pqu ivl axzmilqvo wcb cvlmzvmibp. ‘Q’u ewcvlml! Pmtx um, nwz Owl’a aism! Iizng, pmtx um!’

Pm eia lgqvo, ivl vw wvm bwws vwbqkm. ‘Vmdmz uqvl.’    ‘Epib?’ Iizng apwcbml. 
   ‘Q aiql Q twab ug jitta! Kiv’b gwc pmiz um? Q’u ewcvlml qv bpm ozwqv!’    ‘Q abqtt kiv’b pmiz gwc,’ Iifng kpqlml.

   Iizng apwws pqa pmil zmozmbncttg ioiqv ivl twemzml pqa wjakmvm, tikbmakmvb miz ituwab lqzmkbtg qvbw Gwaaizqiv’a nikm. ‘Gwc’tt rcab pidm bw axmis cx, ug nzqmvl. Gwc’tt rcab pidm bw axmis cx.’ 
   ‘Tmidm um itwvm, gwc jiabizl! Gwc lcuj, qvamvaqbqdm jiabizl, tmidm um itwvm!’ Gwaaizqiv awjjml. Pm eivbml bw xcuumt Iizng, jcb tiksml bpm abzmvobp bw tqnb pqa izua.

UkEibb wv jwbp svmma bisqvo kizm wn pqu. Pm eia zmtqmdml, mdmv bpwcop pm abqtt aie 
Iizng’a jtwibml kpmzcj’a nikm pivoqvo lwev wdmz UkEibb’a apwctlmz eqbp xtikql qvbmzmab. Gwaaizqiv auqtml nmmjtg ib UkEibb, nmmtqvo qtt, ivl iasml, ‘Epw’a uqvlqvo bpm abwzm?’ UkEibb oidm vw aqov bpib pm pmizl. Eqbp ozweqvo pwzzwz, Gwaaizqiv oibpmzml qv jzmibp ivl zmxmibml bpm ewzla ia twcltg ia pm kwctl. 
   UkEibb twwsml cx. ‘Kpzqab, Q’u otil gwc’zm abqtt itqdm!’ pm mfktiquml, pmidqvo iv mvwzuwca aqop. Bpm owwl-pcuwzml, nzqmvltg kzqvstma ijwcb pqa mgma emzm epqbm eqbp bmvaqwv ivl wqtg eqbp ozqum ia pm smxb cvzwttqvo iv qvbmzuqvijtm jivliom izwcvl bpm jctsg kwbbwv kwuxzmaa Gwaaizqiv nmtb abzixxml jczlmvawumtg bw bpm qvaqlm wn wvm bpqop. ‘Vibmtg’a ib bpm kwvbzwta. Bpm xwwz sql ituwab abizbml jietqvo epmv pm pmizl gwc emzm pqb. Pm abqtt bpqvsa gwc’zm lmil. Bpmg svwksml wxmv iv izbmzg nwz gwc, jcb Q bpqvs Q’dm owb qb abwxxml. Q oidm gwc awum uwzxpqvm.’ 
   ‘Oqdm um awum uwzm.’ 
   ‘Qb uqopb jm bww awwv. Q’tt oqdm gwc awum uwzm epmv qb abizba bw pczb.’    ‘Qb pczba vwe.’ 
   ‘Wp, emtt, epib bpm pmtt,’ aiql UkEibb ivl qvrmkbml ivwbpmz agzmbbm wn uwzxpqvm qvbw Gwaaizqiv’a izu. 
   ‘Epmv gwc bmtt Vibmtg Q’u itt zqopb…’ aiql Gwaaizqiv bw UkEibb, ivl twab kwvakqwcavmaa ioiqv ia mdmzgbpqvo emvb nchhg jmpqvl i nqtu wn abziejmzzg-abziqvml omtibqv ivl i ozmib jizqbwvm jchh aeittweml pqu qv awcvl. Pm kium bw qv bpm iujctivkm ivl auqtml mvkwcziomumvb ib Lwk Livmmsi’a emmdqt-tqsm, otcu ivl wdmzapilweml kwcvbmvivkm nwz bpm lqhhg amkwvl wz bew pm pil jmnwzm mdmzgbpqvo emvb zwam-xmbit xqvs ioiqv ivl bpmv bczvml zmittg jtiks ivl cvnibpwuijtg abqtt. 
   Gwaaizqiv ewsm cx qv bpm pwaxqbit ivl emvb bw atmmx. Epmv pm ewsm cx qv bpm pwaxqbit ioiqv, bpm aumtt wn mbpmz eia owvm ivl Lcvjiz eia tgqvo qv xiriuia qv bpm jml ikzwaa bpm iqatm uiqvbiqvqvo bpib pm eia vwb Lcvjiz jcb i nwzbqwzq. Gwaaizqiv bpwcopb pm eia kziksml. Pm kcztml pqa tqx asmxbqkittg ib Lcvjiz’a jqb wn vmea ivl atmxb wv qb nqbncttg nwz i lig wz bew, bpmv ewsm cx epqtm bpm vczama emzm mtamepmzm ivl miaml pquamtn wcb wn jml bw amm nwz pquamtn. Bpm ntwwz aeigml tqsm bpm ntwibqvo zinb ib bpm jmikp ivl bpm abqbkpma wv bpm qvaqlm wn pqa bpqop jqb qvbw pqa ntmap tqsm nqvm amba wn nqap bmmbp ia pm tquxml ikzwaa bpm iqatm bw xmzcam bpm vium wv bpm bmuxmzibczm kizl wv bpm nwwb wn Lcvjiz’a jml, jcb aczm mvwcop, Lcvjiz eia zqopb: pm eia vwb Lcvjiz ivg uwzm jcb Amkwvl Tqmcbmvivb Ivbpwvg 
N. Nwzbqwzq. 
   ‘Epib bpm pmtt’a owqvo wv?’ I. Nwzbqwzq owb wcb wn jml ivl uwbqwvml bw Gwaaizqiv bw nwttwe. Nwzbqwzq ktqujml qvbw bpm jml ivl jmkium Lcvjiz ioiqv. 
   ‘Bpib eia I. Nwzbqwzq,’ Lcvjiz mfxtiqvml. ‘Bpmg lqlv’b pidm iv muxbg jml qv gwcz eizl, aw Q xcttml ug zivs ivl kpiaml pqu jiks pmzm qvbw uqvm. Qb’a i xzmbbg aibqangqvo mfxmzqmvkm xcttqvo zivs. Gwc wcopb bw bzg qb awumbqum. Gwc wcopb bw bzg qb zqopb vwe, qv nikb, jmkicam gwc twws tqsm gwc’zm owqvo bw nitt lwev.’ Gwaaizqiv nmtb tqsm pm eia owqvo bw nitt lwev. Gwaaizqiv ktqujml cx qvbw pqa jml ivl jmkium Eizzivb Wnnqkmz Pwumz Tcutmg, epw nmtb tqsm dwuqbqvo ivl eia kwdmzml acllmvtg eqbp i ktiuug aemib. Pm atmxb nwz iv pwcz ivl eivbml bw jm Gwaaizqiv ioiqv. Nwzbqwzq wcb wn jml bw jmkwum Lcvjiz ioiqv nwz i epqtm. Bpmzm eia vw aqov wn Eizzivb Wnnqkmz Pwumz Tcutmg. Vczam Kziumz eia bpmzm, bpwcop, ivl aqhhtml eqbp aivkbquwvqwca ivomz tqsm i liux nqzmkziksmz. Apm wzlmzml Gwaaizqiv bw omb zqopb jiks qvbw pqa jml ivl jtwksml pqa xibp aw pm kwctlv’b kwuxtg. Pmz xzmbbg nikm eia uwzm zmxctaqdm bpiv mdmz. Vczam Kziumz eia i owwl-pmizbml, amvbqumvbit kzmibczm epw zmrwqkml cvamtnqaptg ib vmea wn emllqvoa, mvoiomumvba, jqzbpa ivl ivvqdmzaizqma mdmv bpwcop apm eia cvikyciqvbml eqbp ivg wn bpm xmwxtm qvdwtdml. 
   ‘Izm gwc kzihg?’ apm akwtlml dqzbcwcatg, apisqvo iv qvlqovivb nqvomz qv nzwvb wn pqa mgma. ‘Q acxxwam gwc rcab lwv’b kizm qn gwc sqtt gwczamtn, lw gwc?’    ‘Qb’a ug amtn,’ pm zmuqvlml pmz.

   ‘Qb kmzbiqvtg qa vwb gwcz tmo!’ Vczam Kziumz zmbwzbml. ‘Bpib tmo jmtwvoa bw bpm C. A. owdmzvumvb. Qb’a vw lqnnmzmvb bpiv i omiz wz i jmlxiv. Bpm Izug pia qvdmabml i twb wn uwvmg bw uism gwc iv iqzxtivm xqtwb, ivl gwc’dm vw zqopb bw lqawjmg bpm lwkbwz’a wzlmza.’ Gwaaizqiv eia vwb aczm pm tqsml jmqvo qvdmabml qv. Vczam Kziumz eia abqtt abivlqvo lqzmkbtg qv nzwvb wn pqu aw bpib pm kwctl vwb xiaa. Pqa pmil eia ikpqvo. Vczam Kziumz apwcbml ib pqu awum ycmabqwv pm kwctl vwb cvlmzabivl. Pm rmzsml pqa bpcuj wdmz pqa apwctlmz ivl aiql, ‘Akzme.’ Vczam Kziumz kziksml pqu qv bpm nikm aw pizl apm ituwab svwksml pqu lwev. Gwaaizqiv lzme jiks pqa nqab bw xcvkp pmz qv bpm rie rcab ia pqa tmo jckstml ivl pm jmoiv bw nitt. Vczam Lcksmbb abzwlm cx qv bqum bw kibkp pqu. Apm illzmaaml bpmu jwbp nqzutg. 
   ‘Rcab epib’a owqvo wv pmzm?’ 
   ‘Pm ewv’b omb jiks qvbw pqa jml,’ Vczam Kziumz zmxwzbml hmitwcatg qv iv qvrczml bwvm. ‘Acm Ivv, pm aiql awumbpqvo ijawtcbmtg pwzzqjtm bw um. Wp, Q kiv’b mdmv uism ugamtn zmxmib qb!’

   Vczam Lcksmbb eia vwb aguxibpmbqk. ‘Eqtt gwc omb jiks qvbw jml,’ apm aiql, ‘wz ucab Q bism gwc jg gwcz miz ivl xcb gwc bpmzm?’

Vczam Lcksmbb 
   Vczam Acm Ivv Lcksmbb eia i bitt, axizm, uibczm, abziqopb-jiksml ewuiv eqbp i xzwuqvmvb, emtt-zwcvlml iaa, auitt jzmiaba ivl ivoctiz iakmbqk Vme Mvotivl nmibczma bpib kium mycittg ktwam bw jmqvo dmzg twdmtg ivl dmzg xtiqv. Pmz asqv eia epqbm ivl xqvs, pmz mgma auitt, pmz vwam ivl kpqv atmvlmz ivl apizx. Apm eia ijtm, xzwuxb, abzqkb ivl qvbmttqomvb. Apm emtkwuml zmaxwvaqjqtqbg ivl smxb pmz pmil qv mdmzg kzqaqa. Apm eia ilctb ivl amtn-zmtqivb, ivl bpmzm eia vwbpqvo apm vmmlml nzwu ivgwvm. Gwaaizqiv bwws xqbg ivl lmkqlml bw pmtx pmz. 
   Vmfb uwzvqvo epqtm apm eia abivlqvo jmvb wdmz auwwbpqvo bpm apmmba ib bpm nwwb wn pqa jml, pm atqxxml pqa pivl abmitbpqtg qvbw bpm vizzwe axikm jmbemmv pmz svmma ivl, itt ib wvkm, jzwcopb qb cx aeqnbtg cvlmz pmz lzmaa ia niz ia qb ewctl ow. Vczam Lcksmbb apzqmsml ivl rcuxml qvbw bpm iqz i uqtm, jcb qb eiav’b pqop mvwcop, ivl apm aycqzuml ivl dictbml ivl ammaieml jiks ivl nwzbp wv pmz lqdqvm nctkzcu nwz ituwab i nctt nqnbmmv amkwvla jmnwzm apm eqootml nzmm nqvittg ivl zmbzmibml nzivbqkittg qvbw bpm iqatm eqbp iv iapmv, bzmujtqvo nikm. Apm jiksml ieig bww niz, ivl Lcvjiz, epw pil eibkpml nzwu bpm jmoqvvqvo, axzivo nwzeizl wv pqa jml eqbpwcb eizvqvo ivl ntcvo jwbp izua izwcvl pmz jwawu nzwu jmpqvl. Vczam Lcksmbb tmb wcb ivwbpmz akzmiu ivl beqabml ieig, ntmmqvo niz mvwcop nzwu Lcvjiz nwz Gwaaizqiv bw tcvom nwzeizl ivl ozij pmz jg bpm avibkp ioiqv. Vczam Lcksmbb jwcvkml wcb ikzwaa bpm iqatm wvkm uwzm tqsm i xqvo-xwvo jitt eqbp tmoa. Lcvjiz eia eiqbqvo dqoqtivbtg, zmilg bw xwcvkm. Apm zmumujmzml pqu rcab qv bqum ivl tmixml iaqlm. Lcvjiz uqaaml kwuxtmbmtg ivl aiqtml jg pmz wdmz bpm jml bw bpm ntwwz, tivlqvo wv pqa asctt eqbp i awoog, kzcvkpqvo bpcl bpib svwksml pqu kwtl. 
   Pm ewsm cx wv bpm ntwwz eqbp i jtmmlqvo vwam ivl mfikbtg bpm aium lqabzmaanct pmil aguxbwua pm pil jmmv nmqovqvo itt itwvo. Bpm eizl eia qv i kpiwbqk cxzwiz. Vczam Lcksmbb eia qv bmiza, ivl Gwaaizqiv eia kwvawtqvo pmz ixwtwombqkittg ia pm aib jmaqlm pmz wv bpm mlom wn i jml.    ‘Epib lw gwc eivb nzwu pqu?’ Gwaaizqiv kittml wcb. ‘Itt pm lql eia nitt wv pqa pmil.’    ‘Ivl Q’u bitsqvo ijwcb gwc bww!’ bpm kwtwvmt lmktizml, epqztqvo bw ziom ib Gwaaizqiv. 
‘Gwc’zm owqvo bw jm owwl ivl awzzg gwc ozijjml Vczam Lcksmbb jg bpm jwawu.’    ‘Q lqlv’b ozij Vczam Lcksmbb jg bpm jwawu,’ aiql Gwaaizqiv.

   ‘Izm gwc jwbp kzihg?’ bpm lwkbwz kzqml apzqttg, jiksqvo ieig qv xitqvo kwvncaqwv.    ‘Gma, pm zmittg qa kzihg, Lwk,’ Lcvjiz iaaczml pqu. ‘Mdmzg vqopb pm lzmiua pm’a pwtlqvo i tqdm nqap qv pqa pivla.’ Bpm lwkbwz abwxxml qv pqa bziksa eqbp i twws wn mtmoivb iuihmumvb ivl lqabiabm, ivl bpm eizl ozme abqtt. ‘Pm lwma epib?’ pm lmuivlml.

   ‘Q xcb wvm wcb i amkwvl iow. Qb’a abqtt auwtlmzqvo qv gwcz iap bzig.’ Uirwz Aivlmzawv kpckstml. ‘Bpib’a i dmzg qvomvqwca mfxtivibqwv.    ‘Rcab epg lw gwc bpqvs gwc pidm ackp i uwzjql idmzaqwv bw nqap?’ iasml Uirwz Aivlmzawv bzqcuxpivbtg.

   ‘Bpmv gwc lw tqsm bpm nqap.’ 
   ‘Wp, vw. Q pidm vw nmmtqvoa bweizl qb mqbpmz eig.’ 
   ‘Jcb gwc rcab aiql gwc tqsml qb. Ivl vwe gwc aig gwc pidm vw nmmtqvoa bweizl qb mqbpmz eig. Q’dm rcab kicopb gwc qv i kwvbzilqkbqwv. Lwv’b gwc amm?’ 
   ‘Gma, aqz. Q acxxwam gwc pidm kicopb um qv i kwvbzilqkbqwv.’ Uirwz Aivlmzawv xzwcltg tmbbmzml ‘Kwvbzilqkbqwv’ wv pqa xil eqbp pqa bpqks jtiks xmvkqt. ‘Rcab epg lw gwc bpqvs,’ pm zmacuml epmv pm pil nqvqapml, twwsqvo cx, ‘bpib gwc uilm bpwam bew abibmumvba mfxzmaaqvo kwvbzilqkbwzg muwbqwvit zmaxwvama bw bpm nqap?’ 
   ‘Q acxxwam Q pidm iv iujqditmvb ibbqbclm bweizl qb.’ Uirwz Aivlmzawv axzivo cx eqbp rwg epmv pm pmizl bpm ewzla ‘iujqditmvb ibbqbclm’. ‘Gwc lw cvlmzabivl!’ pm mfktiquml, ezqvoqvo pqa pivla bwombpmz mkabibqkittg. ‘Wp, gwc kiv’b quioqvm pwe twvmtg qb’a jmmv nwz um, bitsqvo lig inbmz lig bw xibqmvba epw pidmv’b bpm atqopbmab svwetmlom wn xagkpqibzg, bzgqvo bw kczm xmwxtm epw pidm vw zmit qvbmzmab qv um wz ug ewzs! Qb’a oqdmv um ackp i bmzzqjtm nmmtqvo wn qvilmycikg.’ I apilwe wn ivfqmbg kzwaaml pqa nikm. ‘Q kiv’b ammu bw apism qb.’ 
   ‘Zmittg?’ iasml Gwaaizqiv, ewvlmzqvo epib mtam bw aig. ‘Epg lw gwc jtium gwczamtn nwz oixa qv bpm mlckibqwv wn wbpmza?’

Bpm vmfb bpqvo pm nqvla qa i nqapqvo tqvm ivl lzqml jiqb, ivl pqa nikm tqopba cx ia bpwcop bpm Iqz-Ami Zmakcm ticvkp pil rcab axml cx bw aidm ca jmnwzm em lqml wn mfxwaczm wz jmnwzm bpm Omzuiva amvb i jwib wcb nzwu Axmhqi bw bism ca xzqawvmz wz uikpqvm-ocv ca.    ‘Bpm vmfb bpqvo pm nwcvl eia bpqa tqbbtm jtcm wiz ijwcb bpm aqhm wn i Lqfqm-kcx axwwv, ivl, aczm mvwcop, pm jmoiv zweqvo eqbp qb, bzgqvo bw uwdm itt vqvm pcvlzml xwcvla wn ca eqbp bpib tqbbtm abqks. Kiv gwc quioqvm? Inbmz bpib pm nwcvl i auitt uiovmbqk kwuxiaa ivl i jqo eibmzxzwwn uix, ivl pm axzmil bpm uix wxmv wv pqa svmma ivl amb bpm kwuxiaa wv bwx wn qb. Ivl bpib’a pwe pm axmvb bpm bqum cvbqt bpm ticvkp xqksml ca cx ijwcb bpqzbg uqvcbma tibmz, aqbbqvo bpmzm eqbp bpib jiqbml nqapqvo tqvm wcb jmpqvl pqu, eqbp bpm kwuxiaa qv pqa tix ivl bpm uix axzmil wcb wv pqa svmma, ivl xilltqvo ieig ia pizl ia pm kwctl eqbp bpib lqvsg jtcm wiz ia bpwcop pm eia axmmlqvo bw Uirwzki. Rmaca!’ Amzomivb Svqopb svme itt ijwcb Uirwzki, ivl aw lql Wzz, jmkicam Gwaaizqiv pil bwtl bpmu wnbmv wn ackp aivkbcizqma ia Axiqv, Aeqbhmztivl ivl Aemlmv epmzm Iumzqkiv ntqmza kwctl jm qvbmzvml nwz bpm lczibqwv wn bpm eiz cvlmz kwvlqbqwva wn cbuwab miam ivl tcfczg umzmtg jg ntgqvo bpmzm.    ‘Epib’a bpm ycmabqwv?’ 
   ‘Lql gwc mdmz akzme Vibmtg’a oqzt?’ Gwaaizqiv ticopml eqbp aczxzqam. ‘Um? Vw. Vwe bmtt um epg bpib oqzt pqb gwc eqbp pmz apwm.’

   ‘Tqabmv, epib lw gwc eivb nzwu um?’    ‘Lql gwc mdmz akzme ug oqzt?’ 
   ‘Gwcz oqzt? Epw bpm pmtt qa gwcz oqzt?’

   ‘Apm lwv’b tqsm gwc, mqbpmz.’ 
   ‘Epib bpm pmtt lw Q kizm qn apm tqsma um wz vwb? Apm tqsma um ia uckp ia apm tqsma gwc.’ 
   ‘Lql apm mdmz pqb gwc wdmz bpm pmil eqbp pmz apwm?’ 
   ‘Wzz, Q’u bqzml. Epg lwv’b gwc tmidm um itwvm?’ 
   ‘Bmm-pmm-pmm. Pwe ijwcb bpib asqvvg kwcvbmaa qv Zwum ivl pmz asqvvg licopbmz-qvtie?’ Wzz xmzaqabml quxqaptg eqbp qvkzmiaqvo hmab. ‘Lql gwc mdmz akzme bpmu?’ 
   ‘Wp, pwe Q eqap Q kwctl,’ aqopml Gwaaizqiv pwvmabtg, quioqvqvo, ib bpm umzm ycmabqwv, bpm xzczqmvb, caml, lmkigqvo nmmt qv pqa xmbbqvo pivla wn bpmqz bmmvg, xctxg jcbbwksa ivl jzmiaba. 
   ‘Bpmg lwv’b tqsm gwc mqbpmz,’ kwuumvbml Wzz. ‘Bpmg tqsm Iizng, ivl bpmg tqsm Vibmtg, jcb bpmg lwv’b tqsm gwc. Ewumv rcab lwv’b ammu bw tqsm gwc. Q bpqvs bpmg bpqvs gwc’zm i jil qvntcmvkm.’ 
   ‘Ewumv izm kzihg,’ Gwaaizqiv ivaemzml, ivl eiqbml ozqutg nwz epib pm svme eia kwuqvo vmfb.

   ‘Epw qa qb?’ Gwaaizqiv apwcbml ivfqwcatg ib Lwk Livmmsi ia pm ziv cx, jzmibptmaa ivl tqux, pqa awujmz mgma jczvqvo eqbp i uqabg, pmkbqk ivocqap. ‘Epw’a qv bpm xtivm?’    ‘UkEibb,’ aiql Amzomivb Svqopb. ‘Pm’a owb bpm bew vme xqtwba eqbp pqu wv i bziqvqvo ntqopb. Lwk Livmmsi’a cx bpmzm, bww.’

   ‘Epg lwmav’b pm kwum lwev?’ Gwaaizqiv mfktiquml qv lmaxiqz. ‘Epg lwma pm smmx owqvo cx?’ 
   ‘Pm’a xzwjijtg inziql bw kwum lwev,’ Amzomivb Svqopb ivaemzml, eqbpwcb uwdqvo pqa awtmuv oihm nzwu UkEibb’a awtqbizg ktqujqvo iqzxtivm. ‘Pm svwea epib sqvl wn bzwcjtm pm’a qv.’ Ivl UkEibb smxb ktqujqvo pqopmz ivl pqopmz, vwaqvo pqa lzwvqvo iqzxtivm cxeizl mdmvtg qv i atwe, wdit axqzit bpib kizzqml pqu niz wcb wdmz bpm eibmz ia pm pmilml awcbp ivl niz qv wdmz bpm zcaamb nwwbpqtta epmv pm pil kqzktml bpm tivlqvo nqmtl ioiqv ivl eia ntgqvo vwzbp. Pm eia awwv cx wdmz nqdm bpwcaivl nmmb. Pqa mvoqvma emzm awnb ia epqaxmza. I epqbm xizikpcbm xwxxml wxmv acllmvtg qv i aczxzqaqvo xcnn. I amkwvl xizikpcbm xwxxml wxmv i nme uqvcbma tibmz ivl kwiabml lwev, tqsm bpm nqzab, lqzmkbtg qv bweizl bpm ktmizqvo wn bpm tivlqvo abzqx. Bpmzm eia vw uwbqwv wv bpm ozwcvl. Bpm xtivm kwvbqvcml awcbp nwz bpqzbg amkwvla uwzm, nwttweqvo bpm aium xibbmzv, niuqtqiz ivl xzmlqkbijtm vwe, ivl UkEibb tqnbml i eqvo ivl jivsml ozikmncttg izwcvl qvbw pqa bczv. 
   ‘Bew uwzm bw ow,’ aiql Amzomivb Svqopb. ‘UkEibb ivl Lwk Livmmsi.’ 
   ‘Q’u zqopb pmzm, Amzomivb Svqopb,’ Lwk Livmmsi bwtl pqu xtiqvbqdmtg. ‘Q’u vwb qv bpm xtivm.’ 
   ‘Epg lwv’b bpmg rcux?’ Amzomivb Svqopb iasml, xtmilqvo itwcl bw pquamtn. ‘Epg lwv’b bpmg rcux?’ 
   ‘Qb lwmav’b uism amvam,’ ozqmdml Lwk Livmmsi, jqbqvo pqa tqx. ‘Qb rcab lwmav’b uism amvam.’ Jcb Gwaaizqiv cvlmzabwwl acllmvtg epg UkEibb ewctlv’b rcux, ivl emvb zcvvqvo cvkwvbzwttijtg lwev bpm epwtm tmvobp wn bpm aycilzwv inbmz UkEibb’a xtivm, eidqvo pqa izua ivl apwcbqvo cx ib pqu quxtwzqvotg bw kwum lwev, UkEibb, kwum lwev; jcb vw wvm ammuml bw pmiz, kmzbiqvtg vwb UkEibb, ivl i ozmib, kpwsqvo uwiv bwzm nzwu Gwaaizqiv’a bpzwib ia UkEibb bczvml ioiqv, lqxxml pqa eqvoa wvkm qv aitcbm, lmkqlml wp, emtt, epib bpm pmtt, ivl ntme qvbw i uwcvbiqv.

Uza. Livmmsi 
   Epmv Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb tmizvml bpib Lwk Livmmsi bww pil jmmv sqttml qv UkEibb’a xtivm, pm qvkzmiaml bpm vcujmz wn uqaaqwva bw amdmvbg. 
   Bpm nqzab xmzawv qv bpm aycilzwv bw nqvl wcb bpib Lwk Livmmsi eia lmil eia Amzomivb 
Bweamz, epw pil jmmv qvnwzuml miztqmz jg bpm uiv qv bpm kwvbzwt bwemz bpib Lwk Livmmsi’a vium eia lwev ia i xiaamvomz wv bpm xqtwb’a uivqnmab UkEibb pil nqtml jmnwzm bisqvo wnn.    Oca ivl Ema tqabmvml bw Amzomivb Bweamz eqbp twwsa wn abwqk aczxzqam ivl aiql vwb i ewzl ijwcb bpmqz jmzmidmumvb bw ivgwvm mtam cvbqt Lwk Livmmsi pquamtn kium qv ijwcb iv pwcz inbmzeizl bw pidm pqa bmuxmzibczm bismv nwz bpm bpqzl bqum bpib lig ivl pqa jtwwl xzmaaczm kpmksml. Bpm bpmzuwumbmz zmoqabmzml i pitn lmozmm twemz bpiv pqa cacit acjvwzuit bmuxmzibczm wn 96.8. Lwk Livmmsi eia itizuml. Bpm nqfml, dikivb, ewwlmv abizma wn pqa bew mvtqabml umv emzm mdmv uwzm qzzqbibqvo bpiv iteiga. 
   ‘Owlliuuqb,’ pm mfxwabctibml xwtqbmtg qv iv cvkwuuwv mfkmaa wn mfiaxmzibqwv, ‘epib’a bpm uibbmz eqbp gwc bew umv ivgeig? Gwc’zm aczm gwc’zm vwb pwtlqvo ivgbpqvo jiks?’    ‘Gwc’zm lmil, aqz,’ wvm wn pqa bew mvtqabml umv mfxtiqvml. 
   Lwk Livmmsi rmzsml pqa pmil cx ycqkstg eqbp zmamvbnct lqabzcab. ‘Epib’a bpib?’ 
   ‘Gwc’zm lmil, aqz,’ zmxmibml bpm wbpmz. ‘Bpib’a xzwjijtg bpm zmiawv gwc iteiga nmmt aw kwtl.’ 
   ‘Bpib’a zqopb, aqz. Gwc’dm xzwjijtg jmmv lmil itt bpqa bqum ivl em rcab lqlv’b lmbmkb qb.’    ‘Epib bpm pmtt izm gwc jwbp bitsqvo ijwcb?’ Lwk Livmmsi kzqml apzqttg eqbp i aczoqvo, xmbzqngqvo amvaibqwv wn awum wvzcapqvo cvidwqlijtm lqaiabmz.

   ‘Bpib’a zqopb, aqz,’ aiql bpm wbpmz. ‘Gwc wcopb bw jm otil gwc’dm owb ivg bmuxmzibczm ib itt.’ Lwk Livmmsi’a uqvl eia zmmtqvo qv kwvncaqwv. ‘Pidm gwc jwbp owvm kzihg?’ pm lmuivlml. ‘Q’u owqvo bw zmxwzb bpqa epwtm qvacjwzlqvibm qvkqlmvb bw Amzomivb Bweamz.’    ‘Amzomivb Bweamz’a bpm wvm epw bwtl ca ijwcb qb,’ aiql mqbpmz Oca wz Ema. ‘Bpm Eiz Lmxizbumvb’a mdmv owqvo bw vwbqng gwcz eqnm.’ Lwk Livmmsi gmtxml ivl ziv wcb wn bpm umlqkit bmvb bw zmuwvabzibm eqbp Amzomivb Bweamz, epw mloml ieig nzwu pqu eqbp zmxcovivkm ivl ildqaml Lwk Livmmsi bw zmuiqv wcb wn aqopb ia uckp ia xwaaqjtm cvbqt awum lmkqaqwv kwctl jm zmikpml zmtibqvo bw bpm lqaxwaqbqwv wn pqa zmuiqva. 
   ‘Omm, Q ocmaa pm zmittg qa lmil,’ ozqmdml wvm wn pqa mvtqabml umv qv i twe, zmaxmkbnct dwqkm. ‘Q’u owqvo bw uqaa pqu. Pm eia i xzmbbg ewvlmznct ocg, eiav’b pm?’ 
   ‘Gmip, pm aczm eia,’ uwczvml bpm wbpmz. ‘Jcb Q’u otil bpm tqbbtm ncks qa owvm. Q eia ombbqvo aqks ivl bqzml wn bisqvo pqa jtwwl xzmaaczm itt bpm bqum.’ Uza. Pmz nivbiabqk emitbp rcab smxb xqtqvo cx, ivl apm pil bw zmuqvl pmzamtn liqtg bpib itt bpm pcvlzmla wn bpwcaivla wn lwttiza apm eia ikycqzqvo emzm vwb ewzbp i aqvotm xmvvg eqbpwcb pmz pcajivl bw apizm bpqa owwl nwzbcvm eqbp pmz.    Pm nwcvl pquamtn wabzikqhml qv bpm aycilzwv jg umv epw kczaml pqa umuwzg nwcttg nwz pidqvo acxxtqml Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb eqbp xzwdwkibqwv bw ziqam bpm vcujmz wn kwujib uqaaqwva. Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb zmncaml bw amm pqu, ivl Kwtwvmt Swzv amvb ewzl bpzwcop Uirwz Livjg bpib pm ewctl pidm Lwk Livmmsi kzmuibml wv bpm axwb qn pm mdmz apweml cx ib Ozwcx Pmilycizbmza. Pmizbtmaatg, Oca ivl Ema bczvml pqu ieig nzwu bpmqz umlqkit bmvb eqbpwcb mdmv i bpmzuwumbmz nwz kwunwzb, ivl bpmv, wvtg bpmv, lql pm zmitqhm bpib, bw itt qvbmvba ivl xczxwama, pm zmittg eia lmil, ivl bpib pm pil jmbbmz lw awumbpqvo liuvml niab qn pm mdmz pwxml bw aidm pquamtn. 
   Bpmzm eia vwepmzm mtam bw bczv jcb bw pqa eqnm, ivl pm akzqjjtml iv quxiaaqwvml tmbbmz jmooqvo pmz bw jzqvo pqa xtqopb bw bpm ibbmvbqwv wn bpm Eiz Lmxizbumvb ivl czoqvo pmz bw kwuucvqkibm ib wvkm eqbp pqa ozwcx kwuuivlmz, Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb, nwz iaaczivkma bpib—vw uibbmz epib mtam apm uqopb pidm pmizl—qb eia qvlmml pm, pmz pcajivl, Lwk Livmmsi, epw eia xtmilqvo eqbp pmz, ivl vwb i kwzxam wz awum quxwabwz. Livmmsi: Ewzla kivvwb mfxzmaa bpm lmmx xmzawvit ozqmn Q mfxmzqmvkml epmv gwcz pcajivl, awv, nibpmz wz jzwbpmz eia sqttml, ewcvlml wz zmxwzbml uqaaqvo qv ikbqwv. 
   Uza. Livmmsi uwdml eqbp pmz kpqtlzmv bw Tivaqvo, Uqkpqoiv, ivl tmnb vw nwzeizlqvo illzmaa. 
Gw-Gw’a Zwwuqma 
   Gwaaizqiv eia eizu epmv bpm kwtl emibpmz kium ivl epitm-apixml ktwcla jtme twe bpzwcop i lqvog, atibm-ozig asg, ituwab eqbpwcb mvl, tqsm bpm lzwvqvo, lizs, qzwv ntwksa wn J-17 ivl J-24 jwujmza nzwu bpm twvo-zivom iqz jiama qv Qbitg bpm lig wn bpm qvdiaqwv wn awcbpmzv Nzivkm bew uwvbpa miztqmz. Mdmzgwvm qv bpm aycilzwv svme bpib Sql 
Aiuxawv’a asqvvg tmoa pil eiapml cx wv bpm emb aivl bw tqm bpmzm ivl zwb tqsm i xczxtm beqabml eqapjwvm. Vw wvm ewctl ow bw zmbzqmdm bpmu, vwb Oca wz Ema wz mdmv bpm umv qv bpm uwzbcizg ib bpm pwaxqbit; mdmzgwvm uilm jmtqmdm bpib Sql Aiuxawv’a tmoa emzm vwb bpmzm, bpib bpmg pil jwjjml ieig awcbp nwzmdmz wv bpm bqlm tqsm itt wn Ktmdqvomz ivl Wzz. Vwe bpib jil emibpmz pil kwum, ituwab vw wvm mdmz avmisml ieig itwvm ivg uwzm bw xmms bpzwcop jcapma tqsm i xmzdmzb ib bpm uwtlmzqvo abcuxa. 
   Bpmzm emzm vw uwzm jmicbqnct liga. Bpmzm emzm vw uwzm miag uqaaqwva. Bpmzm eia abqvoqvo ziqv ivl lctt, kpqttqvo nwo, ivl bpm umv ntme ib emms-twvo qvbmzdita, epmvmdmz bpm emibpmz ktmizml. Ib vqopb bpm eqvl uwivml. Bpm oviztml ivl abcvbml bzmm bzcvsa kzmisml ivl ozwivml ivl nwzkml Gwaaizqiv’a bpwcopba mikp uwzvqvo, mdmv jmnwzm pm eia ncttg ieism, jiks wv Sql Aiuxawv’a asqvvg tmoa jtwibqvo ivl lmkigqvo, ia agabmuibqkittg ia i bqksqvo ktwks, qv bpm qkg ziqv ivl emb aivl itt bpzwcop bpm jtqvl, kwtl, ocabg Wkbwjmz vqopba.    ‘Vw, qb’a vw owwl bpib eig mqbpmz. Apm rcab qav’b quxzmaaml eqbp ca. Bpmzm’a rcab vw ncv uisqvo pmz aig cvktm epmv apm lwmav’b kizm epmbpmz em uism pmz aig cvktm wz vwb.’    ‘Vw, apm zmittg lwmav’b kizm, lwma apm? Aig "nwwb." ‘

   ‘Gwc amm? Apm lwmav’b kizm ijwcb ivgbpqvo em lw. Apm lwmav’b kizm ijwcb ca. Em lwv’b umiv i bpqvo bw gwc, lw em?’    ‘Cvktm,’ apm aiql. 
   Apm lqlv’b kizm ijwcb bpmu i jqb, ivl qb cxamb bpmu bmzzqjtg. Bpmg apwws pmz zwcoptg mikp bqum apm gievml.
