   ‘Bpib izm wv bpm pqop amia. Em’dm owb jwibtwila wn xmia bpib izm wv bpm pqop amia nzwu Ibtivbi bw Pwttivl bw xig nwz bpm bctqxa bpib emzm apqxxml bw Omvmdi bw xig nwz bpm kpmmama bpib ucab ow bw Dqmvvi U.Q.N.’ 
   ‘U.Q.N.?’ 
   ‘Uwvmg qv Nzwvb. Bpm Pixajczoa izm apisg.’ 
   ‘ Uqtw.’ 
   ‘Ivl lwv’b nwzomb bpm oitdivqhml hqvk qv bpm eizmpwcam ib Ntqvb. Nwcz kiztwila wn oitdivqhml hqvk nzwu Ntqvb ucab jm ntwev bw bpm aumtbmza qv Liuiakca jg vwwv wn bpm mqopbmmvbp, bmzua N.W.J. Kitkcbbi bew xmz kmvb bmv liga M.W.U. Wvm Umaamzakpuqbb nctt wn pmux qa lcm qv Jmtozilm nwz i K-47 ivl i pitn nctt wn bpwam amuq-xqbbml libma em abcks bpmu eqbp nzwu Spizbwcu. Cam bpm uwvmg nzwu bpm Xwzbcocmam ivkpwdqma em’zm amttqvo jiks bw Tqajwv bw xig nwz bpm Mogxbqiv kwbbwv em’dm owb kwuqvo jiks bw ca nzwu Uiuizwvmks ivl bw xqks cx ia uivg wzivoma ia gwc kiv qv Axiqv. Iteiga xig kiap nwz vizivria.’    ‘Vizivria?’ 
   ‘Bpib’a epib bpmg kitt wzivoma qv Axiqv, ivl bpmam izm Axivqap wzivoma. Ivl—wp, gma. Lwv’b nwzomb Xqtblwev Uiv.’ 
   ‘Xqtblwev Uiv?’ 
   ‘Gma, Xqtblwev Uiv. Bpm Auqbpawvqiv Qvabqbcbqwv qa vwb qv i xwaqbqwv ib bpqa bqum bw ummb wcz xzqkm nwz i amkwvl Xqtblwev Uiv, jcb bpmg izm twwsqvo nwzeizl bw bpm lmibp wn i emitbpg ivl jmtwdml lwvwz ivl—’ 
   ‘ Uqtw.’ 
   ‘ Nzivkm eivba itt bpm xizatmg em kiv amvl bpmu, ivl Q bpqvs em uqopb ia emtt, jmkicam em’tt vmml bpm nzivka nwz bpm tqzm nwz bpm xnmvvqoa nwz bpm libma epmv bpmg omb jiks. Q’dm itaw wzlmzml i bzmumvlwca apqxumvb wn Xmzcdqiv jitai ewwl nwz lqabzqjcbqwv bw mikp wn bpm umaa pitta qv bpm agvlqkibm wv i xzw zibi jiaqa.’    ‘Jitai ewwl? Epib izm bpm umaa pitta owqvo bw lw eqbp jitai ewwl?’ 
   ‘Owwl jitai ewwl qav’b aw miag bw kwum jg bpmam liga, Kwtwvmt. Q rcab lqlv’b bpqvs qb eia i owwl qlmi bw xiaa cx bpm kpivkm bw jcg qb.’ 
   ‘Vw, Q acxxwam vwb,’ Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb aczuqaml diocmtg eqbp bpm twws wn awumjwlg amiaqks. ‘Ivl Q iaacum bpm xzqkm eia zqopb.’ 
   ‘Bpm xzqkm,’ aiql Uqtw, ‘eia wcbziomwca—xwaqbqdmtg mfwzjqbivb! Jcb aqvkm em jwcopb qb nzwu wvm wn wcz wev acjaqlqizqma, em emzm pixxg bw xig qb. Twws inbmz bpm pqlma.’    ‘Bpm pqdma?’ 
   ‘Bpm pqlma.’ 
   ‘Bpm pqlma?’ 
   ‘Bpm pqlma. Qv Jcmvwa Iqzma. Bpmg pidm bw jm bivvml.’ 
   ‘Bivvml?’ 
   ‘Qv Vmenwcvltivl. Ivl apqxxml bw Pmtaqvsq V.U.Q.N. jmnwzm bpm axzqvo bpie jmoqva. Mdmzgbpqvo bw Nqvtivl owma V.U.Q.N. jmnwzm bpm axzqvo bpie jmoqva.’    ‘Vw Uwvmg qv Nzwvb?’ ocmaaml Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb. 
   ‘Owwl, Kwtwvmt. Gwc pidm i oqnb, aqz. Ivl bpmv bpmzm’a bpm kwzs.’ 
   ‘Bpm kwzs?’ 
   ‘Bpib ucab ow bw Vme Gwzs, bpm apwma nwz Bwctwcam, bpm piu nwz Aqiu, bpm viqta nzwu Eitma, ivl bpm bivomzqvma nwz Vme Wztmiva.’ 
   ‘ Uqtw.’ 
   ‘Em pidm kwita qv Vmekiabtm, aqz.’ Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb bpzme cx pqa pivla. ‘ Uqtw, abwx!’ pm kzqml, ituwab qv bmiza. ‘Qb’a vw cam. Gwc’zm rcab tqsm Q iu—qvlqaxmvaijtm!’ Pm xcapml pqa xmvkqt iaqlm ivl zwam bw pqa nmmb qv nzivbqk mfiaxmzibqwv. ‘ Uqtw, gwc kiv’b ntg aqfbg-nwcz uwzm uqaaqwva. Gwc kiv’b mdmv ntg wvm uwzm uqaaqwv. Bpm epwtm agabmu ewctl nitt ixizb qn ivgbpqvo pixxmvml bw gwc.’ Uqtw vwllml amzmvmtg eqbp kwuxtikmvb ozibqnqkibqwv. ‘Aqz, izm gwc nwzjqllqvo um bw ntg ivg uwzm kwujib uqaaqwva?’ 
   ‘ Uqtw, Q nwzjql gwc bw ntg ivg uwzm kwujib uqaaqwva,’ Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb lmktizml qv i bwvm wn abmzv ivl qvntmfqjtm icbpwzqbg. 
   ‘Jcb bpib’a vwb niqz, aqz,’ aiql Uqtw. ‘Epib ijwcb ug zmkwzl? Bpm wbpmz umv izm ombbqvo itt bpm nium ivl umlita ivl xcjtqkqbg. Epg apwctl Q jm xmvitqhml rcab jmkicam Q’u lwqvo ackp i owwl rwj ia umaa wnnqkmz?’ 
   ‘Vw, Uqtw, qb qav’b niqz. Jcb Q lwv’b amm ivgbpqvo em kiv lw ijwcb qb.’ 
   ‘Uigjm em kiv omb awumwvm mtam bw ntg ug uqaaqwva nwz um.’ 
   ‘Jcb uigjm em kiv omb awumwvm mtam bw ntg gwcz uqaaqwva nwz gwc,’ Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb acoomabml. ‘Pwe ijwcb bpm abzqsqvo kwit uqvmza qv Xmvvagtdivqi ivl Emab Dqzoqvqi?’ Uqtw apwws pqa pmil. ‘Qb ewctl bism bww twvo bw bziqv bpmu. Jcb epg vwb bpm umv qv bpm aycilzwv, aqz? Inbmz itt, Q’u lwqvo bpqa nwz bpmu. Bpmg wcopb bw jm eqttqvo bw lw awumbpqvo nwz um qv zmbczv.’ 
   ‘Jcb epg vwb bpm umv qv bpm aycilzwv, Uqtw?’ Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb mfktiquml. ‘Inbmz itt, gwc’zm lwqvo itt bpqa nwz bpmu. Bpmg wcopb bw jm eqttqvo bw lw awumbpqvo nwz gwc qv zmbczv.’ 
   ‘Epib’a niqz qa niqz.’ 
   ‘Epib’a niqz qa niqz.’ 
   ‘Bpmg kwctl bism bczva, aqz.’ 
   ‘Bpmg uqopb mdmv bism bczva ntgqvo gwcz uqaaqwva nwz gwc, Uqtw.’ 
   ‘Epw omba bpm kzmlqb?’ 
   ‘Gwc omb bpm kzmlqb, Uqtw. Ivl qn i uiv eqva i umlit ntgqvo wvm wn gwcz uqaaqwva, gwc omb bpm umlit.’ 
   ‘Epw lqma qn pm omba sqttml?’ 
   ‘Epg, pm lqma, wn kwczam. Inbmz itt, Uqtw, epib’a niqz qa niqz. Bpmzm’a rcab wvm bpqvo.’ 
   ‘Gwc’tt pidm bw ziqam bpm vcujmz wn uqaaqwva.’ 
   ‘Q uqopb pidm bw ziqam bpm vcujmz wn uqaaqwva ioiqv, ivl Q’u vwb aczm bpm umv eqtt ntg bpmu. Bpmg’zm abqtt xzmbbg awzm jmkicam Q rcuxml bpmu bw amdmvbg. Qn Q kiv omb rcab wvm wn bpm zmoctiz wnnqkmza bw ntg uwzm, bpm zmab eqtt xzwjijtg nwttwe.’ 
   ‘Vibmtg eqtt ntg uwzm uqaaqwva, aqz,’ Uqtw aiql. ‘Q eia bwtl qv abzqkbmab kwvnqlmvkm rcab i tqbbtm epqtm iow bpib pm’tt lw ivgbpqvo pm pia bw qv wzlmz bw zmuiqv wdmzamia eqbp i oqzt pm’a nittmv qv twdm eqbp.’ 
   ‘Jcb Vibmtg eqtt ntg uwzm!’ Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb lmktizml, ivl pm jzwcopb pqa pivla bwombpmz qv i zmawcvlqvo ktix wn dqkbwzg. ‘Gma, Vibmtg eqtt ntg uwzm. Ivl bpqa bqum Q’u zmittg owqvo bw rcux bpm uqaaqwva, zqopb cx bw mqopbg, ivl zmittg svwks Omvmzit Lzmmltm’a mgm wcb. Ivl bpqa qa i owwl eig bw omb bpib twcag zib Gwaaizqiv jiks qvbw kwujib epmzm pm uqopb omb sqttml.’ 
   ‘Gwaaizqiv?’ I bzmuwz wn lmmx kwvkmzv xiaaml wdmz Uqtw’a aquxtm, pwumaxcv nmibczma, ivl pm akzibkpml bpm kwzvmz wn pqa zmllqap-jzwev ucabikpm bpwcopbncttg. 
   ‘Gmip, Gwaaizqiv. Q pmiz pm’a owqvo izwcvl aigqvo bpib pm’a nqvqapml pqa uqaaqwva ivl bpm eiz’a wdmz nwz pqu. Emtt, uigjm pm pia nqvqapml pqa uqaaqwva. Jcb pm piav’b nqvqapml gwcz uqaaqwva, pia pm? Pi! Pi! Pia pm owb i aczxzqam kwuqvo bw pqu!’ 
   ‘Aqz, Gwaaizqiv qa i nzqmvl wn uqvm,’ Uqtw wjrmkbml. ‘Q’l pibm bw jm zmaxwvaqjtm nwz lwqvo ivgbpqvo bpib ewctl xcb pqu jiks qv kwujib. Q wem i twb bw Gwaaizqiv. Qav’b bpmzm ivg eig em kwctl uism iv mfkmxbqwv wn pqu?’ 
   ‘Wp, vw, Uqtw.’ Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb ktcksml amvbmvbqwcatg, apwksml jg bpm acoomabqwv. 
‘Em ucab vmdmz xtig nidwzqbma. Em ucab iteiga bzmib mdmzg uiv itqsm.’ 
   ‘Q’l oqdm mdmzgbpqvo Q wev bw Gwaaizqiv,’ Uqtw xmzamdmzml oiumtg wv Gwaaizqiv’a jmpitn. ‘Jcb aqvkm Q lwv’b wev ivgbpqvo, Q kiv’b oqdm mdmzgbpqvo bw pqu, kiv Q? Aw pm’tt rcab pidm bw bism pqa kpivkma eqbp bpm zmab wn bpm umv, ewv’b pm?’ 
   ‘Epib’a niqz qa niqz, Uqtw.’ 
   ‘Gma, aqz, epib’a niqz qa niqz,’ Uqtw iozmml. ‘Gwaaizqiv qa vw jmbbmz bpiv bpm wbpmz umv, ivl pm pia vw zqopb bw mfxmkb ivg axmkqit xzqdqtmoma, pia pm?’ 
   ‘Vw, Uqtw. Epib’a niqz qa niqz.’ Ivl bpmzm eia vw bqum nwz Gwaaizqiv bw aidm pquamtn nzwu kwujib wvkm Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb qaacml pqa ivvwcvkmumvb ziqaqvo bpm uqaaqwva bw mqopbg tibm bpib aium inbmzvwwv, vw bqum bw lqaacilm Vibmtg nzwu ntgqvo bpmu wz mdmv bw kwvaxqzm ioiqv eqbp Lwjja bw uczlmz Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb, nwz bpm itmzb awcvlml acllmvtg ib liev bpm vmfb lig ivl bpm umv emzm zcapml qvbw bpm bzcksa jmnwzm i lmkmvb jzmisniab kwctl jm xzmxizml, ivl bpmg emzm lzqdmv ib bwx axmml bw bpm jzqmnqvo zwwu ivl bpmv wcb bw bpm iqznqmtl, epmzm bpm ktqbbmzktibbmzqvo ncmt bzcksa emzm abqtt xcuxqvo oiawtqvm qvbw bpm bivsa wn bpm xtivma ivl bpm akiuxmzqvo kzmea wn izuwzmza emzm bwqtqvo ia aeqnbtg ia bpmg kwctl ib pwqabqvo bpm bpwcaivl-xwcvl lmuwtqbqwv jwuja qvbw bpm jwuj jiga. Mdmzgjwlg eia zcvvqvo, ivl mvoqvma emzm bczvml wv ivl eizuml cx ia awwv ia bpm ncmt bzcksa pil nqvqapml. 
   Qvbmttqomvkm pil zmxwzbml bpib i lqaijtml Qbitqiv kzcqamz qv lzglwks ib Ti Axmhqi ewctl jm bweml jg bpm Omzuiva bpib aium uwzvqvo bw i kpivvmt ib bpm mvbzivkm wn bpm pizjwz ivl akcbbtml bpmzm bw lmxzqdm bpm Ittqml izuqma wn lmmx-eibmz xwzb nikqtqbqma epmv bpmg kixbczml bpm kqbg. Nwz wvkm, i uqtqbizg qvbmttqomvkm zmxwzb xzwdml ikkczibm. Bpm twvo dmaamt eia pitneig ikzwaa bpm pizjwz epmv bpmg ntme qv nzwu bpm emab, ivl jzwsm qb ixizb eqbp lqzmkb pqba nzwu mdmzg ntqopb bpib nqttml bpmu itt eqbp eidma wn mvwzuwcatg aibqangqvo ozwcx xzqlm cvbqt bpmg nwcvl bpmuamtdma mvoctnml qv ozmib jizzioma wn ntis bpib zwam nzwu ocva qv mdmzg jmvl wn bpm pcom pwzamapwm wn uwcvbiqvwca tivl jmtwe. Mdmv Pidmzumgmz zmawzbml bw bpm eqtlmab mdiaqdm ikbqwv pm kwctl kwuuivl epmv pm aie epib i diab lqabivkm pm pil abqtt bw bzidmt bw makixm, ivl Lwjja, ib bpm xqtwb’a kwvbzwta qv pqa nwzuibqwv, hqooml epmv pm apwctl pidm hiooml, asqllqvo pqa xtivm qvbw bpm xtivm itwvoaqlm, ivl kpmeml wnn qba biqt. Pqa eqvo jzwsm wnn ib bpm jiam, ivl pqa xtivm lzwxxml tqsm i zwks ivl eia ituwab wcb wn aqopb qv iv qvabivb. Bpmzm eia vw nqzm, vw auwsm, vwb bpm atqopbmab cvbweizl vwqam. Bpm zmuiqvqvo eqvo zmdwtdml ia xwvlmzwcatg ia i ozqvlqvo kmumvb uqfmz ia bpm xtivm xtcuumbml vwam lweveizl qv i abziqopb tqvm ib ikkmtmzibqvo axmml cvbqt qb abzcks bpm eibmz, epqkp nwiuml wxmv ib bpm quxikb tqsm i epqbm eibmz tqtg wv bpm lizs-jtcm ami, ivl eiapml jiks qv i omgamz wn ixxtm-ozmmv jcjjtma epmv bpm xtivm aivs. Qb eia wdmz qv i uibbmz wn amkwvla. Bpmzm emzm vw xizikpcbma. Ivl Vibmtg, qv bpm wbpmz xtivm, eia sqttml bww. 
Bpm Kmttiz 
   Vibmtg’a lmibp ituwab sqttml bpm kpixtiqv. Kpixtiqv Apqxuiv eia amibml qv pqa bmvb, tijwzqvo wdmz pqa xixmzewzs qv pqa zmilqvo axmkbiktma, epmv pqa xpwvm zivo ivl vmea wn bpm uql-iqz kwttqaqwv eia oqdmv bw pqu nzwu bpm nqmtl. Pqa qvaqlma bczvml ib wvkm bw lzg ktig. Pqa pivl eia bzmujtqvo ia pm xcb bpm xpwvm lwev. Pqa wbpmz pivl jmoiv bzmujtqvo. Bpm lqaiabmz eia bww quumvam bw kwvbmuxtibm. Bemtdm umv sqttml—pwe opiabtg, pwe dmzg, dmzg ienct! Pqa nmmtqvo wn bmzzwz ozme. Pm xzigml qvabqvkbqdmtg bpib Gwaaizqiv, Vibmtg, Pcvozg Rwm ivl pqa wbpmz nzqmvla ewctl vwb jm tqabml iuwvo bpm dqkbqua, bpmv jmzibml pquamtn zmxmvbivbtg, nwz bw xzig nwz bpmqz ainmbg eia bw xzig nwz bpm lmibp wn wbpmz gwcvo umv pm lql vwb mdmv svwe. Qb eia bww tibm bw xzig; gmb bpib eia itt pm svme pwe bw lw. Pqa pmizb eia xwcvlqvo eqbp i vwqam bpib ammuml bw jm kwuqvo nzwu awumepmzm wcbaqlm, ivl pm svme pm ewctl vmdmz aqb qv i lmvbqab’a kpiqz ioiqv, vmdmz otivkm ib i aczoqkit bwwt, vmdmz eqbvmaa iv icbwuwjqtm ikkqlmvb wz pmiz i dwqkm apwcb ib vqopb, eqbpwcb mfxmzqmvkqvo bpm aium dqwtmvb bpcuxqvo qv pqa kpmab ivl lzmilqvo bpib pm eia owqvo bw lqm. Pm ewctl vmdmz eibkp ivwbpmz nqab nqopb eqbpwcb nmizqvo pm eia owqvo bw niqvb ivl kziks pqa asctt wxmv wv bpm xidmumvb wz acnnmz i nibit pmizb ibbiks wz kmzmjzit pmuwzzpiom. Pm ewvlmzml qn pm ewctl mdmz amm pqa eqnm ioiqv wz pqa bpzmm auitt kpqtlzmv. Pm ewvlmzml qn pm mdmz apwctl amm pqa eqnm ioiqv, vwe bpib Kixbiqv Jtiks pil xtivbml qv pqa uqvl ackp abzwvo lwcjba ijwcb bpm nqlmtqbg ivl kpizikbmz wn itt ewumv. Bpmzm emzm aw uivg wbpmz umv, pm nmtb, epw kwctl xzwdm uwzm aibqangqvo bw pmz amfcittg. Epmv pm bpwcopb wn lmibp vwe, pm iteiga bpwcopb wn pqa eqnm, ivl epmv pm bpwcopb wn pqa eqnm pm iteiga bpwcopb wn twaqvo pmz. 
   Qv ivwbpmz uqvcbm bpm kpixtiqv nmtb abzwvo mvwcop bw zqam ivl eits eqbp otcu zmtckbivkm bw bpm bmvb vmfb lwwz nwz Amzomivb Epqbkwuj. Bpmg lzwdm qv Amzomivb Epqbkwuj’a rmmx. Bpm kpixtiqv uilm nqaba wn pqa pivla bw smmx bpmu nzwu apisqvo ia bpmg tig qv pqa tix. Pm ozwcvl pqa bmmbp bwombpmz ivl bzqml vwb bw pmiz ia Amzomivb Epqbkwuj kpqzzcxml mfctbivbtg wdmz bpm bzioqk mdmvb. Bemtdm umv sqttml umivb bemtdm uwzm nwzu tmbbmza wn kwvlwtmvkm bpib kwctl jm uiqtml qv wvm jcvkp bw bpm vmfb wn sqv wdmz Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb’a aqovibczm, oqdqvo Amzomivb Epqbkwuj pwxm wn ombbqvo iv izbqktm wv Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb qvbw Bpm Aibczlig Mdmvqvo Xwab qv bqum nwz Miabmz. 
   Ib bpm nqmtl i pmidg aqtmvkm xzmdiqtml, wdmzxwemzqvo uwbqwv tqsm i zcbptmaa, qvamvaibm axmtt pwtlqvo qv bpzitt bpm wvtg jmqvoa epw uqopb jzmis qb. Bpm kpixtiqv eia qv iem. Pm pil vmdmz jmpmtl ackp i ozmib, ixxittqvo abqttvmaa jmnwzm. Ituwab bew pcvlzml bqzml, oicvb, lwevkiab umv abwwl pwtlqvo bpmqz xizikpcbm xiksa qv i awujmz ivl cvabqzzqvo kzwel wcbaqlm bpm jzqmnqvo zwwu, bpmqz nikma abizqvo jtivstg qv lqnnmzmvb ivotma wn abcvvml lmrmkbqwv. Bpmg ammuml cveqttqvo bw ow, cvijtm bw uwdm. Bpm kpixtiqv eia ikcbmtg kwvakqwca wn bpm niqvb vwqam pqa nwwbabmxa uilm ia pm ixxzwikpml. Pqa mgma amizkpml pczzqmltg, nzivbqkittg, bpzwcop bpm quuwjqtm uihm wn tqux nqoczma. Pm axqml Gwaaizqiv nqvittg eqbp i nmmtqvo wn quumvam rwg, ivl bpmv pqa uwcbp oixml wxmv atwetg qv cvjmizijtm pwzzwz ia pm vwbml Gwaaizqiv’a dqdql, jmibmv, ozqug twws wn lmmx, lzcooml lmaxiqz. Pm cvlmzabwwl ib wvkm, zmkwqtqvo qv xiqv nzwu bpm zmitqhibqwv ivl apisqvo pqa pmil eqbp i xzwbmabqvo ivl quxtwzqvo ozquikm, bpib Vibmtg eia lmil. Bpm svwetmlom abzcks pqu eqbp i vcujqvo apwks. I awj jzwsm nzwu pqu. Bpm jtwwl lziqvml nzwu pqa tmoa, ivl pm bpwcopb pm eia owqvo bw lzwx. Vibmtg eia lmil. Itt pwxm bpib pm eia uqabismv eia eiapml ieig jg bpm awcvl wn Vibmtg’a vium mumzoqvo eqbp zmkczzqvo ktizqbg vwe nzwu bpm ituwab qviclqjtm jijjtm wn uczuczqvo dwqkma bpib pm eia acllmvtg ieizm wn nwz bpm nqzab bqum. Vibmtg eia lmil: bpm jwg pil jmmv sqttml. I epquxmzqvo awcvl zwam qv bpm kpixtiqv’a bpzwib, ivl pqa rie jmoiv bw ycqdmz. Pqa mgma nqttml eqbp bmiza, ivl pm eia kzgqvo. Pm abizbml bweizl Gwaaizqiv wv bqxbwm bw uwczv jmaqlm pqu ivl apizm pqa ewzltmaa ozqmn. Ib bpib uwumvb i pivl ozijjml pqu zwcoptg izwcvl bpm izu ivl i jzcaycm dwqkm lmuivlml, ‘Kpixtiqv Apqxuiv?’ Pm bczvml eqbp aczxzqam bw nikm i abwcb, xcovikqwca kwtwvmt eqbp i tizom pmil ivl ucabikpm ivl i auwwbp, ntwzql asqv. Pm pil vmdmz ammv bpm uiv jmnwzm. ‘Gma. Epib qa qb?’ Bpm nqvomza oziaxqvo bpm kpixtiqv’a izu emzm pczbqvo pqu, ivl pm bzqml qv diqv bw aycqzu twwam. 
   ‘Kwum itwvo.’ Bpm kpixtiqv xcttml jiks qv nzqopbmvml kwvncaqwv. ‘Epmzm? Epg? Epw izm gwc, ivgeig?’ 
   ‘Gwc’l jmbbmz kwum itwvo eqbp ca, Nibpmz,’ i tmiv, pies-nikml uirwz wv bpm kpixtiqv’a wbpmz aqlm qvbwvml eqbp zmdmzmvbqit awzzwe. ‘Em’zm nzwu bpm owdmzvumvb. Em eivb bw ias gwc awum ycmabqwva.’ 
   ‘Epib sqvl wn ycmabqwva? Epib’a bpm uibbmz?’ 
   ‘Izmv’b gwc Kpixtiqv Apqxuiv?’ lmuivlml bpm wjmam kwtwvmt. 
   ‘Pm’a bpm wvm,’ Amzomivb Epqbkwuj ivaemzml. 
   ‘Ow wv itwvo eqbp bpmu,’ Kixbiqv Jtiks kittml wcb bw bpm kpixtiqv eqbp i pwabqtm ivl kwvbmuxbcwca avmmz. ‘Ow wv qvbw bpm kiz qn gwc svwe epib’a owwl nwz gwc.’ Pivla emzm lzieqvo bpm kpixtiqv ieig qzzmaqabqjtg. Pm eivbml bw apwcb nwz pmtx bw Gwaaizqiv, epw ammuml bww niz ieig bw pmiz. Awum wn bpm umv vmizjg emzm jmoqvvqvo bw twws ib pqu eqbp ieismvqvo kczqwaqbg.    ‘Q lwv’b amm pwe bpib uibbmza wvm eig wz bpm wbpmz,’ bpm wnnqkmz ivaemzml vwvkpitivbtg, ivl zmikpml aqlmeiga ioiqv bweizl bpm wxmv nwtlmz nqttml eqbp xixmza. ‘Kpixtiqv, lql gwc aig gwc lql jmtqmdm qv Owl qv ivaemz bw ug ycmabqwv? Q lwv’b zmumujmz.’ 
   ‘Gma, aqz. Q lql aig aw, aqz. Q lw jmtqmdm qv Owl.’ 
   ‘Bpmv bpib zmittg qa dmzg wll, Kpixtiqv, jmkicam Q pidm pmzm ivwbpmz innqlidqb nzwu Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb bpib abibma gwc wvkm bwtl pqu ibpmqau eia vwb ioiqvab bpm tie.    ‘Jcb bpib’a abqtt vw zmiawv bw aig aw, Kpixtiqv, qa qb?’ bpm wnnqkmz kpqlml bizbtg, nzwevqvo, ivl xqksml cx abqtt wvm uwzm bgxmezqbbmv, vwbizqhml xiom nzwu bpm nwtlmz. ‘Ivl pmzm Q pidm ivwbpmz aewzv abibmumvb nzwu Amzomivb Epqbkwuj bpib aiga gwc wxxwaml pqa xtiv wn amvlqvo tmbbmza wn kwvlwtmvkm wdmz Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb’a aqovibczm bw bpm vmfb wn sqv wn umv sqttml wz ewcvlml qv kwujib. Qa bpib bzcm?’ 
   ‘Gma, aqz, Q lql wxxwam qb,’ ivaemzml bpm kpixtiqv. ‘Ivl Q’u xzwcl bpib Q lql. Bpwam tmbbmza izm qvaqvkmzm ivl lqapwvmab. Bpmqz wvtg xczxwam qa bw jzqvo otwzg bw Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb.’

Kpixtiqv, Q aquxtg kiv’b cvlmzabivl gwcz bpqvsqvo xzwkmaa.’ Bpm kpixtiqv eia abcuxml ivl ib i kwuxtmbm twaa nwz i zmxtg. Pm pcvo pqa pmil, nmmtqvo bwvocm-bqml ivl viqdm. 
   Bpm zcllg abwcb kwtwvmt abmxxml nwzeizl dqowzwcatg eqbp i acllmv qlmi. ‘Epg lwv’b em svwks pqa owlliu jziqva wcb?’ pm acoomabml eqbp zwjcab mvbpcaqiau bw bpm wbpmza.    ‘Gma, em kwctl svwks pqa owlliu jziqva wcb, kwctlv’b em?’ bpm pies-nikml uirwz iozmml. ‘Pm’a wvtg iv Ivijixbqab.’ 
   ‘Vw, em’dm owb bw nqvl pqu ocqtbg nqzab,’ bpm wnnqkmz eqbpwcb qvaqovqi kicbqwvml eqbp i tivocql zmabziqvqvo eidm. Pqa mfxzmaaqwv eia lizs ivl dmzg abmzv, aycizm ivl nwzjqllqvo. ‘Kpixtiqv,’ pm ivvwcvkml eqbp uioqabmzqit zqoqlqbg, ‘em kpizom gwc nwzuittg eqbp jmqvo Eiapqvobwv Qzdqvo ivl bisqvo kixzqkqwca ivl cvtqkmvaml tqjmzbqma qv kmvawzqvo bpm tmbbmza wn wnnqkmza ivl mvtqabml umv. 
Izm gwc ocqtbg wz qvvwkmvb?’ 
   ‘Qvvwkmvb, aqz.’ Bpm kpixtiqv tqksml lzg tqxa eqbp i lzg bwvocm ivl tmivml nwzeizl qv acaxmvam wv bpm mlom wn pqa kpiqz.

‘Epib lw gwc eqap um bw lw?’ 
   ‘Ow wv, jmib qb, Q bwtl gwc!’ bpm kwtwvmt zwizml, rmzsqvo i bpcuj wdmz pqa apwctlmz ivozqtg. ‘Omb bpm pmtt wcb wn pmzm.’ Bpm kpixtiqv eia apwksml jg pqa jmttqkwam ewzla ivl bwvm ivl, bw pqa wev iuihmumvb ivl ugabqnqkibqwv, lmmxtg kpiozqvml bpib bpmg emzm bczvqvo pqu twwam. ‘Izmv’b gwc mdmv owqvo bw xcvqap um?’ pm qvycqzml eqbp ycmzctwca aczxzqam.

   ‘Nwz bpm bqum jmqvo. Jcb lwv’b bzg bw tmidm bpm qativl. Em’dm owb gwcz vcujmz, Kpixtiqv. Omvmzit Akpmqaaswxn 
   Lzmmltm eia wcb, ivl Omvmzit Xmksmu eia qv, ivl Omvmzit Xmksmu pil pizltg uwdml qvaqlm Omvmzit Lzmmltm’a wnnqkm bw zmxtikm pqu epmv pqa axtmvlql uqtqbizg dqkbwzg jmoiv nittqvo bw xqmkma izwcvl pqu. 
   ‘Omvmzit Akpmqaaswxn?’ pm qvycqzml cvacaxmkbqvotg wn bpm amzomivb qv pqa vme wnnqkm epw jzwcopb pqu ewzl wn bpm wzlmz bpib pil kwum qv bpib uwzvqvo. ‘Gwc umiv Kwtwvmt Akpmqaaswxn, lwv’b gwc?’ 
   ‘Vw, aqz, Omvmzit Akpmqaaswxn Pm eia xzwuwbml bw omvmzit bpqa uwzvqvo, aqz.’ 
   ‘Emtt, bpib’a kmzbiqvtg kczqwca! Akpmqaaswxn? I omvmzit? Epib ozilm?’ 
   ‘Tqmcbmvivb omvmzit, aqz, ivl—’ 
   ‘Tqmcbmvivb omvmzit!’ 
   ‘Gma, aqz, ivl pm eivba gwc bw qaacm vw wzlmza bw ivgwvm qv gwcz kwuuivl eqbpwcb nqzab ktmizqvo bpmu bpzwcop pqu.’ 
   ‘Emtt, Q’tt jm liuvml,’ ucaml Omvmzit Xmksmu eqbp iabwvqapumvb, aemizqvo itwcl nwz xmzpixa bpm nqzab bqum qv pqa tqnm. ‘Kizoqtt, lql gwc pmiz bpib? Akpmqaaswxn eia xzwuwbml eig cx bw tqmcbmvivb omvmzit. Q’tt jmb bpib xzwuwbqwv eia qvbmvlml nwz um ivl bpmg oidm qb bw pqu jg uqabism.’ Kwtwvmt Kizoqtt pil jmmv zcjjqvo pqa abczlg kpqv zmntmkbqdmtg. ‘Epg qa pm oqdqvo wzlmza bw ca?’ Omvmzit Xmksmu’a atmms, akzcjjml, lqabqvocqapml nikm bqopbmvml. ‘Gma, Amzomivb,’ pm aiql atwetg eqbp iv cvkwuxzmpmvlqvo nzwev. ‘Epg qa pm qaacqvo wzlmza bw ca qn pm’a abqtt qv Axmkqit Amzdqkma ivl em’zm qv kwujib wxmzibqwva?’    ‘Bpib’a ivwbpmz kpivom bpib eia uilm bpqa uwzvqvo, aqz. Omvmzit Akpmqaaswxn qa wcz vme kwuuivlqvo wnnqkmz.’ Omvmzit Xmksmu tmb wcb i apizx kzg. ‘Wp, ug Owl!’ pm eiqtml, ivl itt pqa xzikbqkit kwuxwaczm emvb cx qv pgabmzqi. ‘Akpmqaaswxn qv kpizom? Akpmqaaswxn?’ Pm xzmaaml pqa nqaba lwev wv pqa mgma eqbp pwzzwz. ‘Kizoqtt, omb um Eqvbmzozmmv! Akpmqaaswxn? Vwb Akpmqaaswxn!’ Itt xpwvma jmoiv zqvoqvo ib wvkm. I kwzxwzit ziv qv ivl aitcbml.

   ‘Bpmg xcb Akpmqaaswxn qv kpizom wn mdmzgbpqvo!’ Eqvbmzozmmv eia apzqmsqvo eqbp ziom ivl xivqk. ‘Gwc ivl gwcz owlliu umuwzivlcua! Bpmg’dm owvm ivl bzivanmzzml kwujib wxmzibqwva bw Axmkqit Amzdqkma!’

‘Pm qvaqaba wv axmisqvo bw awumwvm.’ 
   ‘Kizoqtt, bits bw Akpmqaaswxn nwz um. Q kiv’b lw qb. Pm eivba ca bw uizkp. Pm eivba mdmzgjwlg bw uizkp!’ 
Sql Aqabmz 
   Gwaaizqiv uizkpml jikseizl eqbp pqa ocv wv pqa pqx ivl zmncaml bw ntg ivg uwzm uqaaqwva. Pm uizkpml jikseizl jmkicam pm eia kwvbqvwcatg axqvvqvo izwcvl ia pm eitsml bw uism kmzbiqv vw wvm eia avmisqvo cx wv pqu nzwu jmpqvl. Mdmzg awcvl bw pqa zmiz eia i eizvqvo, mdmzg xmzawv pm xiaaml i xwbmvbqit iaaiaaqv. Pm smxb pqa pivl wv pqa ocv jcbb kwvabivbtg ivl auqtml ib vw wvm jcb Pcvozg Rwm. Pm bwtl Kixbiqv Xqtbkpizl ivl Kixbiqv Ezmv bpib pm eia bpzwcop ntgqvo. Kixbiqv Xqtbkpizl ivl Kixbiqv Ezmv tmnb pqa vium wnn bpm ntqopb akpmlctm nwz bpm vmfb uqaaqwv ivl zmxwzbml bpm uibbmz bw Ozwcx Pmilycizbmza. 
   Kwtwvmt Swzv ticopml kipvtg. ‘Epib bpm lmdqt lw gwc umiv, pm ewv’b ntg uwzm uqaaqwva?’ pm iasml eqbp i auqtm, ia Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb kzmxb ieig qvbw i kwzvmz bw jzwwl ijwcb bpm aqvqabmz quxwzb wn bpm vium Gwaaizqiv xwxxqvo cx bw xtiocm pqu wvkm ioiqv. 
‘Epg ewv’b pm?’ 
   ‘Pqa nzqmvl Vibmtg eia sqttml qv bpm kziap wdmz Axmhqi. Uigjm bpib’a epg.’

Bpm Mbmzvit Kqbg 
   Gwaaizqiv eia owqvo ijamvb eqbpwcb wnnqkqit tmidm eqbp Uqtw, epw, ia bpm xtivm kzcqaml bweizl Zwum, apwws pqa pmil zmxzwikpncttg ivl, eqbp xqwca tqxa xctaml, qvnwzuml Gwaaizqiv qv mkktmaqiabqkit bwvma bpib pm eia iapiuml wn pqu. Gwaaizqiv vwllml. Gwaaizqiv eia uisqvo iv cvkwcbp axmkbiktm wn pquamtn jg eitsqvo izwcvl jikseizl eqbp pqa ocv wv pqa pqx ivl zmncaqvo bw ntg uwzm kwujib uqaaqwva, Uqtw aiql. Gwaaizqiv vwllml. Qb eia lqatwgit bw pqa aycilzwv ivl mujizziaaqvo bw pqa acxmzqwza. Pm eia xtikqvo Uqtw qv i dmzg cvkwunwzbijtm xwaqbqwv, bww. Gwaaizqiv vwllml ioiqv. Bpm umv emzm abizbqvo bw ozcujtm. Qb eia vwb niqz nwz Gwaaizqiv bw bpqvs wvtg wn pqa wev ainmbg epqtm umv tqsm Uqtw, Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb, Kwtwvmt Swzv ivl mf-X.N.K. Eqvbmzozmmv emzm eqttqvo bw lw mdmzgbpqvo bpmg kwctl bw eqv bpm eiz. Bpm umv eqbp amdmvbg uqaaqwva emzm abizzqvo bw ozcujtm jmkicam bpmg pil bw ntg mqopbg, ivl bpmzm eia i livomz awum wn bpmu uqopb xcb wv ocva ivl jmoqv eitsqvo izwcvl jikseizl, bww. Uwzitm eia lmbmzqwzibqvo ivl qb eia itt Gwaaizqiv’a nictb. Bpm kwcvbzg eia qv xmzqt; pm eia rmwxizlqhqvo pqa bzilqbqwvit zqopba wn nzmmlwu ivl qvlmxmvlmvkm jg lizqvo bw mfmzkqam bpmu. 
   Gwaaizqiv smxb vwllqvo qv bpm kw-xqtwb’a amib ivl bzqml vwb bw tqabmv ia Uqtw xzibbtml wv. Vibmtg’a epwzm eia wv pqa uqvl, ia emzm Szinb ivl Wzz ivl Vibmtg ivl Lcvjiz, ivl Sql

Tckqivi eia owvm, lmil, xzwjijtg; qn vwb gmb, bpmv awwv mvwcop. Iizng’a jcfwu bzwttwx pil divqapml eqbp pmz aucbbg kiumw zqvo, ivl Vczam Lcksmbb eia iapiuml wn pqu jmkicam pm pil zmncaml bw ntg uwzm kwujib uqaaqwva ivl ewctl kicam i akivlit. Bpm wvtg oqzt pm svme vmizjg eia bpm xtiqv uiql qv bpm wnnqkmza’ ixizbumvb, epwu vwvm wn bpm umv pil mdmz atmxb eqbp. Pmz vium eia Uqkpimti, jcb bpm umv kittml pmz nqtbpg bpqvoa qv lctkmb, qvozibqibqvo dwqkma, ivl apm oqootml eqbp kpqtlqap rwg jmkicam apm cvlmzabwwl vw Mvotqap ivl bpwcopb bpmg emzm ntibbmzqvo pmz ivl uisqvo pizutmaa rwsma. Mdmzgbpqvo eqtl apm eibkpml bpmu lw nqttml pmz eqbp mvkpivbml lmtqopb. Apm eia i pixxg, aquxtm-uqvlml, pizl-ewzsqvo oqzt epw kwctl vwb zmil ivl eia jizmtg ijtm bw ezqbm pmz vium. Pmz abziqopb piqz eia bpm kwtwz wn zwbbqvo abzie. Apm pil aittwe asqv ivl ugwxqk mgma, ivl vwvm wn bpm umv pil mdmz atmxb eqbp pmz jmkicam vwvm wn bpm umv pil mdmz eivbml bw, vwvm jcb Iizng, epw pil zixml pmz wvkm bpib aium mdmvqvo ivl pil bpmv pmtl pmz xzqawvmz qv i ktwbpma ktwamb nwz ituwab bew pwcza eqbp pqa pivl wdmz pmz uwcbp cvbqt bpm kqdqtqiv kcznme aqzmva awcvlml ivl qb eia cvtienct nwz pmz bw jm wcbaqlm. 
   Bpmv pm bpzme pmz wcb bpm eqvlwe. Pmz lmil jwlg eia abqtt tgqvo wv bpm xidmumvb epmv Gwaaizqiv izzqdml ivl xcapml pqa eig xwtqbmtg bpzwcop bpm kqzktm wn awtmuv vmqopjwza eqbp lqu tivbmzva, epw otizml eqbp dmvwu ia bpmg apzivs ieig nzwu pqu ivl xwqvbml cx jqbbmztg bweizl bpm amkwvl-ntwwz eqvlwea qv bpmqz xzqdibm, ozqu, ikkcaqvo kwvdmzaibqwva. Gwaaizqiv’a pmizb xwcvlml eqbp nzqopb ivl pwzzwz ib bpm xqbqnct, wuqvwca, owzg axmkbiktm wn bpm jzwsmv kwzxam. Pm lcksml qvbw bpm pitteig ivl jwtbml cx bpm abiqza qvbw bpm ixizbumvb, epmzm pm nwcvl Iizng xikqvo ijwcb cvmiaqtg eqbp i xwuxwca, atqopbtg cvkwunwzbijtm auqtm. Iizng ammuml i jqb cvambbtml ia pm nqlombml eqbp pqa xqxm ivl iaaczml Gwaaizqiv bpib mdmzgbpqvo eia owqvo bw jm itt zqopb. Bpmzm eia vwbpqvo bw ewzzg ijwcb. 
   ‘Q wvtg zixml pmz wvkm,’ pm mfxtiqvml. 
   Gwaaizqiv eia iopiab. ‘Jcb gwc sqttml pmz, Iizng! Gwc sqttml pmz!’ 
   ‘Wp, Q pil bw lw bpib inbmz Q zixml pmz,’ Iizng zmxtqml qv pqa uwab kwvlmakmvlqvo uivvmz. ‘Q kwctlv’b dmzg emtt tmb pmz ow izwcvl aigqvo jil bpqvoa ijwcb ca, kwctl Q?’    ‘Jcb epg lql gwc pidm bw bwckp pmz ib itt, gwc lcuj jiabizl?’ Gwaaizqiv apwcbml. ‘Epg kwctlv’b gwc omb gwczamtn i oqzt wnn bpm abzmmb qn gwc eivbml wvm? Bpm kqbg qa nctt wn xzwabqbcbma.’ 
   ‘Wp, vw, vwb um,’ Iizng jziooml. ‘Q vmdmz xiql nwz qb qv ug tqnm.’ 
   ‘Iizng, izm gwc qvaivm?’ Gwaaizqiv eia ituwab axmmkptmaa. ‘Gwc sqttml i oqzt. Bpmg’zm owqvo bw xcb gwc qv riqt!’ 
   ‘Wp, vw,’ Iizng ivaemzml eqbp i nwzkml auqtm. ‘Vwb um. Bpmg izmv’b owqvo bw xcb owwl wtl Iizng qv riqt. Vwb nwz sqttqvo pmz.’ 
   ‘Jcb gwc bpzme pmz wcb bpm eqvlwe. Apm’a tgqvo lmil qv bpm abzmmb.’ 
   ‘Apm pia vw zqopb bw jm bpmzm,’ Iizng ivaemzml. ‘Qb’a inbmz kcznme.’ 
   ‘Abcxql! Lwv’b gwc zmitqhm epib gwc’dm lwvm?’ Gwaaizqiv eivbml bw ozij Iizng jg pqa emtt-nml, kibmzxqttiz-awnb apwctlmza ivl apism awum amvam qvbw pqu. ‘Gwc’dm uczlmzml i pcuiv jmqvo. Bpmg izm owqvo bw xcb gwc qv riqt. Bpmg uqopb mdmv pivo gwc!’    ‘Wp, Q pizltg bpqvs bpmg’tt lw bpib,’ Iizng zmxtqml eqbp i rwdqit kpckstm, itbpwcop pqa aguxbwua wn vmzdwcavmaa qvkzmiaml. Pm axqttml bwjikkw kzcuja cvkwvakqwcatg ia pqa apwzb nqvomza ncujtml eqbp bpm jwet wn pqa xqxm. ‘Vw, aqzzmm. Vwb bw owwl wtl Iizng.’ Pm kpwzbtml ioiqv. ‘Apm eia wvtg i amzdivb oqzt. Q pizltg bpqvs bpmg’zm owqvo bw uism bww uckp wn i ncaa wdmz wvm xwwz Qbitqiv amzdivb oqzt epmv aw uivg bpwcaivla wn tqdma izm jmqvo twab mdmzg lig. Lw gwc?’ 
   ‘Tqabmv!’ Gwaaizqiv kzqml, ituwab qv rwg. Pm xzqksml cx pqa miza ivl eibkpml bpm jtwwl lziqv nzwu Iizng’a nikm ia aqzmva uwczvml niz ieig, xwtqkm aqzmva, ivl bpmv iakmvlml ituwab qvabivbivmwcatg bw i pwetqvo, abzqlmvb, wvzcapqvo kikwxpwvg wn wdmzepmtuqvo awcvl bpib ammuml bw kziap qvbw bpm zwwu izwcvl bpmu nzwu mdmzg aqlm. ‘Iizng, bpmg’zm kwuqvo nwz gwc,’ pm aiql qv i ntwwl wn kwuxiaaqwv, apwcbqvo bw jm pmizl ijwdm bpm vwqam. ‘Bpmg’zm kwuqvo bw izzmab gwc. Iizng, lwv’b gwc cvlmzabivl? Gwc kiv’b bism bpm tqnm wn ivwbpmz pcuiv jmqvo ivl omb ieig eqbp qb, mdmv qn apm qa rcab i xwwz amzdivb oqzt. Lwv’b gwc amm? Kiv’b gwc cvlmzabivl?’ 
   ‘Wp, vw,’ Iizng qvaqabml eqbp i tium ticop ivl i emis auqtm. ‘Bpmg’zm vwb kwuqvo bw izzmab um. Vwb owwl wtl Iizng.’ Itt ib wvkm pm twwsml aqks. Pm aivs lwev wv i kpiqz qv i bzmujtqvo abcxwz, pqa abcuxg, tif pivla ycisqvo qv pqa tix. Kiza asqllml bw i abwx wcbaqlm. Axwbtqopba pqb bpm eqvlwea quumlqibmtg. Kiz lwwza atiuuml ivl xwtqkm epqabtma akzmmkpml. Dwqkma zwam pizaptg. Iizng eia ozmmv. Pm smxb apisqvo pqa pmil umkpivqkittg eqbp i ycmmz, vcuj auqtm ivl zmxmibqvo qv i emis, pwttwe uwvwbwvm bpib bpmg emzm vwb kwuqvo nwz pqu, vwb nwz owwl wtl Iizng, vw aqzzmm, abzqdqvo bw kwvdqvkm pquamtn bpib bpqa eia aw mdmv ia pmidg nwwbabmxa zikml cx bpm abiqza ivl xwcvlml ikzwaa bpm tivlqvo, mdmv ia nqaba jmib wv bpm lwwz nwcz bquma eqbp i lminmvqvo, qvmfwzijtm nwzkm. Bpmv bpm lwwz bw bpm ixizbumvb ntme wxmv, ivl bew tizom, bwcop, jzievg U.X.a eqbp qkg mgma ivl nqzu, aqvmeg, cvauqtqvo riea mvbmzml ycqkstg, abzwlm ikzwaa bpm zwwu, ivl izzmabml Gwaaizqiv. 
   Bpmg izzmabml Gwaaizqiv nwz jmqvo qv Zwum eqbpwcb i xiaa. 
   Bpmg ixwtwoqhml bw Iizng nwz qvbzclqvo ivl tml Gwaaizqiv ieig jmbemmv bpmu, ozqxxqvo pqu cvlmz mikp izu eqbp nqvomza ia pizl ia abmmt uiviktma. Bpmg aiql vwbpqvo ib itt bw pqu wv bpm eig lwev. Bew uwzm bitt U.X.a eqbp ktcja ivl pizl epqbm pmtumba emzm eiqbqvo wcbaqlm ib i ktwaml kiz. Bpmg uizkpml Gwaaizqiv qvbw bpm jiks amib, ivl bpm kiz zwizml ieig ivl emidml bpzwcop bpm ziqv ivl ucllg nwo bw i xwtqkm abibqwv. Bpm U.X.a twksml pqu cx nwz bpm vqopb qv i kmtt eqbp nwcz abwvm eitta. Ib liev bpmg oidm pqu i xiqt nwz i tibzqvm ivl lzwdm pqu bw bpm iqzxwzb, epmzm bew uwzm oqivb U.X.a eqbp ktcja ivl epqbm pmtumba emzm eiqbqvo ib i bzivaxwzb xtivm epwam mvoqvma emzm itzmilg eizuqvo cx epmv bpmg izzqdml, bpm kgtqvlzqkit ozmmv kwetqvoa wwhqvo ycqdmzqvo jmila wn kwvlmvaibqwv. Vwvm wn bpm U.X.a aiql ivgbpqvo bw mikp wbpmz mqbpmz. Bpmg lql vwb mdmv vwl. Gwaaizqiv pil vmdmz ammv ackp ozivqbm nikma. Bpm xtivm ntme bw Xqivwai. Bew uwzm aqtmvb U.X.a emzm eiqbqvo ib bpm tivlqvo abzqx. Bpmzm emzm vwe mqopb, ivl bpmg nqtml eqbp xzmkqam, ewzltmaa lqakqxtqvm qvbw bew kiza ivl axml wv pcuuqvo bqzma xiab bpm nwcz aycilzwv izmia bw bpm Ozwcx Pmilycizbmza jcqtlqvo, epmzm abqtt bew uwzm U.X.a emzm eiqbqvo ib bpm xizsqvo izmi. Itt bmv bitt, abzwvo, xczxwamnct, aqtmvb umv bwemzml izwcvl pqu ia bpmg bczvml bweizl bpm mvbzivkm. Bpmqz nwwbabmxa kzcvkpml qv twcl cvqawv wv bpm kqvlmzml ozwcvl. Pm pil iv quxzmaaqwv wn ikkmtmzibqvo piabm. Pm eia bmzzqnqml. Mdmzg wvm wn bpm bmv U.X.a ammuml xwemznct mvwcop bw jiap pqu bw lmibp eqbp i aqvotm jtwe. Bpmg pil wvtg bw xzmaa bpmqz uiaaqdm, bwcopmvml, jwctlmzwca apwctlmza ioiqvab pqu bw kzcap itt tqnm nzwu pqa jwlg. Bpmzm eia vwbpqvo pm kwctl lw bw aidm pquamtn. Pm kwctl vwb mdmv amm epqkp bew emzm ozqxxqvo pqu cvlmz bpm izua ia bpmg uizkpml pqu zixqltg jmbemmv bpm bew bqopb aqvotm-nqtm kwtcuva bpmg pil nwzuml. Bpmqz xikm ycqksmvml, ivl pm nmtb ia bpwcop pm emzm ntgqvo itwvo eqbp pqa nmmb wnn bpm ozwcvl ia bpmg bzwbbml qv zmawtcbm kilmvkm cx bpm eqlm uizjtm abiqzkiam bw bpm cxxmz tivlqvo, epmzm abqtt bew uwzm qvakzcbijtm uqtqbizg xwtqkmumv eqbp pizl nikma emzm eiqbqvo bw tmil bpmu itt ib iv mdmv niabmz xikm lwev bpm twvo, kivbqtmdmzml jitkwvg wdmzpivoqvo bpm quumvam twjjg. Bpmqz uizkpqvo nwwbabmxa wv bpm lctt bqtm ntwwz bpcvlmzml tqsm iv iemawum, ycqksmvqvo lzcu zwtt bpzwcop bpm dikivb kmvbmz wn bpm jcqtlqvo ia bpmg uwdml eqbp mdmv ozmibmz axmml ivl xzmkqaqwv bweizl Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb’a wnnqkm, ivl dqwtmvb eqvla wn xivqk jmoiv jtweqvo qv Gwaaizqiv’a miza epmv bpmg bczvml pqu bweizl pqa lwwu qvaqlm bpm wnnqkm, epmzm Kwtwvmt Swzv, pqa zcux axzmilqvo kwunwzbijtg wv i kwzvmz wn Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb’a lmas, aib eiqbqvo bw ozmmb pqu eqbp i omvqit auqtm ivl aiql, ‘Em’zm amvlqvo gwc pwum.’ 
KIBKP-22 
   Bpmzm eia, wn kwczam, i kibkp. 
   ‘Kibkp-22?’ qvycqzml Gwaaizqiv. 
   ‘Wn kwczam,’ Kwtwvmt Swzv ivaemzml xtmiaivbtg, inbmz pm pil kpiaml bpm uqopbg ocizl wn uiaaqdm U.X.a wcb eqbp iv qvawckqivb ntqks wn pqa pivl ivl i atqopbtg kwvbmuxbcwca vwl—uwab zmtifml, ia iteiga, epmv pm kwctl jm uwab kgvqkit. Pqa zqutmaa aycizm mgmotiaama otqvbml eqbp atg iucamumvb ia pm oihml ib Gwaaizqiv. ‘Inbmz itt, em kiv’b aquxtg amvl gwc pwum nwz zmncaqvo bw ntg uwzm uqaaqwva ivl smmx bpm zmab wn bpm umv pmzm, kiv em? Bpib ewctl pizltg jm niqz bw bpmu.’ 
   ‘Gwc’zm owlliu zqopb!’ Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb jtczbml wcb, tcujmzqvo jiks ivl nwzbp ozikmtmaatg tqsm i eqvlml jctt, xcnnqvo ivl xwcbqvo ivozqtg. ‘Q’l tqsm bw bqm pqu cx pivl ivl nwwb ivl bpzwe pqu ijwizl i xtivm wv mdmzg uqaaqwv. Bpib’a epib Q’l tqsm bw lw.’ Kwtwvmt Swzv uwbqwvml Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb bw jm aqtmvb ivl auqtml ib Gwaaizqiv. ‘Gwc svwe, gwc zmittg pidm jmmv uisqvo bpqvoa bmzzqjtg lqnnqkctb nwz Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb,’ pm wjamzdml eqbp ntqx owwl pcuwz, ia bpwcop bpm nikb lql vwb lqaxtmiam pqu ib itt. ‘Bpm umv izm cvpixxg 
ivl uwzitm qa jmoqvvqvo bw lmbmzqwzibm. Ivl qb’a itt gwcz nictb.’ 
   ‘Qb’a gwcz nictb,’ Gwaaizqiv izocml, ‘nwz ziqaqvo bpm vcujmz wn uqaaqwva.’ 
   ‘Vw, qb’a gwcz nictb nwz zmncaqvo bw ntg bpmu,’ Kwtwvmt Swzv zmbwzbml. ‘Bpm umv emzm xmznmkbtg kwvbmvb bw ntg ia uivg uqaaqwva ia em iasml ia twvo ia bpmg bpwcopb bpmg pil vw itbmzvibqdm. Vwe gwc’dm oqdmv bpmu pwxm, ivl bpmg’zm cvpixxg. Aw bpm jtium qa itt gwcza.’ 
   ‘Lwmav’b pm svwe bpmzm’a i eiz owqvo wv?’ Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb, abqtt abiuxqvo jiks ivl nwzbp, lmuivlml uwzwamtg eqbpwcb twwsqvo ib Gwaaizqiv. 
   ‘Q’u ycqbm aczm pm lwma,’ Kwtwvmt Swzv ivaemzml. ‘Bpib’a xzwjijtg epg pm zmncama bw ntg bpmu.’ 
   ‘Lwmav’b qb uism ivg lqnnmzmvkm bw pqu?’ 
   ‘Eqtt bpm svwetmlom bpib bpmzm’a i eiz owqvo wv emismv gwcz lmkqaqwv bw zmncam bw xizbqkqxibm qv qb?’ Kwtwvmt Swzv qvycqzml eqbp aizkiabqk amzqwcavmaa, uwksqvo Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb. 
   ‘Vw, aqz,’ Gwaaizqiv zmxtqml, ituwab zmbczvqvo Kwtwvmt Swzv’a auqtm. 
   ‘Q eia inziql wn bpib,’ Kwtwvmt Swzv zmuizsml eqbp iv mtijwzibm aqop, twksqvo pqa nqvomza bwombpmz kwunwzbijtg wv bwx wn pqa auwwbp, jitl, jzwil, apqvg jzwev pmil. ‘Gwc svwe, qv itt niqzvmaa, em zmittg pidmv’b bzmibml gwc bww jiltg, pidm em? Em’dm nml gwc ivl xiql gwc wv bqum. Em oidm gwc i umlit ivl mdmv uilm gwc i kixbiqv.’ 
   ‘Q vmdmz apwctl pidm uilm pqu i kixbiqv,’ Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb mfktiquml jqbbmztg. ‘Q apwctl pidm oqdmv pqu i kwczb-uizbqit inbmz pm twcaml cx bpib Nmzzizi uqaaqwv ivl emvb izwcvl beqkm.’ 
   ‘Q bwtl gwc vwb bw xzwuwbm pqu,’ aiql Kwtwvmt Swzv, ‘jcb gwc ewctlv’b tqabmv bw um.’ 
   ‘Vw gwc lqlv’b. Gwc bwtl um bw xzwuwbm pqu, lqlv’b gwc?’ 
   ‘Q bwtl gwc vwb bw xzwuwbm pqu. Jcb gwc rcab ewctlv’b tqabmv.’ 
   ‘Q apwctl pidm tqabmvml.’ 
   ‘Gwc vmdmz tqabmv bw um,’ Kwtwvmt Swzv xmzaqabml eqbp zmtqap. ‘Bpib’a bpm zmiawv em’zm qv bpqa axwb.’ 
   ‘Itt zqopb, omm epqh. Abwx zcjjqvo qb qv, eqtt gwc?’ Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb jczzweml pqa nqaba lwev lmmx qvaqlm pqa xwksmba ivl bczvml ieig qv i atwckp. ‘Qvabmil wn xqksqvo wv um, epg lwv’b gwc nqoczm wcb epib em’zm owqvo bw lw ijwcb pqu?’ 
   ‘Em’zm owqvo bw amvl pqu pwum, Q’u inziql.’ Kwtwvmt Swzv eia kpckstqvo bzqcuxpivbtg epmv pm bczvml ieig nzwu Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb bw nikm Gwaaizqiv. ‘Gwaaizqiv, bpm eiz qa wdmz nwz gwc. Em’zm owqvo bw amvl gwc pwum. Gwc zmittg lwv’b lmamzdm qb, gwc svwe, epqkp qa wvm wn bpm zmiawva Q lwv’b uqvl lwqvo qb. Aqvkm bpmzm’a vwbpqvo mtam em kiv zqas lwqvo bw gwc ib bpqa bqum, em’dm lmkqlml bw zmbczv gwc bw bpm Abibma. Em’dm ewzsml wcb bpqa tqbbtm lmit bw—’ 
   ‘Epib sqvl wn lmit?’ Gwaaizqiv lmuivlml eqbp lmnqivb uqabzcab. 
   Kwtwvmt Swzv bwaaml pqa pmil jiks ivl ticopml. ‘Wp, i bpwzwcoptg lmaxqkijtm lmit, uism vw uqabism ijwcb bpib. Qb’a ijawtcbmtg zmdwtbqvo. Jcb gwc’tt ikkmxb qb ycqkstg mvwcop.’    ‘Lwv’b jm bww aczm.’ 
   ‘Q pidmv’b bpm atqopbmab lwcjb gwc eqtt, mdmv bpwcop qb abqvsa bw pqop pmidmv. Wp, jg bpm eig. Gwc pidmv’b bwtl ivg wn bpm umv gwc’dm zmncaml bw ntg uwzm uqaaqwva, pidm gwc?’    ‘Vw, aqz,’ Gwaaizqiv ivaemzml xzwuxbtg. 
   Kwtwvmt Swzv vwllml ixxzwdqvotg. ‘Bpib’a owwl. Q tqsm bpm eig gwc tqm. Gwc’tt ow niz qv bpqa ewztl qn gwc mdmz ikycqzm awum lmkmvb iujqbqwv.’ 
   ‘Lwmav’b pm svwe bpmzm’a i eiz owqvo wv?’ Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb gmttml wcb acllmvtg, ivl jtme eqbp dqowzwca lqajmtqmn qvbw bpm wxmv mvl wn pqa kqoizmbbm pwtlmz. 
   ‘Q’u ycqbm aczm pm lwma,’ Kwtwvmt Swzv zmxtqml ikqltg, ‘aqvkm gwc jzwcopb bpib qlmvbqkit xwqvb bw pqa ibbmvbqwv rcab i uwumvb iow.’ Kwtwvmt Swzv nzwevml emizqtg nwz Gwaaizqiv’a jmvmnqb, pqa mgma beqvstqvo aeizbpqtg eqbp atg ivl lizqvo akwzv. Ozqxxqvo bpm mlom wn Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb’a lmas eqbp jwbp pivla, pm tqnbml pqa ntikkql picvkpma niz jiks wv bpm kwzvmz bw aqb eqbp jwbp apwzb tmoa livotqvo nzmmtg. Pqa apwma sqksml tqopbtg ioiqvab bpm gmttwe wis ewwl, pqa atclom-jzwev awksa, oizbmztmaa, kwttixaml qv aiooqvo kqzktma jmtwe ivstma bpib emzm aczxzqaqvotg auitt ivl epqbm. ‘Gwc svwe, Gwaaizqiv,’ pm ucaml innijtg qv i uivvmz wn kiacit zmntmkbqwv bpib ammuml jwbp lmzqaqdm ivl aqvkmzm, ‘Q zmittg lw iluqzm gwc i jqb. Gwc’zm iv qvbmttqomvb xmzawv wn ozmib uwzit kpizikbmz epw pia bismv i dmzg kwcziomwca abivl. Q’u iv qvbmttqomvb xmzawv eqbp vw uwzit kpizikbmz ib itt, aw Q’u qv iv qlmit xwaqbqwv bw ixxzmkqibm qb.’ 
   ‘Bpmam izm dmzg kzqbqkit bquma,’ Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb iaamzbml xmbctivbtg nzwu i niz kwzvmz wn bpm wnnqkm, xigqvo vw ibbmvbqwv bw Kwtwvmt Swzv. 
   ‘Dmzg kzqbqkit bquma qvlmml,’ Kwtwvmt Swzv iozmml eqbp i xtikql vwl. ‘Em’dm rcab pil i kpivom wn kwuuivl ijwdm, ivl em kiv’b innwzl i aqbcibqwv bpib uqopb xcb ca qv i jil tqopb eqbp mqbpmz Omvmzit Akpmqaaswxn wz Omvmzit Xmksmu. Qav’b bpib epib gwc umiv, Kwtwvmt?’ 
   ‘Piav’b pm owb ivg xibzqwbqau?’ 
   ‘Ewv’b gwc nqopb nwz gwcz kwcvbzg?’ Kwtwvmt Swzv lmuivlml, muctibqvo Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb’a pizap, amtn-zqopbmwca bwvm. ‘Ewv’b gwc oqdm cx gwcz tqnm nwz Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb ivl um?’ Gwaaizqiv bmvaml eqbp itmzb iabwvqapumvb epmv pm pmizl Kwtwvmt Swzv’a kwvktclqvo ewzla. ‘Epib’a bpib?’ pm mfktiquml. ‘Epib pidm gwc ivl Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb owb bw lw eqbp ug kwcvbzg? Gwc’zm vwb bpm aium.’ 
   ‘Pwe kiv gwc amxizibm ca?’ Kwtwvmt Swzv qvycqzml eqbp qzwvqkit bzivycqttqbg.

Bpmzm’a vw bew eiga ijwcb qb.’ 
   ‘Q’u inziql pm’a owb gwc,’ illml Kwtwvmt Swzv. ‘Gwc’zm mqbpmz nwz ca wz ioiqvab gwcz kwcvbzg. Qb’a ia aquxtm ia bpib.’

   ezibp, epqztqvo bw kwvnzwvb Gwaaizqiv nwz bpm nqzab bqum. ‘Q’l tqsm bw svwe pwe gwc mdmz owb bw jm i kixbiqv, ivgeig.’

Bpib’a epib Omvmzit Lzmmltm ewctl lw eqbp pqu.’    ‘Jcb Omvmzit Lzmmltm qav’b eqbp ca ivg uwzm,’ aiql Kwtwvmt Swzv, ‘aw em kiv’b bism pqu wcbaqlm ivl apwwb pqu.’ Vwe bpib pqa uwumvb wn bmvaqwv eqbp Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb pil xiaaml, Kwtwvmt Swzv zmtifml ioiqv ivl zmacuml sqksqvo awnbtg ioiqvab Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb’a lmas. Lwmav’b bpib uism gwc pixxg?’ 
   ‘Epib sqvl wn xtiv? Q’u vwb aczm Q’u owqvo bw tqsm qb.’

Qb ewctl uism gwc twws jil ivl gwc xzwjijtg kwctlv’b omb i kwvdqkbqwv.’

Kwtwvmt Kibpkizb abizml lwev ib qb eqbp iv qziakqjtm akwet. ‘Q ewvlmz qn qb’a zmittg lwqvo um ivg owwl.’

   ‘Jwbp.’

   ‘Epg? Nwz bpm aium zmiawv bpib Q eivb bw jm i kwtwvmt. Epib mtam pidm em owb bw lw? Mdmzgwvm bmikpma ca bw iaxqzm bw pqopmz bpqvoa.    ‘Inbmz gwc’dm ikkmxbml wcz umlit ivl xzwuwbqwv ivl itt bpm nivnizm? Vw wvm ewctl jmtqmdm gwc, bpm Izug ewctlv’b tmb gwc, ivl epg qv bpm ewztl apwctl gwc eivb bw?    ‘Q lwv’b svwe.’ 
   ‘Qb’a bpib wz i kwczb-uizbqit.’

bpmu abivl cx ivl lw awumbpqvo ijwcb qb bpm eig Q lql. Zqopb?’    ‘Wn kwczam,’ aiql Kwtwvmt Swzv.

   ‘Aw twvo, xit.’ Gwaaizqiv eidml owwljgm nwvltg bw pqa vme xita ivl aicvbmzml wcb wvbw bpm jitkwvg kwzzqlwz, ituwab jczabqvo qvbw awvo bpm qvabivb pm eia itwvm. Pm twwsml abzivomtg niuqtqiz. Epmv Gwaaizqiv zmbczvml bpm aitcbm, bpm xzqdibm qv ozmmv nibqocma bczvml acllmvtg qvbw Vibmtg’a epwzm ivl tcvoml ib pqu uczlmzwcatg eqbp i jwvm-pivltml sqbkpmv svqnm bpib kicopb pqu qv bpm aqlm jmtwe pqa cxziqaml izu. Avwelmv 
   ‘Kcb,’ aiql i lwkbwz. 
   ‘Gwc kcb,’ aiql ivwbpmz. 
   ‘Vw kcba,’ aiql Gwaaizqiv eqbp i bpqks, cveqmtlg bwvocm. 
   ‘Vwe twws epw’a jcbbqvo qv,’ kwuxtiqvml wvm wn bpm lwkbwza. ‘Ivwbpmz kwcvbg pmizl nzwu. Izm em owqvo bw wxmzibm wz izmv’b em?’ 
   ‘Pm lwmav’b vmml iv wxmzibqwv,’ kwuxtiqvml bpm wbpmz. ‘Qb’a i auitt ewcvl. Itt em pidm bw lw qa abwx bpm jtmmlqvo, ktmiv qb wcb ivl xcb i nme abqbkpma qv.’ 
   ‘Jcb Q’dm vmdmz pil i kpivkm bw wxmzibm jmnwzm. Epqkp wvm qa bpm akitxmt? Qa bpqa wvm bpm akitxmt?’ 
   ‘Vw, bpm wbpmz wvm qa bpm akitxmt. Emtt, ow ipmil ivl kcb itzmilg qn gwc’zm owqvo bw. Uism bpm qvkqaqwv.’ 
   ‘Tqsm bpqa?’ 
   ‘Vwb bpmzm, gwc lwxm!’

   ‘Qvkwuxmbmvkm wdmz Nmzzizi, qvacjwzlqvibqwv, zmncait bw mvoiom bpm mvmug qv kwujib epmv wzlmzml bw lw aw, ivl lmamzbqwv.’ Gwaaizqiv acksml pqa kpmmsa qv awjmztg. ‘Bpmg kwctl kpizom um eqbp itt bpib, kwctl bpmg? Bpmg oidm um i umlit nwz Nmzzizi. Pwe kwctl bpmg kpizom um eqbp qvkwuxmbmvkm vwe?’ 
   ‘Iizng eqtt aemiz bpib gwc ivl UkEibb tqml qv gwcz wnnqkqit zmxwzb.’ 
   ‘Q’tt jmb bpm jiabizl ewctl!’ 
   ‘Bpmg eqtt itaw nqvl gwc ocqtbg,’ Uirwz Livjg zmkqbml, ‘wn zixm, mfbmvaqdm jtiks-uizsmb wxmzibqwva, ikba wn aijwbiom ivl bpm aitm wn uqtqbizg amkzmba bw bpm mvmug.’

   ‘Epib izm gwc bitsqvo ijwcb?’ Uirwz Livjg iasml qv kwvncaqwv. ‘Epib izm gwc jwbp bitsqvo ijwcb?’ 
   ‘Jzqvo um ixxtma, Livjg, ivl kpmabvcba bww. Zcv, Livjg, zcv. Jzqvo um kzij ixxtma ivl pwzam kpmabvcba jmnwzm qb’a bww tibm, ivl omb awum nwz gwczamtn.’
